original: Promised to go on Hajj.
translation: 承诺参加麦加朝圣之旅。

original: Became Hajjaj together
translation: 携手朝圣

original: Promised Jihad
translation: 吉哈德之诺

original: Berated me about Hajj
translation: 在朝圣之事上对我横加指责。

original: Declined Hajj
translation: 拒绝麦加朝圣

original: Refused to go on Hajj with me
translation: 拒绝同我共赴麦加朝圣

original: Saved from bandits at Hajj
translation: 朝圣途中从土匪手中获救。

original: Saved him from bandits
translation: 从匪患中获救

original: Broke Truce of Hajj
translation: 打破麦加朝圣期间的休战期

original: Positive talk on Hajj
translation: 关于朝圣的积极会谈

original: Helped with Wudu
translation: 帮助小净

original: Not showing charity
translation: 不施以仁慈

original: You have started to prepare yourself for going on a pilgrimage to Mecca. Soon you will humble yourself and travel in a group with others to fulfill one of the five pillars of Islam.
translation: 你已经开始做麦加朝圣的准备，很快你就将谦卑地和他人一道踏上前往伊斯兰教五大支柱之一的行程。

original: All are equal in front of God!
translation: 安拉座前，众生平等。

original: I am preparing myself for my travel to Mecca, and I have understood that there are members of my court that have not yet gone on a pilgrimage to Mecca. As [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], it is my duty to be charitable to my people, and I will bring one of them with me.
translation: 我正在准备去麦加的旅程，我已经明白，我的宫廷成员中有人尚未去过麦加朝圣。作为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，善待我的人民是我的责任，我会带上他们中的一个。

original: It will make travel more enjoyable...
translation: 它会让旅行更愉快……

original: It is too costly...
translation: 这太贵了……

original: While preparing for my pilgrimage to Mecca, I have come to realize that [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] is not a Hajjaj.
translation: 在准备我的麦加朝圣之旅时，我意识到 [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]不是一个朝圣者。

original: Berate [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] about it!
translation: 痛斥[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]！

original: will listen to us...
translation: 愿意听我们……

original: Clearly, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is a busy [Root.Liege.GetManWoman]...
translation: 显然[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]是一个忙碌的[Root.Liege.GetManWoman]……

original: My beloved [Root.GetTitle]!\n I am preparing to go to Mecca on a Hajj. Sadly, rumors tell me that you have not gone on a pilgrimage yourself. Would you like to travel with me, your faithful servant?\nYour humble [From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]！\n我正准备去麦加朝圣。不幸的是留言告诉我你没有自己的朝圣之旅，你是否愿意和你忠诚的仆人一起前往？\n你卑微的[From.GetTitledName]

original: I will prepare myself immediately!
translation: 我会立即准备好的！

original: will be travelling together with us...
translation: 与我们同行……

original: I am too busy!
translation: 我太忙了！

original: will be disappointed in me
translation: 会对我失望

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!\nI will join you on your way to Mecca!\nYour liege, [From.GetTitledName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！\n我会加入你的麦加之行！\n你的领主，[From.GetTitledName]

original: Allah is Great!
translation: 安拉至上！

original: I am sincerely regretful to inform you that I am not able to join you in your pilgrimage.\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 真的很抱歉，我不能加入你们的朝圣之旅。\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Allah will judge him...
translation: 安拉会降罪于他……

original: Our liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has heard of our plans to go to Mecca, and sends us advice that the road is perilous with infidels and bandits.
translation: 我们的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]，听说了我们要去麦加朝圣，并且真诚的提醒我们道路上满是危险的异教徒和土匪。

original: Bring guards with you
translation: 带上卫兵

original: Travel lightly
translation: 轻装前往

original: While preparing for my pilgrimage to Mecca, my child comes to me and asks if [target_child.GetSheHe] can join me.
translation: 在我准备前往麦加朝圣前，我的孩子来找我，想要与我一同前去，

original: Bring [target_child.GetHerHim] along
translation: 带上[target_child.GetHerHim]

original: It would be too costly
translation: 太昂贵了

original: I am now fully prepared for my travel to Mecca! There will be a regent ruling [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] while I am away.
translation: 我已经做好了去麦加的准备！在我离开的时候摄政将会帮助我管理[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。

original: Onwards to Mecca!
translation: 前往麦加！

original: A group of bandits are tracking us, and it seems as if they are gaining on us.
translation: 一伙强盗在追踪我们，而且似乎正在逼近。

original: Attempt to avoid them!
translation: 试着避开他们！

original: Its our duty to stop them..
translation: 阻止他们是我们的天职……

original: Me and my group of pilgrims will engage the bandits.
translation: 我和我团队的朝圣者将遭遇土匪。

original: It is not possible to outrun these bandits, and we are forced to confront them. There is always the possibility that we can survive this.
translation: 我们不可能逃离这些土匪，只能被迫与他们对峙，我相信我们会有一线生机的。

original: They are few enough to defeat alone..
translation: 这点人数，单枪匹马即可……

original: Charge!
translation: 冲锋！

original: Pay them with our remaining gold.
translation: 把我们剩下的钱给他们。

original: Travelling by sea causes you to feel seasick. Luckily there is a hafiz on the ship who quotes the holy Qur'an. 'And they shall be made to drink therein a cup the admixture of which shall be ginger'.
translation: 航海使你感到晕船，幸运的是船上有一个能够引用古兰经的穆斯林。他们喝了一杯姜汁。

original: I feel good!
translation: 我感觉超爽！

original: As you travel over the sea, your ship spots the sails of a well-known [christian.GetGroupName] pirate. We have a faster ship, and the chance to eliminate this threat to pilgrims forever!
translation: 当你航海时，你观察到一个知名的[christian.GetGroupName]海盗的帆影。我们有更快的船，让我们永久的抹除它！

original: It's too great of a risk...
translation: 冒着巨大的风险……

original: We must stop these infidels!
translation: 我们必须阻止这些异教徒！

original: Nearby you see how a group of bandits have encircled a group of fellow pilgrims. It is very likely they will rob and kill them.
translation: 你在附近看到一群土匪包围了一群朝圣者，很有可能会抢劫并杀了他们。

original: There is nothing we can do...
translation: 我们无能为力……

original: Attempt to rescue them!
translation: 尝试去救他们！

original: We got surrounded by bandits, and I was sure that I was soon going to be robbed and left for dead, when some fellow pilgrims arrived to save us.
translation: 当有人来救我们时我正被强盗包围着，非常确信自己将要被洗劫一空丢下等死。

original: My brother!
translation: 我的兄弟！

original: One of my servants have noticed that a hated rival is camping not far from us. I know that it is against the teachings of the prophet to attack someone on Hajj, but this is a golden opportunity.
translation: 我的一个仆人已经注意到一个讨厌的对手在离我们不远处露营。我知道在他人朝圣途中攻击他是对先知教诲的违逆，但这也是一个千载难逢的机会。

original: Attempt to ambush him in the night..
translation: 在夜里伏击他……

original: will face our steel!
translation: 会面对我们的武器！

original: Befriend him...
translation: 与他为友……

original: will hear our invitation.
translation: 会听到我们的邀请。

original: I'll just ignore him.
translation: 无视他。

original: We have been ambushed, and it seems as if it is [From.GetTitledName] who is attempting to kill you. It is an outrage, and it clear that [From.GetSheHe] is not a proper Muslim to attempt such a vile act in the darkness!
translation: 我们被伏击了，好像是[From.GetTitledName]试图杀死你。这种手段令人愤怒，很显然在暗中做出这种卑劣行径的[From.GetSheHe]不是一名真正的穆斯林！

original: Fight back!
translation: 回击！

original: is left for dead in the night..
translation: 在夜里等死……

original: Fight back!
translation: 回击！

original: We got enough time to run away..
translation: 我们有足够的时间逃跑……

original: Our ambush ended in disaster... Not only did [From.GetTitledName] get away, but [From.GetSheHe] also injured me severely.
translation: 伏击以失败告终……[From.GetTitledName]不仅逃跑了，[From.GetSheHe]还让我身受重伤。

original: [From.GetTitledName] got the best of me..
translation: [From.GetTitledName]战胜了我……

original: Success!\nI've left [From.GetTitledName], bleeding severely, to die in the desert...
translation: 成功！\n我抛下[From.GetTitledName]，血流满地，在沙漠里等死……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will surely die soon enough..
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]很快会死……

original: It seems that [From.GetTitledName] got away in the quiet of the night...
translation: 看起来[From.GetTitledName]在夜色中逃脱了……

original: It can't be helped...
translation: 没办法……

original: A messenger comes with an invitation from [From.GetTitledName] who is camped not far from us, offering to break bread and reconcile our differences.
translation: 附近扎营的[From.GetTitledName]派使者带来了一个口信，希望举办一场宴会来减少我们之间的分歧。

original: We are allies in the faith after all..
translation: 我们毕竟信仰同一真神……

original: Politely Decline...
translation: 礼貌地拒绝……

original: [From.GetTitledName] has joined our camp and we are breaking bread together, reconciling our differences.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]来到我的营帐，我们一起分吃面包，并减少了我们之间的分歧。

original: Subhan'Allah
translation: 安拉至大

original:
Honorable [Root.GetTitledName]!
I regret to inform you that I will not be able to break bread with you today, as I need to break camp immediately.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitledName]！
我很遗憾的通知你，我将无法与今天的你会餐，因为我需要立即攻破营帐。

[From.GetTitledName]

original: We have lost face!
translation: 我丢尽了颜面！

original: Travelling to Mecca gives time for reflection. A [Root.GetManWoman] should not go into excess when it comes to food, and should always abstain from wine!
translation: 去麦加的旅途中我反思了许多。一个[Root.GetManWoman]不应浪费食物，并且应永远戒酒！

original: I shall be more moderate in my eating..
translation: 我应该更加的节食……

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: It seems as if we have managed to get lost here in the desert. One of the humble servants seems as if he might know the right way.
translation: 我们似乎已经迷失在沙漠里。一个卑微的仆人看上去似乎知道正确的路。

original: I am [Root.GetTitle]! I know the best way!
translation: 我是[Root.GetTitle]！我知道最好的路线！

original: Listen to the servant...
translation: 听从那个仆人……

original: As you stop for camp one evening, you notice that an old man in poor clothing has made camp at the same place. The man offers to tell you a hadith he has if you can spare him some bread.
translation: 当你夜晚扎营时，你注意到一位可怜的老人在同一处扎营。如果你给他一些面包，他会告诉你一条圣训。

original: Listen to the old man
translation: 听那个老人的

original: It is just an old man...
translation: 不过只是个糟老头……

original: You listen carefully to the old man's hadith.\n
translation: 你仔细听老人的圣训。\n

original: Greed is against Islam!
translation: 贪婪与伊斯兰相悖！

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says that, the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, would often pray, 'O Allah! I seek your protection from anxiety and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from stinginess and cowardice, and from the burden of debt and the domination of people.'
translation: 老人说，安拉的使者（愿主福安之）会常常祷告，「安拉啊！求你使我不要遭受忧愁、无能、懒惰、吝啬、胆怯、负债和受欺。」

original: I bow my head and say the same prayer.
translation: 我同样低头祷告。

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says that, Abu Hurayra reported that the Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, 'Beware of envy. Envy devours good actions as fire devours wood.'
translation: 老人说，据阿布·胡赖莱传述，先知（愿主福安之）说：「当心嫉妒。嫉妒之于善行宛如火之于木。」

original: Envy harms myself!
translation: 嫉妒使我面目全非！

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says that, Ibn Mas'ud reported that the Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said, 'Truthfulness leads to piety and piety leads to the Garden. A [Root.GetManWoman] should be truthful until [Root.GetSheHe] is written down as truthful in the sight of Allah. Lying leads to deviance and deviance leads to the Fire. A person lies to the point that [Root.GetSheHe] is written down as a liar in the sight of Allah.'
translation: 老人说，据伊本·马苏德传述，先知（愿主福安之）说「诚实胜过虔诚而虔诚胜过供奉。一个[Root.GetManWoman]应当一直保持真诚，直到安拉认为[Root.GetSheHe]是真诚的。说谎导致恶行而恶行导致灾祸。一个人一旦说谎，安拉就会认为[Root.GetSheHe]是骗子。」

original: I should be with the truthful!
translation: 我应当诚实！

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man quotes the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, from Sunan Abu Dawood, "The most evil traits in a [Root.GetManWoman] are severe stinginess and uninhibited cowardice!"
translation: 老人引用艾布·达吾德圣训集中安拉的使者（愿主福安之）的话语：「一个[Root.GetManWoman]最邪恶的特质是无穷止尽的贪婪与不可抑制的懦弱！」

original: And I am no evil [Root.GetManWoman]...
translation: 我不是邪恶的[Root.GetManWoman]……

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man starts telling you, that Abu Bakr as-Siddiq said.. "I heard the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, say, 'If people see an unjust person, and do not restrain [Root.GetHerHim], Allah is very likely to seize them with retribution from Him.'"
translation: 老人告诉你，据阿布·贝克尔传述：「我听到安拉的使者（愿主福安之）说道『如果人们看到不公平的人，却不阻止[Root.GetHerHim]，安拉将会让他惩罚他们。』」

original: Allah commands to justice and doing good!
translation: 安拉公正而为善行！

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says, "As the holy Qur'an says, 'You desire the attractions of this world, but Allah desires the next world for you!', and 'Yes, you prefer the life of this world, but the next world is better and more lasting.'"
translation: 老人说：「神圣的古兰经说，『你们欲得尘世的浮利，而真主愿你们得享后世的报酬』，『不然，你们却选择今世的生活；其实，后世是更好的，是更久长的。』」

original: This is wisdom!
translation: 这就是智慧！

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says, As related by Al-Tirmidhi, "I said, O Prophet of Allah, will we be held accountable for what we say? He said, 'May your mother be bereft of you! Is there anything that topples people on their faces into the hellfire other than the jests of their tongues?'"
translation: 老人说，据提尔米基传述，「我说，『安拉的先知啊！我们要为说出的话受到惩罚吗？』穆圣说，『你母亲确已丧失了你！若不是他们舌头的功劳，人们如何被拖入火狱？』」

original: I will think more on what I say...
translation: 我会三思而后言……

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The old man says that Abu Hurairah heard the prophet say "When Allah decreed the Creation He pledged Himself by writing in His book which is laid down with Him: 'My mercy prevails over My wrath'."
translation: 老人说，据阿布·胡赖莱传述，先知说：「当安拉命令创造万物时，他写书发誓：『我的怜悯胜过愤怒。』」

original: This is wisdom I was not aware of.
translation: 这是我不知道的智慧。

original: Alhamdulillah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: As you arrive in Mecca you start preparing for the evening's prayer when you discover that the water in the well is not entirely pure. This would not be valid water to use for ablution.
translation: 当你抵达麦加你开始准备晚上的祈祷，但你发现这口井里的水不是完全洁净的。这不是能用于沐浴的水。

original: Inform others nearby.
translation: 告诉周围的人。

original: will be grateful
translation: 将感激不尽

original: While performing wudu before the night's prayer, a fellow pilgrim points out an impurity in the water!
translation: 夜祷前小净时，一名朝圣者指出了这水是不洁的！

original: Cleanliness is half of faith!
translation: 清洁是信仰的一半！

original: As you arrive in Mecca, you change from your travelling clothes and dress in the white ihram clothing. This cloth is intended to make everyone appear the same, as in the eyes of Allah there is no difference between a [Root.GetTitle] and a pauper!
translation: 抵达麦加后，你脱下了旅行服并换上了白色的受戒服饰。这种服饰是为了让每个人看起来都相同，因为在安拉的眼中[Root.GetTitle]和一个乞丐之间并没有区别！

original: I am humbled....
translation: 我是渺小的……

original: You are now at Kabah itself, and performing the Tawaf. Seven circuits you will walk around the black stone, and each time you complete a circuit you point to the stone and say 'In the name of Allah, Allah is Great, Allah is Great, Allah is Great and praise be to Allah'.
translation: 你现在到达了天房，并开始进行仪式。你须绕黑石七圈，每圈绕毕你皆须指着黑石诵念：「以安拉之名，安拉至大，安拉至大，安拉至大，一切赞颂，尽归安拉」。

original: Shout at every circuit!
translation: 每一圈都喊出来！

original: Only shout the first three times
translation: 只喊头三圈

original: Performing the Sa'i involved running seven times between the hills of Safa and Marwah. This is done to remember the search for water by Ishmael's mother...
translation: 进行刹伊就是在萨法和麦尔瓦山丘之间跑七遍，以纪念易斯马仪的母亲寻找水源……

original: I feel invigorated!
translation: 我感到精神振奋！

original: The ninth day in Mecca you perform the Wuquf at Mount Arafat, with the entire afternoon dedicated to contemplative vigil, praying, and reciting the holy Qur'an.
translation: 在麦加的第九天你在阿拉法特山祷告，从下午开始祈祷、冥想、背诵古兰经直到天明。

original: I feel like I understand more now
translation: 我觉得我更了解自己了

original: When Abraham left Mina and was brought down to al-Aqaba, the Devil appeared to him. Gabriel said to him: 'Pelt him!' so Abraham threw seven stones at him so that he disappeared from him.
translation: 当易卜拉欣离开米纳，被带到亚喀巴时，魔鬼出现了。吉卜里勒对他说：「砸他！」于是亚伯拉罕把七块石头丢向魔鬼，然后魔鬼消失了。

original: Stone the Jamarat!
translation: 用石头砸死恶魔！

original: To symbolize the mercy God had for Abraham, and replacing his son Ishmael with a ram, which Abraham then sacrificed, we perform the Eid al-Adha while at Mecca.
translation: 象征着上帝已经宽恕易卜拉欣，后者用一头公羊代替易斯马仪献祭，这就是我们在麦加庆祝宰牲节的原因。

original: Sacrifice a ram.
translation: 献祭一头公羊。

original: Sacrifice a lamb.
translation: 献祭一只羔羊。

original: A group of bandits have forced our party to make a stand. We are outnumbered, but with the joy in our heart from our pilgrimage, we have a chance to defeat them!
translation: 一伙强盗迫使我们停止。我们寡不敌众，但从我们的朝圣中我们得到了发自内心的快乐，我们有机会击败他们！

original: These infidels will shatter.
translation: 这些异教徒会被碾碎成渣。

original: Run away!
translation: 快跑！

original: We accidentally ran into a group of bandits at nightfall, and the guards that I had hired to protect my group proved their worth. All of the infidel bandits have been slain.
translation: 我们在傍晚偶然遇到了一伙强盗，我雇来保护我的卫兵证明了他们的价值。所有的异教徒强盗都被杀掉了。

original: Their loot can come to use.
translation: 他们的战利品能用。

original: As you travel back home from Mecca you encounter a very poor village, where even the richest seem to starve.
translation: 当你从麦加返回时，你路过了一个非常贫穷的村子，即使里面最富有的人也在挨饿。

original: I must help them!
translation: 我必须帮助他们！

original: I can't afford to help them all..
translation: 我没有足够的钱来帮助他们全部……

original: I have returned to my court a changed man. I am truly humbled before Allah, and I know that all men are equal and can live in harmony with each other.
translation: 我回到了我的宫廷，此时的我已经脱胎换骨。我在安拉面前是如此渺小，这趟旅程让我明白所有人都是平等的，相互之间能够和谐共处。

original: There is no god but Allah, and Muhammad is the messenger of Allah
translation: 万物非主，唯有安拉，穆罕默德，是主之使者

original: A local Imam is berating you as you are getting older and have not yet been on hajj, which is expected of every Muslim once in [Root.GetHerHis] life. [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] says that as a ruler, I should be an example for my subjects.
translation: 当地的伊玛目训斥你，你的年龄越来越大，却从未进行朝圣，这是每一位穆斯林在[Root.GetHerHis]一生中必做的事。[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]说，作为一个统治者更应当起带头作用。

original: I will soon go to Mecca!
translation: 我马上去麦加！

original: I am busy preparing a jihad, to liberate fellow Muslims!
translation: 我正在忙于准备一场吉哈德，为了解放穆斯林同胞们！

original: I am busy being [Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!
translation: 我正忙于成为[Root.County.Holder.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]！

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] is reminding you that you have promised to go to Mecca, and that while Allah is merciful in His wisdom, you have indeed promised Him to go on a pilgrimage.
translation: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]提醒你，你已经答应要去麦加。而安拉是智慧而仁慈的。你已经答应他要去朝圣、

original: I am not a good Muslim...
translation: 我不是个好穆斯林……

original: I am not a good Muslim...
translation: 我不是个好穆斯林……

original: To lie with another [Root.GetManWoman] as you would lie with a [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is sinful, forbidden and if I was to be exposed, death would be my penalty.
translation: 欺骗[Root.GetManWoman]如同欺骗[Root.GetManWomanOpp]一样是有罪的、被禁止的，如果我暴露了，会被处死。

original: I will be careful...
translation: 我会小心……

original: I... cannot risk it
translation: 我……不能冒这个险

original: The clumsy servant once again managed to cover me in chicken bones, rice and oil and I lost my temper, knocking the servant to the floor in a clatter of broken crockery. My wroth had once again gotten the best of me...
translation: 笨拙的仆人再次设法用鸡骨头、大米和油淹没了我，我发了脾气，用破碎的陶器把仆人砸到在地上。我的怒火又一次征服了我……

original: Next time, your head will hang from the castle walls!
translation: 下次你的头将被挂在城堡的墙上！

original: [wroth_onlooker.GetTitledFirstName] watches [Root.GetTitledFirstName] lose [Root.GetHerHis] temper
translation: [wroth_onlooker.GetTitledFirstName]看着[Root.GetTitledFirstName]失去[Root.GetHerHis]脾气

original: It was not the first time the servant managed to spill food and dirty crockery on [From.GetTitledFirstName] and the furious [From.GetManWoman] sent the servant to the floor with a mighty slap, threatening to hang the servant's head from the castle wall if he ever did it again...
translation: 这不是第一次仆人把食品和脏陶器弄到[From.GetTitledFirstName]身上，这个愤怒的[From.GetManWoman]用一个耳光把仆人扇到在地，威胁下次会把他的头挂在城墙上……

original: You should not treat your servants like that!
translation: 你不应该这样对待你的仆人！

original: is stunned [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dared talk to [This.GetHerHim] like that
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]敢于这样对[This.GetHerHim]说话让人震惊

original: Your servant will certainly be more careful from now on
translation: 你的仆人从现在开始要小心

original: is glad [Root.GetTitledFirstName] understands why it is so important to discipline bad servants
translation: 很高兴[Root.GetTitledFirstName]明白制裁坏仆人有多重要

original: When the servant finally came to and started collecting the broken crockery, [From.GetTitledFirstName] couldn't help but comment on what had transpired before [From.GetHerHim]. Apparently, I was not to chastise my own servants, not even when they shamed me in front of guests!
translation: 当仆人终于开始收集破碎的陶器，[From.GetTitledFirstName]忍不住对他们在[From.GetHerHim]之前发生了什么事作评论。显然，我不是来惩罚自己的仆人，甚至当他们在客人面前羞辱我时也不会！

original: Don't you tell me what I might or might not do!
translation: 不要你来告诉我能不能做什么事！

original: 'You did right, chastising your clumsy servant like this. From now on, he will certainly be more careful if he do not wish to have his head hung up on the castle walls!'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] spoke approvingly of me punishing the servant for spilling food.
translation: 「像这样批评你的仆人，你做的很对啊。从现在开始，如果他不希望他的头被挂在城墙上，肯定会多加小心了！」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我惩罚洒出食物的仆人大加赞赏。

original: Glad I have your approval...
translation: 很高兴我有你的赞同……

original: Everyone else ran off to chase the alleged thieves who had stolen the zakat, the money we all had contributed to give to those less fortunate, from our mosque. Instead of following them, I searched through the mosque and discovered the zakat hidden in a niche no one else had thought to look in.
translation: 其他人都跑去追逐偷走了天课的窃贼，那些从我们的清真寺偷走我们贡献给不幸的人的钱的窃贼。我没有跟着他们，而是在清真寺内一个无人问津的角落里发现了失窃的钱。

original: The imam is getting old
translation: 伊玛目老了

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] cravenness led to the zakat and [This.GetTitledFirstName] is very grateful
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的懦弱帮他找到了天课但是[This.GetTitledFirstName]很感激

original: All but [From.GetTitledFirstName] chased after the alleged thieves and I thought [From.GetSheHe] to be a coward. When we finally got back to the mosque, without the zakat, the money collected to help the poor, [From.GetTitledFirstName] triumphantly told us it had been hidden in a niche inside the mosque all along...
translation: 除了[From.GetTitledFirstName]大家都在追赶小偷，我认为[From.GetSheHe]是个懦夫。当我们最终没有找回天课回到清真寺，那些我们收集用于帮助穷人的钱，被[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现藏在清真寺内……

original: My thoughts were shameful, forgive me for thinking them!
translation: 我的想法是可耻的，原谅我的思想！

original: is praised for [This.GetHerHis] cleverness
translation: 因为[This.GetHerHis]智慧而被赞扬

original: I had not really expected anyone to truly care about the missing zakat, at the time it seemed more like an excuse to make as much noise and tumult as possible. I was proven wrong when [From.GetTitledFirstName] shook my hand and thanked me for finding the money.
translation: 我真的没有想到会有人真正关心失踪的天课，当时看起来更像一个吵闹和喧哗的借口。当[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我握手，感谢我找到钱时，我发现我错了。

original: Now the money can help the poor, that's all I ever wanted
translation: 现在这些钱可以帮助穷人，这就是我想要的一切

original: I was one of the first to saddle my horse and chase after the bandits who had stolen the zakat, the money collected to help the poor, from our mosque. When I returned, exhausted and with filthy clothes, I was told the old imam had simply misplaced the zakat.
translation: 我是那些上马追赶天课窃贼的人中的一个，天课来自我们的清真寺，收集来赈济穷人。当我疲惫的回到清真寺，衣衫全是汗臭，我却被告知这仅仅只是老伊玛目放错了天课的位置。

original: My effort was appreciated, at least
translation: 至少我的努力值得赞赏

original: I am content with praying five times a day in my own home but the imam scolds me if I do not show up at least once a day at the mosque for prayers and tells me I should set a better example for my subjects.
translation: 我每天在自己的家里祈祷五次，但是伊玛目责备我说如果我做不到每天至少一次在清真寺祷告，我就没有为我的臣民树立一个好榜样。

original: I will try, may Allah be my witness
translation: 我会努力，愿安拉为我作证

original: There's always something to do in the mosque. The more time I spend there, the more I appreciate the calm and I feel more connected to Allah.
translation: 在清真寺我总是有事情可以做。我把更多时间花在那里，我更加喜欢平静，我觉得与安拉更紧密地联系在一起

original: Let me know if more help is needed
translation: 如果你需要更多的帮助请务必让我知道

original: feels neglected by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 感觉被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]忽视

original: Let me stay here, forever
translation: 让我留在这里，永远

original: Ever since [From.GetTitledFirstName] became engaged in the mosque's different activities, or, rather, started following every order from the imam and wasting time, [From.GetSheHe] has stopped spending time with me.
translation: 自从[From.GetTitledFirstName]更多地参与在清真寺的不同活动，或者换句话说，开始跟随伊玛目的每一个浪费时间的命令，[From.GetSheHe]已停止与我共度时光。

original: Wife, why do you neglect me?
translation: 老婆，你为什么忽视我？

original: Husband, why do you neglect me?
translation: 老公，你为什么忽视我？

original: Father, why do you neglect me?
translation: 父亲，你为什么忽视我？

original: Mother, why do you neglect me?
translation: 母亲，你为什么忽视我？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy with [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s obsession with the mosque
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.GetTitledFirstName]关于清真寺的痴迷并不高兴

original: I have had little time for [From.GetTitledFirstName] since I became engaged in the mosque's different activities and [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy with me neglecting [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 自从我广泛参与清真寺的活动，我几乎没有时间和[From.GetTitledFirstName]在一起。并且[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我忽视了[From.GetHerHim]表示不满。

original: I'm sorry, but it makes me happy!
translation: 对不起，但它使我快乐！

original: I try to follow the five pillars of Islam as best I can, and zakat is one of the most important and best ways to show my commitment to the faith. The few gold coins exacted from me to help the poor in form of zakat is most vital to eliminate inequality and make the world a better place for everyone.
translation: 我试图尽我所能遵循伊斯兰教的五功，天课是展示我献身信仰的最重要和最好的方式。天课要求我支付一些金币来帮助穷人，这对消除不平等、让世界更加美好而言至关重要。

original: I gladly give this
translation: 我愿意付钱

original: The imams are not always easy to deal with. I need to make sure I have their approval and I have both my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] giving me advice on how to earn the imam's approval.
translation: 伊玛目们并不总是容易对付。我需要确保获得他们的认可，我有我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName]给我关于如何获得伊玛目支持的建议。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] suggests I should offer to rebuild the mosque
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]建议我应该重建清真寺

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] suggests I try to scare the imams into submission
translation: [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName]建议我尝试恐吓伊玛目就范

original: Thank Allah in private
translation: 私下感谢安拉

original: My beloved spouse has saved me from the fate of drunkards. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] bless [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我的爱侣把我从醉酒中救了出来。[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]保佑[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]！

original: I'll ask an Imam for advice
translation: 我将请教一位伊玛目的意见

original: Why am I sick, [GetFromRelation], is [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] punishing me? I haven't done anything wrong, have I?
translation: 我为什么生病了，[GetFromRelation]，难道[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]在惩罚我？我没有做错什么，对吧？

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is very sick. [From.GetSheHe] is delirious and have started asking if [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is punishing [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]病得很重。[From.GetSheHe]神志不清，[From.GetHerHim]已经开始怀疑[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]在惩罚[From.GetHerHim]。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will cure you!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]会治好你！

original: If I need to be cured, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will cure me
translation: 如果我需要治愈，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]会治好我

original: The wine from last night did not agree with me, I woke up with a terrible hangover this morning. Now the imam is chanting again, and I keep falling asleep during the sajdah here in the mosque.
translation: 昨天晚上的酒不适合我，我早上起来宿醉未醒。现在伊玛目在诵经，可是我要在清真寺里睡着了。

original: I can't... keep my... eyes... open...
translation: 我的……眼睛……要……睁不开了……

original: Apologise, and pray some more
translation: 道歉，多多祈祷

original: The imams can be a bit irritable and after my latest blunder I feel the need to be extra careful around them. Too bad I cannot really rely on myself when I am stressed to be anything else but blunt.
translation: 伊玛目可能比较在意我最近的失误，我觉得需要格外小心。可惜我压力越大越心直口快，这种时候真的不能依靠自己。

original: appreciates your trust in [This.GetHerHim]
translation: 感谢您对[This.GetHerHim]的信任

original: The more stressed [From.GetTitledFirstName] gets, the more blunt and outspoken [From.GetSheHe] becomes. There have been rumors about what happened the last time the imams visited us, and none of us who experienced the awkwardness and rage of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are keen to watch that happen again.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]受到越多的压力，[From.GetSheHe]就变得更直率和直言不讳。现在有不少谣言在传关于上次伊玛目们拜访我们的事情，经历过[From.GetTitledFirstName]的尴尬和愤怒之后，我们没有一个人热衷于看到这种事再次发生。

original: Now even the Caliph has heard about my lack of piety! The Caliph's messenger was there to give me a stern speech about my lack of faith and to make sure the bonds between the Caliph and the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church in [Root.Location.GetName] is still strong despite my lack of piety.
translation: 现在连哈里发都知道我缺乏虔诚！哈里发的信使严厉地指责了我缺乏信仰，并且确保哈里发和[Root.Location.GetName]的[Root.Religion.GetName]教会依然联系紧密而不受我缺乏虔诚影响。

original: I will prove my piety by doubling, nay, tripling the zakat!
translation: 我会努力做双倍，不，三倍的祷课来证明我的虔诚！

original: It seems to me [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] isn't as pious as [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] claims to be. Instead of improving relations with the imams, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] managed to make an utter fool out of [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerselfHimself] and, indirectly, me!
translation: 在我看来[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]并不是像[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe]说的那样尽职。[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]没有帮我和伊玛目们搞好关系，反而成功地表现了[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerselfHimself]傻瓜的一面，间接影响到了我！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] was a bit too harsh when [Root.GetSheHe] chastised me for ruining the relations with the imams! Although, I admit, I should probably have chosen less unconventional ways of assuring their support...
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]责罚我毁了与伊玛目的关系，[Root.GetSheHe]未免有点太苛刻！虽然我承认我本可以选择不那么标新立异的方式去寻求支持的……

original: The lack of piety I have observed in one of the courtiers makes me worried. I wouldn't want to accuse anyone of not being a good Muslim, but if my suspicions are correct then something needs to be done!
translation: 我观察到我的一个廷臣缺乏虔诚，这让我十分担心。我不想说有谁不是好穆斯林，但如果我的怀疑是正确的，那么我就要采取措施！

original: Expose the courtier as not a good Muslim
translation: 揭露那个廷臣不是一个好的穆斯林

original: Faith has never been one of my great strengths, I do believe in Allah but I have trouble accepting all the rituals and demands the imams feel necessary. [From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about this, I hadn't even realized my lack of piety was so noticeable.
translation: 信仰从来就不是我的强项，我相信安拉，但我很难接受伊玛目们觉得有必要遵守的所有的仪式和要求。[From.GetTitledFirstName]就这点当面质问我，我甚至没有意识到我缺乏虔诚是如此引人注目。

original: All those rituals and demands the imams feel necessary to prove one's piety is pure nonsense. Despite my feelings about those unnecessary, empty gestures I have always been careful to not show my lack of piety, but perhaps not careful enough. If I don't pay [From.GetTitledFirstName] fifty gold [From.GetSheHe] will expose my lack of faith to everyone!
translation: 伊玛目们觉得有必要用这些仪式和要求证明自己的虔诚，但我觉得这些纯粹是废话。尽管我对那些多余而空洞的姿态毫无好感，我一直小心不让我表现得缺乏虔诚，但我也许不够细心。如果我不付给[From.GetTitledFirstName] 50 金币[From.GetSheHe]会向所有人揭发我！

original: Talk to the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 和[Root.Religion.GetName]教会谈谈，[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Teach me to be a pious Muslim, [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 教我成为一个虔诚的穆斯林，[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I had two men pleading for my mercy in my court today. Both of them had committed the same crime, stolen an object of minor value - one a bread and the other some rice. The bread stealer was beheaded, the rice thief absolved.
translation: 宫廷里有两个男人向我恳求怜悯。他们都同样犯了偷窃便宜物什的罪行——一个偷面包，另一个偷米。偷面包的被斩首，偷米的免罪。

original: This is my court, I may be as arbitrary as I wish
translation: 这是我的宫廷，我可以肆意妄为

original: [tooltip_text_target.GetFirstName] ponders your judgement: good or bad?
translation: [tooltip_text_target.GetFirstName]思考你的判断正确与否。

original: I witnessed [From.GetTitledFirstName] judge the two men and [From.GetHerHis] verdict made me ponder the matter for several days. Why would [From.GetTitledFirstName] sentence one man to be beheaded and absolve the other when they had committed the same crime?
translation: 我见证了[From.GetTitledFirstName]审判那两人，[From.GetHerHis]判决让我思考了几天。为什么[From.GetTitledFirstName]判决一人被斩首，另一个同罪的人却免刑？

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is too arbitrary
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]太武断了

original: is displeased [Root.GetTitledFirstName] disagrees with [This.GetHerHis] judgement
translation: 不满于[Root.GetTitledFirstName]不同意[This.GetHerHis]判决

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] must be wiser than me
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]要比我聪明

original: is pleased [Root.GetTitledFirstName] agrees with [This.GetHerHis] judgement
translation: 很高兴[Root.GetTitledFirstName]赞同[This.GetHerHis]判决

original: The men, whose similar crimes I judged arbitrarily, gave [From.GetTitledFirstName] something to ponder. I had all but forgotten about it when [From.GetTitledFirstName] finally got the courage to discuss it with me.
translation: 被我专断判罪的那两人让[From.GetTitledFirstName]百思不得其解。当[From.GetTitledFirstName]终于有勇气和我讨论时我完全忘了这回事。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I am a bad person for ruling so arbitrary!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我是个邪恶的统治者，因为我太武断！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thought my judgement to be wiser than [From.GetSheHe] could understand
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]我的判断很明智，[From.GetSheHe] 不能理解

original: A suitable punishment for an infidel...
translation: 一种适用于异教徒的惩罚……

original: I watched, partly horrified, partly filled with admiration, as the infidel was dragged out of the dining hall and into [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison.
translation: 我略带钦佩的看着他被带入[From.GetTitledFirstName]的监狱。

original: The infidel belongs in prison, [This.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 异教徒应该进监狱，[This.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: I was still shaking with rage at the infidel's outrageous words when [From.GetTitledFirstName] took the opportunity to whisper: 'Good work' in my ear.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]在我耳边说「干得好」时，我还在为异教徒的话气得发抖。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] imams are constantly pestering me about religion, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] and money to the zakat. No matter what I do, promise to pray more or read the Qur'an more thoroughly they won't leave me alone!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们经常因为宗教、[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]以及天课等问题纠缠我。无论我做什么，即便我答应更多地祈祷、更完全地阅读古兰经，他们也不肯轻易放过我！

original: Allah, help me be a better Muslim!
translation: 安拉，请帮助我成为一个更好的穆斯林！

original: I find it curious that the [From.Religion.GetName] imams are constantly pestering [From.GetTitledFirstName] no matter what [From.GetSheHe] promises to do or no matter how much money [From.GetSheHe] gives for the zakat.
translation: 我觉得很奇怪，不论[From.GetTitledFirstName]答应什么，无论[From.GetSheHe]捐献多少天课，[From.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们还是经常纠缠[From.GetSheHe]。

original: I don't want to do anything to make the imams upset
translation: 我不想做任何让这些伊玛目们不高兴的事情

original: is discouraged that the [This.Religion.GetName] imams frighten [Root.GetTitledFirstName] so
translation: 为那些[This.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们如此令[Root.GetTitledFirstName]恐惧而感到泄气

original: 'All the [Root.Religion.GetName] imams care about is money. Give them money whenever they come visiting and they will leave you alone for weeks, if not months for fear of being sinful: no imam want to admit to the sin of being greedy.'\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] advised me soundly and I agreed to try it.
translation: 「[Root.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们只关心钱。不论他们何时来拜访都给钱，他们就会让你安静几个星期甚至几个月，因为他们畏惧犯下罪孽：没有伊玛目愿意承认犯下了贪婪的罪行。」\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]给我明智的建议，我决定一试。

original: It's not only the imams who are greedy...
translation: 并不是只有贪婪的伊玛目纠缠我……

original: It seems as if no one wants to help me for fear of upsetting the [Root.Religion.GetName] imams, not even my friend [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 看来由于担心令[Root.Religion.GetName]伊玛目们不安，好像没人愿意帮助我，连我的朋友[From.GetTitledFirstName]也是如此！

original: The pestering imams are getting worse!
translation: 那群缠人的伊玛目们变本加厉了！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] had a great advice for me on how to stop the [Root.Religion.GetName] imams pestering me and [From.GetSheHe] got my undivided attention. The problem, though, was that [From.GetTitledFirstName] wanted payment for [From.GetHerHis] advice!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]有一个好主意，可以帮我摆脱[Root.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们的纠缠，于是我专心听[From.GetSheHe]的话。但是问题在于[From.GetTitledFirstName]想让我为[From.GetHerHis]建议付钱！

original: My advice to [From.GetTitledFirstName] was very simple: just pay the [From.Religion.GetName] imams and they'll stop pestering you for, oh perhaps a few weeks? Though I could have shared this for free I decided to test how much [From.GetTitledFirstName] wanted to be left alone by the [From.Religion.GetName] imams and demanded money for the advice.
translation: 我给[From.GetTitledFirstName]的建议非常简单：只要付钱给[From.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们，他们就会停止纠缠你，至少几个星期内不纠缠你。虽然我可以免费提供这条建议，但是我决定测试下[From.GetTitledFirstName]到底有多想摆脱[From.Religion.GetName]的伊玛目们，并要求用钱来换这条建议。

original: I find religion fascinating, especially when the Qur'an talk of heathens and infidels, and how they shall be struck down!
translation: 我发现宗教非常让我着迷，特别是当古兰经谈到异教徒和无信仰的人，以及应该如何打败他们的时候！

original: My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] always has [From.GetHerHis] nose in the Qur'an, and spends all [From.GetHerHis] time among the imams.
translation: 我可怜的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]总是恨不得把[From.GetHerHis]鼻子贴在古兰经上，并把[From.GetHerHis]所有时间都花在同伊玛目们一起度过上。

original: People are naive fools, laughing, dancing and nodding like puppets to the false tune played by imams. Charlatans all!
translation: 这些人是天真的傻瓜，随着伊玛目们演奏的错误曲调像个木偶一样欢笑，跳舞，点头。都是骗子！

original: The imam's admonishment bored me to tears, then he told my [GetFromRelation] about my cynicism. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried beating it out of me...
translation: 伊玛目的告诫让我听得无聊的眼泪都要掉下来了，接着他告诉我[GetFromRelation]关于我的愤世嫉俗。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]试图把这种想法从我这里赶走……

original: I was shamefully caught in action with a beautiful servant today by [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetBestName]. [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] scolded me and lectured me in the virtues of chastity.
translation: 我同一个漂亮仆人淫乱的的耻辱行为被[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetBestName]抓个正着。[Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]责备我，并向我教授贞洁的美德。

original: I wish I could ignore [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim]
translation: 我希望我可以忽视[Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim]

original: I told the imam about my ambitions and asked if there were anything he could do to help me.
translation: 我把我的抱负告诉伊玛目并问他有什么可以帮助我的。

original: I expressed my views on the whole religion and 'Allah' thing a bit too loud and got into a lot of trouble with an imam because of it.
translation: 我太大声的表达我对于宗教和「安拉」的看法，这让我陷入了很大的麻烦，一个伊玛目借此指责我。

original: Allah is dead!
translation: 安拉已死！

original: The imam accused a couple of villagers of blasphemy after he heard them take Allah's name in vain. The blacksmith did it when he hit his thumb with the hammer, the stablemaster when a horse kicked him and the cook when a rat fell into the stew.
translation: 伊玛目指控几名村民亵渎，他听到他们在无意义的时候提到了安拉的名字，比如铁匠在锤子敲到他的拇指的时候，马夫在一匹马踢他的时候，还有厨子在一只老鼠掉进炖肉的时候。

original: My subjects does not like the new impaling punishment and, led by the imams, show their umbrage by throwing rotten vegetables at me!
translation: 我的臣民不喜欢新的钉死在木桩上的惩罚措施，他们在伊玛目们的带领下通过向我投掷腐烂的蔬菜来表达他们的愤怒！

original: Vegetables won't stop me!
translation: 蔬菜阻止不了我！

original: I am speaking in tongues, screaming obscenities at random times, most often when the imam is talking and am sometimes lying on the ground writhing in apparent pain. I seldom remember these things and people believe me to be possessed.
translation: 我满口胡言，不分时刻突然就会尖叫着说肮脏淫秽的话，尤其当伊玛目讲话的时候，有时甚至会躺在地面痛苦地扭动着。我很少记得这一切发生过，人们都认为我被恶魔附身了。

original: Begone, foul djinn!
translation: 滚开，肮脏的精灵！

original: By reciting The Throne Verse from the Qur'an and invoking Allah's help the imam managed to repair the damage in me caused by sihr or witchcraft. To be on the safe side, we also recited together the three last suras from the Qur'an: Surat al-Ikhlas (The Fidelity), Surat al-Falaq (The Dawn) and Surat al-Nas (Mankind).
translation: 我们背诵《古兰经》中的宝座经文，祈求安拉帮助伊玛目修复我被魔法或者巫术造成的伤害。以防万一，我们又背诵了《古兰经》的最后三节：忠诚章、曙光章和世人章。

original: Once again, to be on the safe side...
translation: 以防万一，再来一次……

original: The cook had prepared a magnificent meal, with lots of different fruits, various kinds of meat, plenty of freshly baked bread and several mature cheeses.
translation: 厨子准备了一顿了不起的饭菜，有很多不同的水果，各种各样的肉，充足的新鲜烤制的面包以及数块熟奶酪。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] help me! I do have a problem!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]帮帮我！我真的有一个问题！

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 为[From.GetTitledFirstName]而感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]

original: May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] have mercy on us!
translation: 伏望[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]垂怜我等！

original: Serving [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] should be our goal in life. How can I do it the best way?
translation: 服侍[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]应该是我们生命的目标。我怎样才能用最好的方法做这件事呢？

original: Only Allah decides over life and death
translation: 只有安拉可以决定生死

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [Root.GetMyMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 为[Root.GetMyMarshalName][Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]而感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]

original: Reward my [Root.GetMyChancellorName]!
translation: 奖励我的[Root.GetMyChancellorName]！

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 为[Root.GetMyChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]而感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]

original: Reward my [Root.GetMySpymasterName]!
translation: 奖励我的[Root.GetMySpymasterName]！

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [Root.GetMySpymasterName] [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 为[Root.GetMySpymasterName][Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]而感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]

original: Reward my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]!
translation: 奖励我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]！

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 为[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]而感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]

original: Allah is merciful!
translation: 仁慈的安拉！

original: I thank Allah for saving me
translation: 感谢安拉拯救了我

original: I am a faithful Muslim, I won't put up with this!
translation: 我是一个虔诚的穆斯林，我不会容忍这件事！

original:
My [Root.GetTitle], word has reached me that your [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] has accused me of heresy! I implore you, as a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] to another devout [Root.Religion.GetName] to believe me when I tell you I am not a heretic!

Your humble [From.GetTitle],
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的[Root.GetTitle]，我听说你的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]指控我为异端！我恳求你，作为一位虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]徒对另一位虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]徒的信任，相信我说的，我不是一个异端！

你谦卑的[From.GetTitle]，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Allah be praised!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], after investigating the heretic further I can assure you that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is a devout [FromFrom.Religion.GetName]. If this mistake recur I will not be as understanding. Make sure the heretic really is a heretic before you falsely accuse anyone.\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，在对那个异端进一步调查之后，我可以保证[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]虔诚地信仰着[FromFrom.Religion.GetName]。如果这种错误再次发生，我就不会这么通情达理了。在你错误地指责别人是异端之前，请确定你说的异端是真正的异端。\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: I thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for saving me!
translation: 感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]拯救了我！

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！

original:
For far too long you have blocked my righteous right to [From.GetPlot]. Recognize my rightful claim and step down peacefully or meet me sword in hand. Rest assure that I have enough supporters to obtain this either way...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 这么久以来阁下一直妨碍我[From.GetPlot]的正当权利。乖乖认同我的正当要求，不要给我挡路，否则就尝尝我手中的剑。放心吧，反正我也有足够多的支持者……\n\n此致，n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Both [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] reentered my castle without any visible wounds. It seemed as if [From.GetTitledFirstName] had refused to duel [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]在重新进入我的城堡的时候身上都看不到伤痕。看起来[From.GetTitledFirstName]似乎拒绝了同[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]决斗。

original: That was sensible of [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: [From.GetHerHim]真是通情达理……

original: 'Atone for thy sins!'\n\nMy subjects do not like the new impaling punishment and, led by the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s, show their umbrage by throwing rotten vegetables at me!
translation: 「弥补你的罪行！」\n\n我的臣民不喜欢新的穿刺刑法，他们在[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的带领下向我投掷腐烂的蔬菜来表达他们的愤怒！

original: My young wife has taken a passion for romantic poetry. She keeps reading any sort of romantic poetry she can get hold of.
translation: 我年轻的妻子开始迷恋浪漫诗歌。她一直在读她能够找到的各种浪漫诗歌。

original: Get her more to read
translation: 给她找更多的诗读

original: These are books created by Shaytan!
translation: 这些是衰旦写的书！

original: I will resist Shaytan's temptations!
translation: 我将会抗拒衰旦的诱惑！

original:
My lord, your [Root.GetMyChancellorName] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] tried to encourage me to turn against my liege [From.Liege.GetTitledName]! This shameless act can not go unpunished and to stop further interference I have thus decided to imprison your [Root.GetMyChancellorName] for an indefinite period of time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
阁下，你的[Root.GetChancellorName][FromFrom.GetTitledName]试图怂恿我背叛我的领主[From.Liege.GetTitledName]！这种不光彩的行为必须得到惩罚，为了避免更大的影响，我已经决定无限期地关押[Root.GetMyChancellorName]

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Outrageous!
translation: 无法容忍！

original: Let the guests suffer!
translation: 让客人们忍着吧！

original: May Allah have mercy on my soul
translation: 愿安拉垂怜我的灵魂

original: Oh no! A history lesson!
translation: 哦不！一堂历史课！

original: Ask my guardian about Allah
translation: 向我的卫兵询问关于安拉的问题

original: [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] is questioned about Allah
translation: [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]被问及关于安拉的问题

original: It is all part of Allah's plan
translation: 这都是安拉的安排

original: Give the money to the poor and Allah will see your goodness
translation: 把钱捐给穷人，安拉就会看到你的善行

original: Ask for Allah's help with our childless marriage
translation: 因为我们少子的婚姻而向安拉寻求帮助

original: The excesses of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty have gone too far. A dynamic warrior clan has taken up arms and is riding to purify the realm of our decadence!
translation: [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的暴行太过分了。一个活跃的战士部族已经拿起武器，开始净化领地中的腐败堕落！

original: Allah be Merciful!
translation: 仁慈的安拉！

original: Attacking fellow $RELIGION$: §R$VALUE$§!
translation: 攻击同样信仰$RELIGION$的同伴：§R$VALUE$§!

original: §Y$NUM$§! Mosques in Demesne: §G+$VALUE$§!
translation: 领地内有 §Y$NUM$§! 座清真寺：§G+$VALUE$§!

original: §RWhile attacking a fellow [Recipient.Religion.GetName] [Recipient.Religion.GetGroupName], we will lose §Y$PIETY$§R Piety per month!§!
translation: §R因为攻击同样信仰[Recipient.Religion.GetName]的[Recipient.Religion.GetGroupName]同胞，我们每个月会失去 §Y$PIETY$§R 虔诚！§!

original: Go on Hajj to Mecca
translation: 去麦加朝圣

original: Going on a pilgrimage to Mecca is one of the pillars of Islam, and this is something every able-bodied Muslim is expected to do once in their life. Decadent characters will get rid of the trait.
translation: 去麦加朝圣是伊斯兰教的五功之一，这是每个身体健全的穆斯林一生中必做的事情。

original: I will give voluntarily of my wealth and hope Allah and the Caliph will hear of my piety
translation: 我将会自愿的捐献我的财富，希望安拉和哈里发会知悉我的虔诚

original: The Caliph will hear of my charity, my sins will be forgiven and my piety increased
translation: 哈里发会知悉我的慷慨，我的罪孽得到赦免，虔诚增加了

original: The sadaqah, the voluntarily charity [From.GetTitledFirstName] so generously have given to the poor to help eliminate inequality and help those who have less than [From.GetSheHe] is commendable!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]如此慷慨地施济（自愿捐助）穷人以消除世间的不平等，帮助比[From.GetSheHe]困乏的人，值得赞扬！

original: Allah will forgive [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s sins
translation: 安拉会赦免[From.GetTitledFirstName]的罪行

original: will hear of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s praise
translation: 会听到[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的赞赏

original: The [Root.Religion.GetName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has heard of me giving Sadaqah, and sends [From.GetHerHis] blessings!
translation: 这位[Root.Religion.GetName][From.GetTitledFirstName]听说了我的施济，并且送来了[From.GetHerHis]祝福！

original: I am deeply honored...
translation: 我为此感到深深地自豪……

original: The glance was intentional lascivious and the [Root.GetManWomanOpp] did not hide [Root.GetHerHisOpp] appreciation, nor hide [Root.GetHerHisOpp] lustful thoughts and invited me to join [Root.GetHerHimOpp]...
translation: 眼神明确而淫荡，这个[Root.GetManWomanOpp]没有掩饰[Root.GetHerHisOpp]欣赏，也没有掩饰[Root.GetHerHisOpp]淫荡想法，并邀请我加入[Root.GetHerHimOpp]……

original: Follow [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to [Root.GetHerHisOpp] chambers...
translation: 跟[Root.GetHerHimOpp]去[Root.GetHerHisOpp]寝室……

original: It is forbidden!
translation: 不行！

original: The pleasures of life, or the pleasures of the after-life? Everything one longs for in this world, will be there in the Garden, Jannah. But life shouldn't be dull, without flavour or pleasures! This is a true dilemma...
translation: 该选择尘世的快乐，还是后世的快乐？一切曾经存在于这个世界的事物都将去往天园。但是生活不应该是无趣无味的！这真让人为难……

original: I live life in the moment
translation: 我活在当下

original: Find true beauty and pleasure through poetry instead
translation: 通过诗歌来寻求真正的美和快乐

original: An abundance of food, wine and good company, the hedonism lifestyle seems to make me forget the grey world outside and I indulge in everything...
translation: 充足的食物，酒水和要好的朋友，享乐主义的生活方式似乎使我忘记了外面的灰色世界，我沉迷在每一件事物上……

original: ...but I feel empty inside, there's no creativity in hedonism
translation: ……但是我内心感到空虚，享乐主义没有新意

original: This is the life for me!
translation: 这就是我想要的生活！

original: has decided what [Root.GetHerHis] lifestyle will be
translation: 已经决定[Root.GetHerHis]生活方式将是什么样的

original: I have had enough, hedonism is not the lifestyle for me
translation: 我已经享受够了，享乐主义不是我的生活方式

original: There's inspiration to get from everything, from the breakfast I devour to the sight of sunlight illuminating the flowers in my garden, from the works of Imru' al-Qais or The Story of Bayad and Riyad.
translation: 任何事物中都能获得启迪，我面对照耀着园林中鲜花的阳光进食早餐，与乌姆鲁勒 盖斯的诗句和利雅得圣训给我的启迪是一样的。

original: I have tired of this! Let me enjoy the pleasures of life instead
translation: 我已经厌倦了这些！我受够了！让我享受生活的乐趣！

original: I have found my calling
translation: 我找到了我想要的！

original: Poetry speaks to [Root.GetTitledFirstName] as nothing else has done before
translation: 从未有别的什么像诗歌一样触动[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Poetry is nice, but perhaps I will find something better
translation: 诗歌很美妙，但也许我会找到更好的东西

original: It is the most important decision in my life. I truly enjoy all the pleasure hedonism brings me and its rules, to only do what pleasures you the most, is one I gladly follow.
translation: 这是我生命中最重要的决定。我享受着享乐主义带给我的所有乐趣，愿意遵循追求极乐的信条。

original: I am a hedonist
translation: 我是一个享乐主义者

original: Hedonism is not a lifestyle I seek to pursue for ever...
translation: 享乐主义并不是我永远追求的生活方式……

original: The poetic lifestyle awaits me, if I truly believe it is the one lifestyle for me. I have learnt more about my people's traditions, life and culture by immersing myself in reading and writing poetry.
translation: 如果我真的相信诗歌就是我的生活方式，它就在前方等待着我。我通过沉浸在阅读和写诗中学习了许多人民的传统、生活和文化的知识。

original: I am a poet!
translation: 我是一个诗人！

original: Poetry is not a lifestyle I seek to pursue for ever...
translation: 诗歌并不是我永远追求的生活方式……

original: We started early, when the sun had barely risen above the horizon. Game was plentiful, no hunter returned without a hare or fowl tied to their saddle.
translation: 我们早早就出发了，太阳刚刚从地平线升起。狩猎收获颇丰，返回的时候每个人的马鞍上都挂着至少一只野兔或者野鸡。

original: I am not the most martial of rulers and sometimes it appears as if I am almost incompetent when it comes to handling the sword. Luckily, I know how to manipulate people...
translation: 我不是最有军事才能的统治者，有时我甚至不能很好地操控刀剑。幸运的是，我知道如何用人……

original: This will turn [From.GetHerHim] into a great master of the sword!
translation: 这会使[From.GetHerHim]成为刀剑大师！

original: Whenever we play, me in the middle most times, there's one child who instead of joining us laughing as loud and as much as we do goes away to read under the shadow of a tree or near the flaming fireplace. Why read dusty, boring old books when you could play with swords or dolls or catch frogs in the pond?
translation: 儿童玩耍的时光，总是有一个孩子不是像我们一样大声地笑起来，而是不合群地待在大树的阴影下或燃烧的壁炉旁。当你可以玩剑和玩偶或者在池塘里捕捉青蛙时，为什么要阅读积灰又无聊的旧书呢？

original: Following [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s will is more important than anything else. I have gained the Zealous trait.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的意志比什么都重要。我获得了狂热特质。

original: I caught my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] lying to me again, straight to my face without batting an eye. I almost had an innocent servant sent to the stocks!
translation: 我发现我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]再次面不改色地向我撒谎，连眼睛都不眨一下。我差点把一个无辜的仆人送去看库房！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be well soon, there's no need for a doctor!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]很快就会痊愈，没有必要去请医生！

original: Due to your recent charity work on behalf of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], one of [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] vassals has become impressed with [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] great generosity.
translation: 由于你最近代表[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]做的施济，[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]一个封臣深深地被[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]慷慨所打动。

original: Excellent.
translation: 很好。

original: The [From.GetJobTitle] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been performing charity in [From.Location.GetName], donating alms and food to those in need. The local peasants have benefitted greatly from the [From.Host.GetTitle]'s generosity.
translation: [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.GetJobTitle]在[From.Location.GetName]行善，提供一些捐赠和食物给有需要的人。当地的农民因[From.Host.GetTitle]的慷慨而获益。

original: Perhaps there is still some good in this world.
translation: 也许这个世界上仍然有好人存在。

original: Your [FromFrom.GetJobTitle], [FromFrom.GetTitledName], reports that [From.GetTitledName] has been humbled by your endless generosity to the poor in [From.Location.GetName]. The peasants are singing your name!
translation: 你的[FromFrom.GetJobTitle]，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]，报告[From.Location.GetName]人民感恩于[From.GetTitledName]对穷人的无尽慷慨。人民歌颂着你的名字！

original: A job well done!
translation: 干得好！

original: It seems your selfless charity work in [Root.Location.GetName] has attracted a little too much attention. Before you know it, you are surrounded by a huge crowd of hungry and desperate beggars who claw at your robes, pleading for food.
translation: 你在[Root.Location.GetName]进行的无私的施济似乎引起了过多的关注。你还没来得及意识到这点，就被大群饥饿和绝望的乞丐所包围，他们抓着你的长袍乞求食物。

original: By the Prophet, let me through!
translation: 以先知的名义，让我过去！

original: Before the beggars have a chance to completely envelop you, you cut a swath through the crowd by madly swinging your staff around. You manage to land several solid blows on an old woman with your staff, knocking her few remaining teeth out, and an expertly aimed kick at a malnourished farmer leaves him with a broken nose. The crowd scatters.
translation: 在乞丐们完全包围你之前，你疯狂地挥舞你的手杖，从人群中杀出一条血路。你用你的手杖重击了一个老女人，把她仅存的几颗牙齿打掉，并如专家般精准地踢断一个营养不良的农民的鼻梁。人群散开了。

original: Well, I was told to give generously to the people...
translation: 好吧，我被告知要慷慨地向人们施舍……

original: When you finally emerge into daylight again after pushing your way through the desperate crowd, you do so covered in bruises and with your robe in tatters.
translation: 在你终于从绝望的人群中挤出来重见光明的时候，你鼻青脸肿，长袍变成了碎布条。

original: They could have killed me!
translation: 他们差点杀了我！

original: Your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledName], was cornered by a desperate crowd of beggars in [From.Location.GetName] and has been seriously wounded while giving alms to the poor in your name. Charity can be dangerous work.
translation: 你的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]，在[From.Location.GetName]以你的名义施舍穷人时，被一群绝望的乞丐逼到角落严重受伤。施舍穷人真是一项危险的工作！

original: So it would seem.
translation: 确实如此。

original: Your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledName], who was performing charity work in your name, made the ultimate sacrifice when [From.GetSheHe] was cornered by a desperate crowd of beggars in [From.Location.GetName] and trampled to death.
translation: 你的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]，[From.GetSheHe]在[From.Location.GetName]以你的名义施舍穷人时，被一群绝望的乞丐逼到角落，遭受践踏而最终牺牲。

original: Ingrates!
translation: 忘恩负义的人！

original: As I draw my last breath I remember the tournament. Alas, my death will set stop for the festivities and I grieve for myself, to think I will never be allowed to see brave knights fight for glory!
translation: 当我咽下最后一口气时我想起了比武大会。唉，我死后比武大会将被迫终止，我为自己伤心，我永远也看不到勇敢的骑士为荣耀竞争了！

original: I hope my subjects will remember me as a benevolent ruler
translation: 我希望能作为一个乐善好施的统治者被臣民铭记

original: Your vassals will be informed of your untimely death
translation: 你的封臣知晓了你的英年早逝

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], due to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s untimely death the tournament unfortunately has been cancelled.

Signed, 
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，由于[From.GetTitledFirstName]过早的死亡，比武大会不幸地被取消了。

此致，
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: And I had so looked forward to this!
translation: 我本来还盼着这个！

original: The storyteller told the tale about the Wild Hunt. The story gave me shivers but the drink made me brave, so instead of sleeping in the tavern I made my way to the castle. I regretted it when the black, huge and hideous huntsmen riding on black horses, with black dogs by their side started chasing me. I screamed and ran for my life, until I heard the huntsmen break out in laughter.
translation: 说书人讲述了狂猎的故事。这个故事让我感到不安，但是酒精让我变得勇敢，所以我没有留在小酒馆里睡觉，而是回了城堡。当可怕的黑色巨大猎人骑着黑色的马匹，带着黑色的狗开始追逐我时，我后悔了。我尖叫着逃命，直到我听到猎人爆发出笑声。

original: So much of your master's wealth has been squandered on ungrateful and undeserving beggars, but what of you? Have you not toiled enough to improve the lot of thieves and the depraved? Perhaps it would be best if some of that wealth found its way into your own pockets...
translation: 你的主人把财富过多地浪费在不知感恩和不配拥有的乞丐身上，但是你得到了什么？难道为了这些窃贼和堕落的人你还没有辛苦够么？也许把一部分的财富装进你的口袋是最好的办法……

original: Yes, it would only be right.
translation: 对，就该这么做。

original: No, I must not forget my duties.
translation: 不，我不能忘记我的职责。

original: Word has reached you that your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledName], has given in to weakness and helped [From.GetHerselfHimself] to the alms [From.GetSheHe] was meant to distribute amongst the poor.
translation: 有消息说你的[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetTitledName]，输给了自己的弱点，[From.GetSheHe]把本该分给穷人的施舍扒进了[From.GetHerselfHimself]的腰包。

original: Return the gold and all may be forgiven.
translation: 只要还钱一切好说。

original: Off to the dungeons with [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 把[From.GetHerHim]关进地牢！

original: Perform Charity
translation: 施舍

original: Send your [GetMyLordSpiritualName] to perform charity in a county, helping those in need.
translation: 派你的[GetMyLordSpiritualName]到某个省份做些施舍，帮助那些需要帮助的人。

original: Vassal Impressed
translation: 属臣被深深打动

original: The treacherous acts of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] greatly upsets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]背信弃义的行为惹怒了[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] embraces [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.GetHerHis] former rival, in honor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s teachings
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拥抱了[Root.GetHerHis]曾经的对手[From.GetTitledFirstName]，表达对[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]教导的敬意

original:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], your accusations against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] proved to be truthful! The vile schemer is now languishing in my deepest, darkest dungeon.

Your [From.GetTitle]
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，你对[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的指控被证明是真实的！邪恶的阴谋家现在在我阴暗的地牢中备受煎熬。

你的[From.GetTitle]
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Excellent, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 太好了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: I should ask [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to grant me a title.
translation: 我应该向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]寻求授予我一项头衔。

original: Please?
translation: 请？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks [This.GetTitledFirstName] for a title
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]向[This.GetTitledFirstName]要一项头衔

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] promised me a title!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]答应给我一项头衔！

original: It had better not be hollow words...
translation: 这最好不是空话……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to grant me a title!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝给我一项头衔！

original: This will not stand!
translation: 这令人无法忍受！

original: 'You are not ready yet...' was [From.GetTitledFirstName] excuse to refuse grant me a title!
translation: 「你还没有准备好……」，这就是[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝授予我一项头衔的理由！

original: I'll ask again later...
translation: 我过一段时间再向他要……

original: Not again!
translation: 没有下次了！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] must have forgotten [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] promised [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] would grant me a title.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]一定忘了[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]曾经许诺[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]会给我一项头衔。

original: Ask [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] again
translation: 再向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]请求一次

original: is asked once again to grant [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a title.
translation: 又一次被请求授予[Root.GetTitledFirstName]一项头衔。

original: I asked [From.GetTitledFirstName] once again for a fiefdom but [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to give me a title!
translation: 我又一次向[From.GetTitledFirstName]请求授予我一片封地，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝授予我一项头衔！

original: This is an outrage!
translation: 这令人愤怒！

original: It is time for me to get married, or at least betrothed to a suitable match!
translation: 我到了结婚的年龄了，或者至少给我订一门合适的婚姻！

original: is asked to find a spouse for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 要求为[Root.GetTitledFirstName]找一个配偶

original: I shall ask [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] for a suitable spouse!
translation: 我应该向[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]请求找一个合适的配偶！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] had forgotten [From.GetHerHis] promise, and told me [From.GetSheHe] would not help me find a suitable spouse!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]忘记了[From.GetHerHis]诺言，还告诉我[From.GetSheHe]不会帮我找一个合适的配偶！

original: I am still not married nor betrothed! Surely [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has not forgotten about [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] promise to find me a suitable spouse?
translation: 我仍然没有结婚，甚至没有订婚！[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]真的没有忘记[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]帮我找到合适的配偶的诺言么？

original: I must remind [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] about [Root.GetHerHis] promise!
translation: 我必须提醒[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]记起[Root.GetHerHis]诺言！

original: is reminded about [This.GetHerHis] promise about finding a suitable spouse for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 被提醒[This.GetHerHis]关于帮[Root.GetTitledFirstName]找到一个合适的配偶的诺言

original: An arranged marriage has been denied me, I will find me a wife without help!
translation: 我被拒绝安排婚姻，我会自己找一个妻子，不需要帮忙！

original: I'm getting married right now!
translation: 我现在就结婚！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] gets married without [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s consent
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]没有[This.GetTitledFirstName]的同意就结婚了

original: shot [Root.GetTitledFirstName] with an arrow!
translation: 用一支箭射[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: tried to shoot [Root.GetTitledFirstName] with an arrow!
translation: 尝试用一支箭射[Root.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: is grateful for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] help
translation: 对于[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助十分感谢

original: She won't ever touch my doll!
translation: 永远不许她碰我的玩偶！

original: [From.GetFirstName] was surprised and a bit sceptical when I asked [From.GetHerHim] if [From.GetSheHe] wanted to borrow my toy sword, but when I insisted [From.GetFirstName] took it and then started chasing me, pretending I was a beast [From.GetSheHe] must slay!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]刚开始有点惊讶跟狐疑，当我问 [From.GetHerHim] 是否 [From.GetSheHe] 想要借我的玩具宝剑耍耍，但在我坚持要 [From.GetFirstName]拿着它开始追逐我，就好像我是一头野兽 [From.GetSheHe] 必须诛杀！

original: Roaarrr! Are we friends now?
translation: 哦！我们现在是朋友了么？

original: It is an excellent idea!
translation: 这是一个非常好的主意！

original: The assassination attempt fails
translation: 暗杀的企图失败了

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is angry at [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.GetTitledFirstName]感到愤怒

original: is reprimanded by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 受到[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的严惩

original: A letter is sent to [This.GetTitledFirstName], telling [This.GetHerHim] about the helpful noble
translation: 一封信送至[This.GetTitledFirstName]处，告诉[This.GetHerHim]对其有帮助的贵族的事情

original: Because it's you who asks, I'll get rid of it
translation: 因为是你要求的，我会扔掉它

original: is inspired by the diligence of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的勤奋所激励

original: I am not happy with the way things are. I have lost the §YContent§! trait.
translation: 我不喜欢这些东西的样子。我失去了§Y安于现状§!特质。

original: It is a dire decision, to ask the Chief Qadi to grant me divorce from my husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. I must be certain this is what I want before I make this decision...
translation: 请求首席教法官许可我与我的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]离婚是一个可怕的决定。在我做出决定之前我必须确定这就是我想要的……

original: I have decided!
translation: 我已经决定了！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] asks the Chief Qadi [This.GetTitledFirstName] for a divorce
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]请求首席教法官[This.GetTitledFirstName]许可离婚

original: I cannot make this decision now...
translation: 我现在不能做出这个决定……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me to ask to be granted a divorce from her husband [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. I reminded [From.GetTitledFirstName] about the iddah period, the month she would have to wait before the divorce came through, and asked if her husband [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] would demand compensation and the return of the mahr, the wedding gift her husband gave her when they married.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我寻求与她的丈夫[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]离婚的许可。我提醒[From.GetTitledFirstName]关于待婚期的事情，这一个月后她才可以成功地离婚，并问如果她的丈夫[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]要求赔偿并且返还聘礼（婚礼时丈夫送的礼物）她该怎么办。

original: If you have no regrets after a month, you may be divorced
translation: 如果你在一个月以后不后悔，你就可以离婚

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] grants [This.GetTitledFirstName] her desired divorce
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]许可了[This.GetTitledFirstName]想要的离婚

original: No, I cannot justify granting you a divorce
translation: 不，我不能许可你离婚

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] denies [This.GetTitledFirstName] the divorce
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的离婚

original: The Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me what if my husband [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] demanded compensation and the return of my mahr, the gift he gave me at the wedding and told me what would happen to any child of our union. [From.GetSheHeCap] also told me I must wait a month, the iddah period, before I could be divorced or, if I was pregnant, until the child was born.
translation: 首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]问我，如果我的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]要求赔偿并且返还聘礼（婚礼时丈夫送的礼物）该怎么办，我们的孩子会怎样。[From.GetSheHeCap]还告诉我，我必须等一个月待婚期才能离婚，如果我怀孕，还要等到孩子出生。

original: A month I must wait, then
translation: 那么，我就必须等上一个月了

original: Until this child is born, then
translation: 那么，就等这个孩子生下来

original: I have changed my mind, I don't want the divorce!
translation: 我改变想法了，我不想离婚！

original: The Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not grant me a divorce and told me that from what I told [From.GetHerHim] [From.GetSheHe] saw no reason to grant me a divorce from [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]还是没答应我的离婚请求，还告诉我，从我告诉[From.GetHerHim]的事看[From.GetSheHe]认为没有任何理由和[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]离婚。

original: I must accept this marriage then
translation: 那我就必须接受这场婚姻

original: The iddah period has gone and if I am truly certain I want a divorce from [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] I will have it.
translation: 待婚期结束了，如果我真的确定我想要同[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]离婚，我就可以如愿了。

original: Yes! I am no longer married to [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 好的！我同[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]离婚了！

original: During the iddah period I have changed my mind, I don't want a divorce
translation: 在待婚期中我改变了想法，我不想离婚

original: My wife [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has gone to Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] and asked for a divorce! If she still wants it after the iddah period, a month, then our marriage will be no more...
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]已经找到首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]并要求离婚！如果在待婚期一个月结束之后她仍然想要离婚，那么我们的婚姻就结束了……

original: If that's what she wants...
translation: 如果这是她想要的……

original: NO! I won't allow it!
translation: 不！我不会允许的！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to stop [This.GetTitledFirstName] from getting the divorce
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]试图阻止[This.GetTitledFirstName]同他离婚

original: I was on my way home, thinking of ways to tell my husband [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I had asked the Chief Qadi for a divorce, when [From.GetTitledFirstName] caught up with me and asked me why I wanted a divorce! I told [From.GetTitledFirstName] my reasons and [From.GetSheHe] pleaded that I should reconsider, told me he did not want me to divorce [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: 回家路上我还在想怎么告诉我的丈夫[From.GetTitledFirstName]我要求离婚的事情，这时[From.GetTitledFirstName]追上我，问我为什么要离婚！我告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]我的理由，[From.GetSheHe]恳请我慎重考虑，告诉我他不想让我与[From.GetHerHim]离婚……

original: No, I don't want to be married to you, I want that divorce!
translation: 不，我不想再同你生活下去了，我想要离婚！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will not change her mind about the divorce
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不会改变她关于离婚的想法

original: Fine, but then things are going to have to change!
translation: 好吧，但是不离婚你就要做出改变！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decides to stay with [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定继续同[This.GetTitledFirstName]的婚姻

original: I pleaded with [From.GetTitledFirstName], promised her all she would want if only she wouldn't leave me! She told me about her reasons and I told her I would change, that I would do anything, anything!
translation: 我向[From.GetTitledFirstName]恳求，许诺给她想要的所有东西，只要她不离开我！她告诉我她想要离婚的原因，我告诉她我会做出改变，我会做任何事，任何事！

original: But [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not change her mind
translation: 但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]没有改变她的想法

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] promised not to leave me!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]答应不离开我！

original: I grow more worried for every day no Chief Qadi has been selected. It is as if [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] does not care if just judgement is brought to those who deserve it!
translation: 因为仍然没有选出新的首席教法官，我一天比一天焦虑。[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]好像并不关心那些应该得到公正判决的人是不是真的得到了公正的判决！

original: I should suggest one of my courtiers!
translation: 我应该推荐我的一个廷臣！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] suggests a suitable person for the post of Chief Qadi
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]推荐一个合适的人选来做首席教法官

original: I would be the best candidate!
translation: 我就是最佳的人选！

original: One of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s vassals would be most suitable
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一位封臣会更合适

original: Surely [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] already knows the best person for Chief Qadi
translation: 显然[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]已经知道做首席教法官的最佳人选

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] worries that the people of my realm lacks just judgement when I still haven't chosen a Chief Qadi to take care of all legal matters. To ease [From.GetHerHis] worry, [From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and suggested someone who [From.GetSheHe] believe would make an excellent Chief Qadi.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]担心我的王国里的人民缺乏公正的判决，因为我仍然没有选出一位首席教法官来处理一切法律事务。为了减轻[From.GetHerHis]担忧，[From.GetTitledFirstName]来见我并提出了一个[From.GetSheHe]认为适合担任首席教法官的人选。

original: Yes, that courtier would be perfect
translation: 是的，那个廷臣是完美的人选

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] accepts [This.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.GetHerHis] new Chief Qadi
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]接受[This.GetTitledFirstName]做[Root.GetHerHis]新首席教法官

original: No, he won't do
translation: 不，不能让他做

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dismisses [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s candidate
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]驳回了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的提名

original: Yes, [From.GetTitledFirstName], you would be a perfect Chief Qadi!
translation: 是的，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，你将成为一名出色的首席教法官！

original: is granted the title of Chief Qadi
translation: 被授予首席教法官的头衔

original: No, I will not grant you the title of Chief Qadi
translation: 不，我不会授予你首席教法官的头衔

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refuses to make [This.GetTitledFirstName] Chief Qadi
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝让[This.GetTitledFirstName]来做首席教法官

original: I agree, he would make an excellent Chief Qadi
translation: 我同意，他会成为一名出色的首席教法官

original: No, he will not become Chief Qadi
translation: 不，他不会成为首席教法官

original: I had no idea [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] would suggest me as [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s new Chief Qadi! The letter congratulating me to my new position and the order to appear before [From.GetTitledFirstName] as soon as possible was bewildering, I almost did not believe it at first.
translation: 人呐就都不知道，自己不可以预料，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]怎么就提名我当[From.GetTitledFirstName]的新任首席教法执行官了呢！任职信恭贺我的高升，并要求我立即觐见[From.GetTitledFirstName]，这真是让人意外，刚开始我压根都没信。

original: Thank you, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 谢谢你，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: The new Chief Qadi, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], thanks [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 新的首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]对[This.GetTitledFirstName]表示感谢

original: I suggested that [target_suggested_qadi.GetTitledFirstName] would be [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s new Chief Qadi and waited with bated breath as [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] pondered this.
translation: 我建议[target_suggested_qadi.GetTitledFirstName]应当成为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的新任首席教法执行官，摒息以待让[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]好好考虑一下。

original: [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap] accepted my candidate as Chief Qadi!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap]同意我推荐的人成为首席教法官！

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my suggestion...
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了我的建议……

original: It felt preposterous, almost insulting, to suggest myself as the new Chief Qadi for [From.GetTitledFirstName] but there were no better candidate I could have thought of than myself.
translation: 推荐我自己成为[From.GetTitledFirstName]的首席教法官有些荒谬和可耻，但是我想不出比我更合适的人选了。

original: I am the new Chief Qadi! Fear my justice!
translation: 我是新任首席教法官！法律至上！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not want me as Chief Qadi
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不想让我来做首席教法官

original: I imagined a situation which became more and more intimidating, with an outcome that could mean life or death. I swallowed hard and decided that I would...
translation: 我想象中的情况变得越来越糟糕，这将决定我的生死。我艰难地吞下口水并决定……

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s choice for the Chief Qadi position is disastrous! The [bad_qadi.GetManWoman]'s judgement is severely distorted and there will be no justice as long as [bad_qadi.GetSheHe] holds the post!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]选择的首席教法官愚蠢透顶！这[bad_qadi.GetManWoman]的判决毫无道理，只要[bad_qadi.GetSheHe]还握有此职位就没有正义可言！

original: Even this courtier would be better as Chief Qadi!
translation: 甚至就连这名廷臣都更适合做首席教法官！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] suggests a more suitable person for the post of Chief Qadi
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]推荐了一个更适合做首席教法官的人选

original: Why, even I would make a better Chief Qadi!
translation: 为什么，我都更适合担任首席教法官！

original: I know a vassal of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] who would be better
translation: 我认为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一名封臣是更加适合的人选

original: Quench my anger and do nothing
translation: 抑制我的愤怒，什么也不做

original: Fuming with anger at what [From.GetTitledFirstName] called 'another disastrous judgement of your Chief Qadi!', [From.GetTitledFirstName] suggested I would choose another person for the very important position as Chief Qadi.
translation: 首席教法官又一次作出[From.GetTitledFirstName]所说的「灾难性的错误判决」，这使我十分恼火，[From.GetTitledFirstName]建议我应该另选一个人来担任首席教法官这个重要职务。

original: You are right, your courtier would be a better choice
translation: 你是对的，你的廷臣是更适合的人选

original: The former Chief Qadi, [This.GetTitledFirstName], is dismissed from the position
translation: 前任首席教法官[This.GetTitledFirstName]被撤职了

original: The new Chief Qadi is [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 新任首席首席教法官是[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I see no reason to dismiss the current Chief Qadi
translation: 我看不出有任何撤换现任首席教法官的理由

original: is disappointed [Root.GetTitledFirstName] did not follow [This.GetHerHis] recommendation for Chief Qadi
translation: 很失望[Root.GetTitledFirstName]没有接受[This.GetHerHis]建议人选来做首席教法官

original: I agree, [target_suggested_qadi.GetTitledName] would make a better Chief Qadi
translation: 我赞同，[target_suggested_qadi.GetTitledName]能够成为更好的首席教法官

original: This vassal of mine would make a better Chief Qadi
translation: 我的这名封臣更适合担任首席教法官

original: The current Chief Qadi is such a disastrous choice, with [bad_qadi.GetHerHis] arbitrary judgements and insufficient knowledge of the laws, that I had to suggest a new candidate for this position. [From.GetTitledFirstName] would make a much better Chief Qadi and so I told [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and waited with bated breath as [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] pondered this.
translation: 当前教法官的选择真是失误，[bad_qadi.GetHerHis]武断的判决和法律知识的匮乏，让我不得不重新考虑新的人选。[From.GetTitledFirstName]会是一个好的选择，所以我告诉了[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]并屏息等待[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]考虑。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is the new Chief Qadi! Praise Allah!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是新任首席教法官！赞美安拉！

original: I was dismissed and told not to interfere in this matter again
translation: 我的建议被驳回，并被告之不要再参与这类事务

original: I inadvertently insulted the old Chief Qadi when I suggested that I would make better judgements than [bad_qadi.GetHerHim] and knew the laws much better than [bad_qadi.GetHerHim], but I saw no other way to get rid of [bad_qadi.GetHerHim].
