After all, it was [From.GetTitledFirstName] who would judge if I was a better person for the position than the hopefully soon former Chief Qadi.
translation: 我无意中侮辱了老教法官，因为我觉得我会做出比[bad_qadi.GetHerHim]更好的判罚，我的法律知识比也[bad_qadi.GetHerHim]更丰富，但我现在没有其他办法除掉[bad_qadi.GetHerHim]。毕竟，[From.GetTitledFirstName]才能决定是否有更合适的人选来取代这位马上就会变成前任的首席教法官。

original: May [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] be hit with sixty shoes! That son of a dog coaxed [From.GetTitledFirstName] into revoking my title as Chief Qadi!
translation: 愿[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]被六十只鞋子打！那个狗崽子哄骗[From.GetTitledFirstName]撤销了我的首席教法官的头衔！

original: May Allah destroy [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s house!
translation: 愿安拉摧毁[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的家族！

original: The Qur'an says: 'O you who believe! Intoxicants and games of chance and sacrificing to stones set up and dividing by arrows are only an uncleanness, the Shaitan's work, shun it therefore that you may be successful.' It is said that those who indulge in wine and other intoxicants will be punished by eighty lashes so they may know the wrongness of their path.
translation: 古兰经上说：「信道的人们啊！饮酒、赌博、拜像、求签，只是一种秽行，只是恶魔的行为，故当远离，以便你们成功。」上面说那些沉湎于酒精和其他麻醉品的人将被责以八十下鞭笞，这样他们就会知道这样做是不对的。

original: Eighty lashes for that drunkard!
translation: 抽那些酒鬼八十鞭子！

original: is lashed eighty times by Chief Qadi [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 被首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]抽了八十鞭

original: Show mercy and the drunkard may repent
translation: 宽恕这些酒鬼，他们会悔改的

original: The drunkard [This.GetTitledFirstName] is saved from the eighty lashes by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 这个酒鬼[This.GetTitledFirstName]被[Root.GetTitledFirstName]赦免了八十鞭

original: Do nothing, the drunkard may drink himself to death
translation: 什么都不做，这个酒鬼会把自己喝死的

original: I stumbled drunkenly into Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] who smelled the wine I had drunk on my breath and ordered my arrest. The next day I got my punishment: eighty lashes!
translation: 我酒气朝天地撞见了首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]，他闻见了我嘴里的酒气于是下命令逮捕我。第二天我得到了我的惩罚：八十鞭子！

original: The lashes made me cry out in pain...
translation: 鞭笞让我痛苦地哭喊……

original: I will never drink again, may Allah be my witness!
translation: 安拉在上，我再也不会饮酒了！

original: The wine will take the pain away...
translation: 酒能浇愁……

original: Wine will never again touch my tongue!
translation: 今后我绝对滴酒不沾！

original: The wine was aplenty and when I left my company I was more than unsteady on my feet. I must have drunk enough to become unconscious, for when I woke up it was in Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s room, who told me that if I donated a small sum of money to charity and promised to never drink again [From.GetSheHe] would let me go without punishment.
translation: 酒水充足，当我离开我的同伴的时候我连走路都走不稳了。我一定是喝的太多以至于失去了意识，因为当我醒来的时候我发现自己在首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]的屋子里，他告诉我如果我捐献一小笔金钱，并且承诺今后不再饮酒，[From.GetSheHe]就会放我走而不惩罚我。

original: I promised but all I could think of was a can of wine to cure my headache
translation: 我曾经许下过诺言，但是现在我脑子里想的全是一杯酒能治好我的头痛

original: May Allah be my witness, I promise to never drink again!
translation: 安拉在上，我许诺再也不喝酒了！

original: You have come to share more things than your husband with one of his other wives. The mutual feelings of love and affection that exist between the two of you is something you have simply never felt with [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName].
translation: 你和你的丈夫的一位妻子之间的共同点甚至比你和你的丈夫的共同点更多。你们两人相互之间爱慕的感情是你从来没同[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]感觉到过的。

original: I feel alive again!
translation: 我感觉获得了新生！

original: The most disturbing rumor has come to your attention. It seems two of your wives have sinfully engaged in carnal pleasures with each other! The rest of the household must be laughing at you behind your back... something must be done about this shameful crime.
translation: 你注意到了一条最为令人不安的流言。你的两位妻子似乎陷入了相互之间罪恶的肉体愉悦之中！其他的家庭成员一定在我的背后笑话我……必须做些什么来制止这项罪行。

original: Who am I to stand in the way of love? Just be more discreet.
translation: 我怎么敢阻拦爱情？只要以后谨慎点就行了。

original: This disgraceful behavior ends now!
translation: 立刻停止这种丢脸的行为！

original: They will pay with their lives...
translation: 她们会为此失去生命……

original: Your two sinful wives, possessed by a depraved and unnatural love for each other, have eloped! Try as they might, your guards can't find them anywhere in your palace and a carriage in the courtyard outside has been reported stolen!
translation: 你的两名妻子因为沉湎于相互之间堕落和变态的爱情而犯下罪孽，她们逃走了！你的卫兵们在你的宫殿中尽全力搜索但是一无所获，还发现一辆停在外面院子里的马车被偷走了！

original: Send out riders! Find them!
translation: 派出骑手！找到他们！

original: Leading your scouts forward, you intercept your fleeing wives in their carriage at the edge of a deep ravine. You dismount and approach the carriage, but as you draw near it suddenly takes off towards the ravine. Moments before their horses leap off the edge, you see your wives clasping each other's hands...
translation: 你带着部队向前搜索，终于在一座深谷的边缘找到了你逃走的妻子和她们的马车。你翻身下马走近马车，但是当你接近的时候，马车突然向深谷中倾斜。在她们的马匹掉下悬崖之前，你看到你的两个妻子双手紧扣……

original: NO!!!
I should be first amongst the wives of [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]. That I am not shames us both. For his sake, if not my own, I should act.
translation: 在[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的妻子中，我应该排在第一位。但是事实是我不是，这让我们两人蒙羞。我应该行动起来，这是为他着想而不是为了我自己。

original: Poison [Root.Spouse.Spouse.GetFirstName].
translation: 毒死[Root.Spouse.Spouse.GetFirstName]。

original: Woo [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName].
translation: 纠缠[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]。

original: No, I must accept my station.
translation: 不，我应当接受我的地位。

original: The first of your wives has passed away unexpectedly, with your healers claiming nothing could be done. They suspect poison may be the cause. [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], who is now your new first wife, can barely conceal her elation. As the guards move her belongings into her new quarters, one of them confiscates a suspicious half-empty vial...
translation: 你的第一妻子意外的去世了，医生声称对此没有办法。他们怀疑她死于毒杀。你的新任第一妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]难以抑制她的自得。在卫兵们把她的物品搬入新房间的时候，一名卫兵找到了一个半空的可疑小瓶……

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], my dear wife. Let us bury the past and look to the future!
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，我亲爱的妻子。让我们忘掉过去，眺望未来！

original: Is... is that poison? Guards, move her to the dungeons instead!
translation: 那……那是毒药？卫兵，还是把她扔进地牢吧！

original: Force her to drink the vial's remaining content!
translation: 强迫她喝下瓶子里剩余的东西！

original: It seems one of your husband's lesser wives has tried to poison you in a desperate bid to become his first wife! It was blind luck alone that made you discover this attempt on your life before it was too late.
translation: 你丈夫的一位地位稍低的妻子试图毒死你，这似乎是她想要成为他的第一妻子的一次绝望的赌博！能够在事情变得太晚之前发现这一企图纯粹是你的运气好。

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] must be told of this!
translation: 必须把这件事告诉[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]！

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], the first of your beloved wives, is very upset. She claims to have caught one of your lesser wives in the act of poisoning her food! Evidence uncovered by your household guards seem to verify this claim.
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，你亲爱的第一妻子非常不高兴。她声称她当场抓住了你的一名企图在她食物里投毒的地位较低的妻子！你家中的卫兵发现的证据也证明了这一点。

original: It pains me, but the punishment for this must be death...
translation: 这让我痛苦，但是这件事情的惩罚必须是死亡……

original: Let her contemplate the error of her ways in the dungeons!
translation: 让她在地牢中好好反思她犯下的错误！

original: I can't be fighting all your battles for you, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我不能帮你做所有的事情，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]！

original: I can't fight all your battles for you, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]! Just tell her not to do it again.
translation: 我不能帮你做所有的事情，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]！告诉她不要再这样做就行了。

original: But... but she tried to KILL me!
translation: 但……但是她想要杀死我！

original: One of your beloved wives covets the position of first wife, and has been trying to woo you into elevating her to that status.
translation: 你的一位亲爱的妻子觊觎第一妻子的位置，她一直在向你纠缠让你把她提到那个地位。

original: Yes, she would make a good first wife...
translation: 好的，她会成为一名合格的第一妻子……

original: No. [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is first amongst my wives, now and always.
translation: 不，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]现在是，以后也永远是我的第一妻子。

original: That witch [Root.Spouse.Spouse.GetFirstName] has somehow ensnared [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] with her black magic. She has manipulated him into granting her your rightful position as the first among his wives!
translation: [Root.Spouse.Spouse.GetFirstName]那个婊子不知道用什么黑魔法魅惑了[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]。她操纵他把你的第一妻子的位置授予了她！

original: Quick! Where is the poison?
translation: 快！毒药在哪里？

original: If that is his wish...
translation: 如果那是他的愿望……

original: Tragic news, Master! Your new first wife has passed away, and your healers all agree that poison was the cause. Your former first wife, overcome with jealousy, has made no attempt to hide her guilt in this crime. What should be done with her?
translation: 坏消息，主人！你的新任第一妻子去世了，你的医生都认为毒药是她的死因。你的前任第一妻子，难以抑制心中嫉妒的念头，她并没有试图掩盖她犯下了这样的罪行。应当怎样处理她呢？

original: Release her. She must truly love me!
translation: 释放她。她一定是真的太爱我了！

original: Send the witch to rot in prison!
translation: 把这个婊子关到监狱里让她自行腐烂！

original: As my dear first wife has died, so shall she!
translation: 既然我挚爱的第一妻子已经死了，那么她也要去死！

original: Your charity work in [Root.Location.GetName] goes well. The Prophet (may Allah honor him and grant him peace) would approve of your Master's actions. Perhaps you should send word.
translation: 你在[Root.Location.GetName]的施济工作进行顺利。先知（愿主福安之）会赞许你主人的行为。也许你应该提交一份报告。

original: Make it so!
translation: 就这么做！

original: Your [GetMyLordSpiritualName] reports from [From.Location.GetName] that [From.GetHerHis] charity work on your behalf is proceeding well. The poor have been fed and your pious standing has improved.
translation: 你的[GetMyLordSpiritualName]从[From.Location.GetName]发来消息，[From.GetHerHis]工作进展顺利。得到救济后的穷人对您歌功颂德。

original: We can still do much good, Insha'Allah.
translation: 我们仍然能够做得更好，若主意欲。

original: The [Root.Liege.GetTitle] is informed.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitle]收到通知。

original: Piety Gained
translation: 得到虔诚

original: The infidel dhimmis in [Root.GetName] are now a minority, and most people have embraced [Root.Holder.Religion.GetName] Islam!
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的异教徒齐米（保护民，以伊斯兰教法为基础的国家中信仰其他一神教的人）的人数现在居于少数，绝大多数的人民信仰伊斯兰教[Root.Holder.Religion.GetName]！

original: Allah be Praised!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: The people of §Y[From.GetName]§! have embraced the §Y[From.Holder.Religion.GetName]§! faith!
translation: §Y[From.GetName]§!的人民已经皈依了伊斯兰教§Y[From.Holder.Religion.GetName]§!！

original: Lost Souls!
translation: 迷失的灵魂！

original: Informed you do not agree.
translation: 得知你不同意。

original: So be it!
translation: 就这样吧！

original: There's no way I'll help [From.GetTitledFirstName], I might lose my job!
translation: 我不可能去帮助[From.GetTitledFirstName]，这可能使我失去我的工作！

original: The [Root.Spouse.GetTitle] is wooed.
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetTitle]受到纠缠。

original: Murder attempt discovered!
translation: 发现谋杀企图！

original: Your scouts search for your missing wives.
translation: 你的士兵搜索你失踪的妻子。

original: There have been rumors circling the court that a vassal of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is sleeping with a woman other than his wives. The man cannot be a true Muslim if he has committed zina!
translation: 有宫廷传言说[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一位封臣同不是他妻子的女人上床了。这太可怕了，如果那个男人犯下了通奸罪，那他就不是一个真正的穆斯林！

original: The Chief Qadi would know what to do!
translation: 首席教法官知道该做什么！

original: The Chief Qadi [This.GetTitledFirstName] hears about the man having a lover and committing zina
translation: 首席教法官[This.GetTitledFirstName]听说了这个男人有一个情人并犯下了通奸罪

original: I should confront him myself, make him repent to Allah!
translation: 我应该质问他，让他向安拉忏悔！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronts [This.GetTitledFirstName] about sinning and committing zina
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]质问[This.GetTitledFirstName]关于他犯下通奸罪的事情

original: It is not for me to judge others
translation: 不应当由我来审判其他人

original: To accuse someone of committing zina, having sexual intercourse with another man or woman other than your spouse, is something no one should take lightly. [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me of the rumors circling the court of [From.GetHerHis] liege [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] about a vassal being more than friendly with a woman...
translation: 指控某人犯下通奸罪（即同不是自己配偶的男人或者女人性交），这对每个人来说都不是件小事。[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉了我在[From.GetHerHis]君主[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷中流传的流言，内容是关于一名封臣同一名女性发生了超越友谊的男女关系……

original: Confront the accused one
translation: 质问受到指控的人

original: is accused of committing zina and confronted by Chief Qadi [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 被指控犯下通奸罪，并接受首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的质问

original: If you care so much about this, why don't you confront him yourself?
translation: 既然你这么关心这件事情，你为什么不亲自质问他呢？

original: Chief Qadi [Root.GetTitledFirstName] dismisses [This.GetTitledFirstName] accusations
translation: 首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]驳回了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的指控

original: Don't come to me with rumors only!
translation: 不要仅仅听到流言就来找我！

original: The days with my lover have been the most joyful days of my life but [From.GetTitledFirstName] threatening to bring the whole affair to the Chief Qadi made those few days feel petty and the joy I had felt bedraggled. Committing zina is a sin but I couldn't resist her...
translation: 同我的情人一起度过的几天是我生命中最快乐的几天，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]威胁要把这整件事告诉首席教法官，这使得我在那几天里感到无聊，连我曾经拥有过的快乐也被糟蹋了。通奸是一种罪孽但是我无法抗拒她……

original: Try to bribe [From.GetTitledFirstName] to keep quiet
translation: 尝试用金钱让[From.GetTitledFirstName]闭嘴

original: The money from [Root.GetTitledFirstName] quiets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的金钱使[This.GetTitledFirstName]闭嘴

original: I promise I will never see her again!
translation: 我发誓今后再也不会见她！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s promise convinces [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的誓言说服了[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Our love is sacred, no matter what the Qur'an says!
translation: 不管古兰经怎么说，我们的爱情是神圣的！

original: might go to the Chief Qadi with the matter
translation: 会把这件事情交给首席教法官评判

original: Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] lectured me on the sin of committing zina, but all I could think of was my dear love, waiting for me in our own little hideout.
translation: 首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]教导我通奸罪孽深重，但是我脑海里想的全是我挚爱的情人，正在我们的小小藏身之地等着我。

original: You have no witnesses, only rumors and they are false!
translation: 你没有目击证人，只有几条流言，而且这些流言都是虚假的！

original: is convinced of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] innocence
translation: 确认了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的清白

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] denying the rumors being true only strengthens the Chief Qadi [This.GetTitledFirstName] suspicions
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]声称流言是无中生有的，这只加深了首席教法官[This.GetTitledFirstName]的怀疑

original: Promise to break it up with lover
translation: 发誓断绝同情人的关系

original: believes that when [This.GetSheHe] sees that it is true
translation: 相信[This.GetSheHe]看到的是事实真相

original: I don't deny it and I refuse to do anything about it!
translation: 我不否认，但是我拒绝在这件事上做出改变！

original: will find a proper punishment for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s sins
translation: 将会找到对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]罪行的恰当惩罚

original: The silence following my accusations, that a vassal of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] was committing zina, was deafening. Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me several questions about the accusations, the rumors I've heard and what I thought about the matter, which was rather flattering.
translation: 在我指控[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的一名封臣犯下通奸罪之后，全场鸦雀无声。首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]向我询问了几个关于指控，关于我听到的流言和我是怎样看这件事情的问题，我喜欢这些问题。

original: But then [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] wouldn't do something about it!
translation: 但是接下来[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]不会对此做任何惩罚！

original: I am free to confront the accused, but without [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s assistance!
translation: 我可以自由地质询嫌犯，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]不会协助我！

original: Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] assured me the sinner would be punished
translation: 首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]向我保证罪犯会得到惩罚

original: I hadn't really expected [From.GetTitledFirstName] to react to my accusations about [From.GetHerHim] committing zina and me threatening to go to the Chief Qadi with the matter in exactly that way...
translation: 在我指控[From.GetHerHim]犯下通奸罪，威胁把这件事原原本本地告诉首席教法官后，我本没有指望[From.GetTitledFirstName]会如此应对……

original: My greed got the better of me and I promised to say nothing to no one
translation: 贪婪占据了我的心灵，我许诺不会把这件事情告诉任何人

original: I will tell Chief Qadi about this!
translation: 我会把这件事告诉首席教法官！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my threat! I will tell the Chief Qadi!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]无视我的威胁！我会把这件事首席教法官！

original: The Chief Qadi would not believe me anyway
translation: 首席教法官无论怎样都不会相信我的

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] promised to never see the woman again, but I will still tell the Chief Qadi
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]发誓再也不和这个女人见面，但是我仍然会把这件事告诉首席教法官

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] promise to never see the woman again is enough for me
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]发誓再也不和这个女人见面，我会就此罢手

original: I confronted [From.GetTitledFirstName] with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s accusations about [From.GetHerHim] committing zina and the rumors [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] based this upon. [From.GetTitledFirstName] denied everything and assured me [From.GetSheHe] is a pious Muslim who would never do anything to affront Allah.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]指控[From.GetTitledFirstName]犯下了通奸罪，并陈述了[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]做出这些指控所基于的流言，我就这些指控和流言对[From.GetHerHim]进行了质询。[From.GetTitledFirstName]否认了全部指控，并且向我保证[From.GetSheHe]是一个虔诚的穆斯林，不会做任何违背安拉教诲的事情。

original: I believe [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我相信[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s belief that [This.GetTitledFirstName] is innocent gladdens [This.GetHerHis] heart
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]相信[This.GetTitledFirstName]的清白，这让[This.GetHerHis]心情十分高兴

original: I doubt [From.GetTitledFirstName] is sincere, but I can't do anything
translation: 我怀疑[From.GetTitledFirstName]的诚实，但是我无计可施

original: Chief Qadi [Root.GetTitledFirstName] doubts [This.GetTitledFirstName] innocence but can do nothing
translation: 首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]怀疑[This.GetTitledFirstName]不是清白的，但是对此没有办法

original: The punishment for committing zina is stoning, but the Chief Qadi is satisfied with one hundred lashes
translation: 对于通奸罪的惩罚是石刑，但是首席教法官仅仅满足于 100 鞭子

original: The merciful Chief Qadi [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decides to trust [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s word
translation: 仁慈的首席教法官[Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定相信[This.GetTitledFirstName]的话

original: The Chief Qadi does not know what to do, [This.GetTitledFirstName] escapes punishment
translation: 首席教法官无计可施，[This.GetTitledFirstName]逃过了惩罚

original: I need no witnesses nor confessions, [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be punished!
translation: 我不需要目击证人和供词，[From.GetTitledFirstName]将会得到惩罚！

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s accusations of [From.GetTitledFirstName] committing zina is not something to take lightly, so when I confronted [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetSheHe] confessed and confessed four times, then promised to never see [From.GetHerHis] lover ever again I stood at a loss. Should I punish [From.GetTitledFirstName] for committing zina or should I be merciful if [From.GetSheHe] stood by [From.GetHerHis] word?
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]对于[From.GetTitledFirstName]犯下通奸罪的指控不是件小事，在我质问[From.GetTitledFirstName]之后，[From.GetSheHe]忏悔了四次，并发誓不再和[From.GetHerHis]情人见面，我反而犹豫起来。我应当惩罚[From.GetTitledFirstName]的通奸罪，还是如果[From.GetSheHe]遵守[From.GetHerHis]诺言我就网开一面？

original: I do not believe you but there's nothing I can do
translation: 我不相信你说的话但是我对此没有办法

original: Your words are false, the punishment will be brought upon you
translation: 你的话是虚假的，你将受到惩罚

original: If you break your promise you will be doubly punished. Two hundred lashes!
translation: 如果你违背了你的誓言你将会受到双倍的惩罚。两百鞭子！

original: I had thought [From.GetTitledFirstName] would've shown some embarrassment, some remorse for committing zina, a crime declared punishable by stoning or a hundred lashes by the Qur'an and the Prophet himself! Instead, [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not deny anything and told me the love [From.GetSheHe] felt for [From.GetHerHis] lover was sacred!
translation: 我曾经以为[From.GetTitledFirstName]会对他犯下的通奸罪表现出一丝羞愧和悔恨，在古兰经中先知说犯通奸罪的惩罚是石刑或者一百鞭子！然而，[From.GetTitledFirstName]并没有否认任何事实，还告诉我[From.GetSheHe]对于[From.GetHerHis]情人的爱是神圣的！

original: I... I don't know what to do...
translation: 我……我不知道此事如何是好……

original: Your punishment will be a hundred lashes!
translation: 你将受到一百鞭子的惩罚！

original: Committing zina is a crime according to the Qur'an and the Prophet, may peace be upon him, and the punishment is stoning or a hundred lashes. Regardless of what I told Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName], I still felt afraid as [From.GetSheHe] pondered my case.
translation: 古兰经和先知（愿主福安之）教导我们通奸是一种罪孽，它的惩罚是石刑或者一百鞭子。不论我告诉了首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]什么，我在[From.GetSheHe]思考我的案件的时候仍然感到害怕。

original: The hundred lashes only wounded me, not my soul nor my love!
translation: 一百鞭子只能让我的肉体受伤，不能让我的灵魂和爱情受伤！

original: The merciful Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to spare me the punishment!
translation: 仁慈的首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定免去我的刑罚！

original: I will never see my lover again, but Chief Qadi [From.GetTitledFirstName] decided not to punish me!
translation: 我不会再和我的情人见面，但是首席教法官[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定免去我的刑罚！

original: The wounds from the hundred lashes healed more quickly than I could fathom
translation: 在我深刻反省之前，那一百鞭子带来的伤痕就愈合了

original: A messenger arrives with an invitation to all the warriors of the land to take part in Furusiyya, a great martial competition held but once per reign to determine who is the greatest.
translation: 信使给这片土地上所有的勇士带来了参加马术大会的邀请，这是一场盛大的武术竞赛，但是只有一个人能够成为最终的胜利者。

original: At last!
translation: 终于来了！

original: Pah. For children playing at being men.
translation: 哼，这都是小孩子的把戏。

original: The Furusiyya begins and the coming two months shall separate those gifted with the skills of a warrior from those who would only pretend at such.
translation: 马术大会开始了，接下来的两个月将会把那些有天赋的勇士和其他的假装有能力的参与者区分开来。

original: A time for heroic deeds.
translation: 这是属于英雄的时刻。

original: Alas, the ongoing war demands my attention.
translation: 哎呀，我的注意力都放在正在进行的战争上面。

original: The Furusiyya has come to an end and the stories of its great heroes and their unfortunate victims are already spreading throughout the land.
translation: 马术大会结束了，关于伟大的英雄以及败在他们手下的不幸的对手的故事已经在这片土地上流传开来。

original: An event to remember.
translation: 这是一件值得记住的大事。

original: The Furusiyya has ended, and though I was bested by some participants, I also saw victory more than once. The promise I show as a warrior cannot be denied.
translation: 马术大会已经结束了，虽然我被一些对手击败，但我也不只一次的取得了胜利。我显示出来的作为一个战士的能力无可置疑。

original: I will improve.
translation: 我会变得更强。

original: The Furusiyya has ended and my martial prowess is no longer considered idle boasting - it is proven fact. Though there were a handful of warriors gifted with skills superior to my own, the glory I won is enough to make me a hero in the eyes of the people.
translation: 马术大会已经结束了，我强大的武力不再是空洞的自夸——它得到了证明。虽然有不少勇士的技能和天赋超过了我，但是胜利带给我的荣耀足够让我成为人们眼中的英雄。

original: My enemies will fear me!
translation: 我的敌人们将会感到害怕！

original: The Furusiyya has reached its end and not a moment too soon. My performance left much to be desired, and I would have suffered worse if some of my opponents had not pitied me.
translation: 持续了一段时间的马术大会已经结束了。我的表现可圈可点，如果不是我的对手们手下留情，我会受更多的苦。

original: I did my best...
translation: 我已经尽力了……

original: The Furusiyya has ended and though I did make a name for myself, it was not the one I had hoped for. I lost to every challenger, and when I pushed through the crowds and fled in panic in the last wrestling duel, I could hear laughter behind me...
translation: 马术大会已经结束了，虽然我出了名，但是不是以我希望的方式出名的。我输给了每一个挑战者，我在最后一场决斗之后推开人群惊慌的跑掉时，可以听见我身后的阵阵笑声……

original: The shame of it all!
translation: 这一切是多么的耻辱！

original: The end of the Furusiyya has come, and I have learned much from the skilled warriors who attended. Both my swordsmanship and archery have improved.
translation: 马术大会已经结束了，我从参加的技艺高超的武士身上学到了很多。我的剑术和箭术都变得更强。

original: I am better for it.
translation: 我变得更强。

original: The Furusiyya has reached its end, and the combat techniques I had practised did not work well against real, thinking opponents. I am not quite the fighter I thought I was...
translation: 马术大会已经结束了，我练习过的战斗技巧对于真实会思考的对手来说并不太管用。我并不像我想象的那样是一名好的战士……

original: Perhaps if I improved my footwork...
translation: 如果我改进一下我的步法就好了……

original: As my opponent skillfully plunged his blade into my belly and I fell on my back, I reflected briefly on the unfairness of the universe. Then I focused on my fading heartbeat as the blue sky above turned darker and darker...
translation: 我的对手灵巧地把他的刀插进我的肚子，我倒在地上，这时我想的全是这个世界是多么的不公平。接着我注意到我的心跳开始减弱，眼中的蓝色天空变得越来越暗……

original: Why me?
translation: 为什么是我？

original: My horse bucked wildly to the side as my opponent rushed past on his camel, and I was thrown to the ground. When my senses returned, I noticed my arm was bent at a strange angle...
translation: 当我的对手骑着他的骆驼冲过我的时候我的马把我狠狠的摔在地上。当我清醒的时候，我注意到我的胳膊弯曲成了一个奇怪的角度……

original: A pox on that camel jockey!
translation: 诅咒这个骆驼骑士患上天花！

original: I was facing an opponent in a game of chess, and while pondering my opening moves, the game next to ours turned violent. One of the players hurled the board aside to pull out his scimitar, sending chess pieces flying everywhere. One of White's Bishops struck me in the eye.
translation: 我正同人下象棋，在我考虑怎样开局的时候，我们旁边的棋局突然演变成暴力。一名棋手掀翻棋盘抽出他的弯刀，把棋子扔得到处都是。一枚白方的象撞在我的眼睛上。

original: By the Prophet, that is an illegal move!
translation: 遵照先知的教诲，这不是合法的行为！

original: To my great shame, the challenge of keeping my bowels in check during the martial competition proved too much for me. I fled home to escape the taunts of my former comrades and for a change of underwear.
translation: 太耻辱了，我居然在比武的时候大便失禁。我飞快的跑回家，以逃避我之前的同伴的嘲笑并换上一件干净的内衣。

original: I should have stayed in bed this morning.
translation: 我今天早上应该赖在床上不起来的。

original: Suddenly, in the middle of a frenzied melee, the crowds part to reveal a giant swordsman grinning at you. After he shows off some fancy moves with his sword, the crowds turn expectantly to you. You fling a dagger into the thug's throat and he drops dead to the wild cheers of those nearby.
translation: 在疯狂的混战之中，你突然发现一个高大的武士正在对着你咧着嘴笑。在他卖弄了几手花式剑法之后，人们都带着期望的眼光看着你。你飞出一支匕首插进他的喉咙，他在周围疯狂的喝彩声中倒地而亡。

original: Who is next?
translation: 还有谁？

original: There were many who doubted my fighting ability, but when we rode our horses into mock battle only to be ambushed by our opponents, I was the one who led us to victory against all odds.
translation: 有很多人怀疑我的军事能力，但是在模拟战斗中，我们骑着马被我们的敌人伏击，全靠着我的领导，我们才能赢得胜利。

original: I am tougher than I look.
translation: 我比我外表看起来更加强壮。

original: As we rode our horses into battle in yet another test of skill, I devised a clever ambush against our opponents. We prevailed despite being outnumbered.
translation: 我们骑着马进行另外一项的战斗技巧测试，我设计了一个聪明的战术来伏击我们的敌人。虽然人数处于劣势，我们仍然取得了胜利。

original: Many victories will follow, Insha'Allah.
translation: 胜利接踵而来，若主意欲。

original: Many believe that chess is the ultimate test of strategy, and if this is true, your brilliance as a general is undeniable. All who have mustered the courage to challenge you in this game have met with defeat.
translation: 许多人相信象棋是考察策略的终极测试，如果这是真的话，那么你作为一名将军的出色能力无可置疑。所有敢于在这项游戏上挑战你的人都失败了。

original: Checkmate.
translation: 将军。

original: You are renowned for your skills in strategy and planning, but several defeats in mock battles due to embarrassing mistakes on your part have put this reputation into question.
translation: 你以出色的战略和计划而闻名，但是你在模拟战斗中数次犯下低级错误而导致失败，这使你的能力面临质疑。

original: I should have seen through that feint...
translation: 我应该识破那次佯攻的……

original: No matter how hard you try, you cannot wrap your head around this stupid game called chess. Your opponents always seem to be several moves ahead of you.
translation: 不管你如何努力，这个叫做象棋的愚蠢游戏总是让你感到头大。你的对手似乎总能比你多考虑几步。

original: It is a game for children and weaklings!
translation: 这是小孩子和弱者的游戏！

original: After repeatedly falling off my horse during a competitive event, many have questioned my abilities as a warrior.
translation: 在一场竞技活动中，我反复地从我的马上摔下，许多人质疑我作为一名战士的能力。

original: Curse this saddle!
translation: 都怪这个马鞍！

original: I have emerged from the Furusiyya as the finest warrior of the land. I have bested all challengers, and my skills at archery and horsemanship have proved second to none.
translation: 我在这次马术大会中脱颖而出，成为了这片土地上最好的战士。我击败了所有的挑战着，我绝世无双的箭术和马术也得到了证明。

original: A momentous day.
translation: 重要的一天。

original: I have been declared the second champion of the Furusiyya. Few are those who can match my martial prowess.
translation: 我被宣布为马术大会的第二名。很少有人能够与我的战斗能力相提并论。

original: May my enemies quake in fear!
translation: 让我的敌人因为恐惧而战栗吧！

original: I have been named third champion of the Furusiyya. My efforts in these competitions have proved that I belong in a small circle of elite warriors.
translation: 我被宣布为马术大会的第三名。我在竞赛中的努力证明我属于精英战士的小圈子。

original: I have fought with honor.
translation: 我带着荣誉作战。

original: Though I did not participate myself, I felt particularly drawn to the wrestling challenges of the Furusiyya...
translation: 虽然我自己没有参加，我仍然被马术大会中的比武深深的吸引……

original: Such fine, strong men...
translation: 多么优秀，强壮的男人……

original: While others busied themselves with martial exploits during the Furusiyya, I found the time to embark on different challenges in the many tents that have cropped up just outside the tournament grounds. Like the other fighters, however, I too suffer from battle sores...
translation: 当其他人正忙于清点马术大会期间的战功的时候，我有时间在比赛场地外出现的帐篷里展开不同的挑战。但是同其他的战士一样，我也忍受着战斗带来的疼痛……

original: A red badge of courage.
translation: 一枚红色的勇气勋章。

original: My shortcomings in the Furusiyya competitions do not seem quite as significant after helping myself to a healthy serving of wine. Though it is haram, forbidden, surely a few more drops won't hurt...
translation: 在我喝了大量的酒之后，我在马术大会中的缺陷似乎就变得不那么重要了。虽然饮酒是被教规禁止的，但是再喝一点肯定不会有事的……

original: *hic*

A fighter had the nerve to insult me in front of several of the other attending warriors. The look on his face when I challenged him to a duel revealed him for the coward he was, but honor left him no choice but to accept. I showed no mercy when I cut him down in single combat.
translation: 一名战士竟敢在其他几名参加的武士面前侮辱我。当我向他提出决斗挑战的时候，他脸上的表情暴露了他是一个胆小鬼，但是荣誉迫使他不得不接受。我在决斗中丝毫没有留情地杀死了他。

original: All arguments should be settled thus.
translation: 所有的争论都应该用这种方法解决。

original: As I waited my turn in the archery contest, I came across two bedouins, fierce warriors both, who were plotting to get back at a young noble who had dismissed them as desert rabble. I watched as they carefully cut the girth of the noble's saddle just enough to ensure it would snap during the upcoming riding challenge.
translation: 我正等待射箭比赛轮到我出场，撞见两个贝都因人，都是凶猛的战士，正阴谋报复一位曾在沙漠争端中羞辱他们的年轻贵族。我看见他们小心的割裂那个贵族马鞍的肚带，刚好能够让它在接下来的骑马决斗中突然折断。

original: Clever.
translation: 聪明。

original: As I waited my turn in the archery contest, I came across two bedouins, fierce warriors both, who were plotting to get back at a young noble who had dismissed them as desert rabble. I told them to face the man directly instead of scheming behind his back like bitter old women!
translation: 我正等待射箭比赛轮到我出场，撞见两个贝都因人，都是凶猛的战士，正阴谋报复一位曾在沙漠争端中羞辱他们的年轻贵族。我告诉他们不要在那个人背后像个女人一样密谋，应该直接去面对他！

original: No more of this cowardly intrigue!
translation: 不要再搞这种懦夫的小把戏了！

original: Learned men from all around the land have come to the Furusiyya to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. Between bouts in the wrestling arena, I spent some time listening to their discussions and learned much about how best to rule the land.
translation: 所有这片土地上的学者都已经来到马术大会见证这场盛宴，并且交流和分享各自的见解和智慧。在决斗的回合之间的休息时间，我花了一点时间聆听他们的讨论并学习了很多如何更好地治理国家的知识。

original: I will use this knowledge.
translation: 我将会好好运用这些知识。

original: Learned men from all around the land have come to the Furusiyya to observe the spectacle and share insights and wisdom with each other. I joined one of their debates and offered my own opinions on how to govern, only to have them laugh in my face!
translation: 所有这片土地上的学者都已经来到马术大会见证这场盛宴，并且交流和分享各自的见解和智慧。我加入了他们的一场讨论，并在怎样治理国家上面提出了我自己的观点，却只得到了他们的当面嘲笑！

original: Old fools. What do they know?
translation: 老糊涂们。他们知道什么？

original: Two men assigned to my cavalry wing for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so for the sake of our team I decided to mediate in their conflict.
translation: 在接下来的模拟战斗中分配给我们一侧骑兵的两个人总是看着对方的喉咙。显然他们很快就会自己打起来，而把我们的对手放在一边，所以为了我们团队的利益，我决定调解他们的冲突。

original: They agreed to set aside their differences.
translation: 他们同意把他们的矛盾暂时搁置。

original: Two men assigned to my cavalry wing for the upcoming mock battle were constantly at each other's throats. It was clear they would sooner fight each other than our opponents, so I called them out like the bickering women they were and demanded they settle their differences in a duel.
translation: 在接下来的模拟战斗中分配给我们一侧骑兵的两个人总是看着对方的喉咙。显然他们很快就会自己打起来，而把我们的对手放在一边，因此我说他们这样就像吵架的女人一样，并要求他们通过决斗来解决他们的矛盾。

original: Sadly both were badly wounded and our wing suffered as a result...
translation: 很遗憾这两个人都在决斗中严重受伤，受此影响我们输掉了战斗……

original: Riders have been sent to all the corners of the land, spreading word that the great martial competition of Furusiyya will soon be held.
translation: 骑手被派到这片土地的每一个角落，传达盛大的马术大会即将举行的消息。

original: Excellent!
translation: 太好了！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has been named first champion of my great Furusiyya.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]被宣布为我的盛大马术大会的第一名。

original: [From.GetTitledName] is indeed a mighty warrior.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]确实是一名强大的战士。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has performed well enough to be named second champion of my great Furusiyya.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]的表现十分出色，他被宣布为我的盛大马术大会的第二名。

original: Let no one deny [From.GetHerHis] skill.
translation: 不要让任何人否定[From.GetHerHis]技艺。

original: The third champion of my Furusiyya is none other than [From.GetTitledName].
translation: 除了[From.GetTitledName]之外，没有人可以当的起我的马术大会的第三名。

original: Well fought!
translation: 打得漂亮！

original: The great Furusiyya competition of [From.GetTitledName] has sadly been cancelled due to war.
translation: 很遗憾，由于战争的原因，[From.GetTitledName]的盛大的马术大会被取消了。

original: Then my skill at fighting may still see use.
translation: 虽然如此我的战斗技艺仍然能够得到施展。

original: Master, your honored guest, [From.GetTitledName], has sadly perished during the events of the Furusiyya.
translation: 主人，你尊贵的客人[From.GetTitledName]在马术大会中不幸死去。

original: May [From.GetSheHe] find peace in the life hereafter.
translation: 愿[From.GetSheHe]在来世找到平静。

original: Tell me of the heroes, not the failures!
translation: 告诉我英雄的事情，而不是失败者！

original: Master, your honored guest, [From.GetTitledName], has sadly been maimed during the events of the Furusiyya.
translation: 主人，你尊贵的客人[From.GetTitledName]在马术大会中受伤致残。

original: May [From.GetSheHe] recover swiftly, Insha'Allah.
translation: 愿[From.GetSheHe]尽快痊愈，若主意欲。

original: Tell me of the heroes, not the failures!
translation: 告诉我英雄的事情，而不是失败者！

original: Master, your honored guest, [From.GetTitledName], has sadly suffered serious wounds during the events of the Furusiyya.
translation: 主人，你尊贵的客人[From.GetTitledName]在马术大会中受了重伤。

original: May [From.GetSheHe] recover swiftly, Insha'Allah.
translation: 愿[From.GetSheHe]尽快痊愈，若主意欲。

original: Tell me of the heroes, not the failures!
translation: 告诉我英雄的事情，而不是失败者！

original: As death closes in on me and I prepare for the life hereafter, I spare a thought for the great Furusiyya I had planned. Sadly the competition will end upon my passing, and the fighters will have to find some other way to prove their worth.
translation: 在死亡就要降临在我的头上并且我开始准备迎接来世的时候，我想到了我计划举行的盛大的马术大会。遗憾的是由于我的去世比赛将会结束，战士们将不得不寻找其他方式来证明他们的价值。

original: May those I ruled remember me for my wisdom, Insha'Allah.
translation: 愿那些在我治下的人们记住我的智慧，若主意欲。

original:
Peace be upon you, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Due to the sudden and unexpected passing of [From.GetTitledFirstName], the Furusiyya has sadly been cancelled.

Signed, 
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
祝你平安，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。由于[From.GetTitledFirstName]的突然死亡，马术大会被遗憾地取消了。

此致，
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: But I was going to prove myself as a fighter!
translation: 但是我还想要证明我是一名战士呢！

original: Hold a Furusiyya Tournament
translation: 举办一场马术大会

original: We shall hold a Furusiyya martial competition to determine once and for all who the best fighters of the land are.
translation: 我们应该举行一场马术大会来一劳永逸地决定谁是这片土地最强的战士。

original: The holy month of Ramadan is upon us, and all faithful Muslims, save the infirm and those on a journey, must observe the fast during daylight hours.
translation: 神圣的斋月到了，所有虔诚的穆斯林，除了生病的和出门在外的人，都必须在从日出到日落的时间斋戒。

original: Let the fast commence!
translation: 让封斋开始吧！

original: Ramadan is a blessed time for charity and kindness, and in that spirit you could release the prisoners languishing in your dungeons...
translation: 斋月是得到祝福去做善事的时间，在这一精神下你可以释放关在地牢里的潦倒囚犯……

original: Yes, set them free.
translation: 好的，释放他们。

original: No, they are where they belong.
translation: 不，那就是他们应该呆的地方。

original: The Prophet, may Allah honor him and grant him peace, teaches the importance of charity and good deeds, especially during the holy month of Ramadan. There are many poor in [Root.Location.GetName] who could be helped if you but parted with some of your treasury.
translation: 穆圣先知（愿主福安之）教导我们做慈善和好事的重要性，特别是在神圣的斋月里。如果你肯拿出你的一部分财富的话，就可以帮助[Root.Location.GetName]的很多穷人。

original: Yes, make it so. Distribute alms to the poor.
translation: 好的，就这么做。把救济发放给穷人。

original: No, I would not disturb their fast by giving them means to buy food...
translation: 不，我不会分给他们食物来打扰他们的封斋……

original: Now is the time for prayers and devoted reading of the Qur'an. After the sun has set, you could recite the Qur'an through Tarawih prayers.
translation: 现在是祈祷和全神贯注地读古兰经的时间。这样在太阳落山之后，你就可以在斋月拜功中背诵古兰经了。

original: Yes, I will thus draw nearer to Allah.
translation: 好的，我会因此更加靠近安拉。

original: No, I do not have the time to spare.
translation: 不，我没有时间。

original: The strict fast you have been observing during the daylight hours of Ramadan has weakened you to the point of illness. As the ill are exempted from fasting, there would be no shame or loss of piety if you abandoned the fast and made up for the lost days at a later time. If you continue, however, there could be serious repercussions to your health...
translation: 你在斋月期间严格执行的封斋让你身体虚弱的快要病了。由于不适是由封斋引起的，停止斋戒并在以后再进行补偿不会给你的虔诚带来耻辱和损失。但是如果你继续封斋的话，将会对你的健康产生严重的影响……

original: Yes, I need time to recover from this...
translation: 是的，我需要时间恢复身体……

original: No, I feel fine!
translation: 不，我感觉很好！

original: Your decision to continue fasting despite your illness has proved a costly one. You have become infirm with weakness due to lack of food and water, and left with no choice but to interrupt the fast.
translation: 你不顾健康状况继续斋戒的决定产生了严重后果。你由于缺乏食物和饮水而变得虚弱，你别无选择只能中断斋戒。

original: Perhaps next year...
translation: 也许下一年的斋月我会做的更好……

original: The fast you have observed during Ramadan has taught you the value of moderation in all things, and the dangers of indulgence and excess. You feel closer to Allah.
translation: 你在斋月中进行的封斋告诉你在所有事情上有所节制的重要性，放纵和过量是危险的。你感觉和安拉靠的更近。

original: I am a new person.
translation: 我是一个全新的人。

original: You have given generously to the poor during Ramadan and performed many good deeds. The urge to help those in need comes naturally to you.
translation: 你在斋月里慷慨地向穷人施舍并做了许多好事。你很自然地产生了帮助那些需要帮助的人的想法。

original: I feel like a better person.
translation: 我感觉变成了一个更好的人。

original: The ongoing war demands your full attention, and you and your men can no longer continue your fast. You will have to make up the lost days at a later date.
translation: 正在进行的战争需要你给予全部的关注，你和你的人不能继续封斋了。你会在晚些时候把不足的天数补上。

original: So it must be.
translation: 必须这样做。

original: You have become ill and will have to abandon the fast. The lost days will have to be made up at a later date.
translation: 你生病了不得不放弃斋戒。你需要在晚些时候补上不足的天数。

original: So it is.
translation: 必须这样做。

original: The end of Ramadan approaches, and that means the holiday of Eid ul-Fitr is upon us. The preparations for the planned feast to celebrate this have already been made, and now the time has come to invite your vassals to your palace. What say you, Master?
translation: 斋月快要结束了，这意味着开斋节就要来了。庆祝宴会准备已经完成了，现在到了邀请你的属臣来你的宫殿的时候。你怎么认为，主人？

original: Send out the invitations!
translation: 送出邀请！

original: No, I have a headache. Cancel the festivities!
translation: 不，我有点头疼。取消这场庆宴！

original:
Peace be upon you, [Root.GetTitledName]. The end of Ramadan draws near, and to celebrate the holiday of Eid ul-Fitr I have decided to hold a great feast in my palace. You are of course invited.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
愿安拉保佑你平安，[Root.GetTitledName]。斋月临近结束，为了庆转斋节我已经决定在我的宫殿举办一场盛大的宴会。你当然在邀请名单之列。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I am honored to accept.
translation: 我很荣幸接到邀请。

original: No, I have other plans.
translation: 不，我还有别的安排。

original:
Peace be upon you, [Root.GetTitledName]. I give thanks for your invitation to celebrate Eid ul-Fitr at your palace, but I regret to inform you I cannot attend.

Your servant,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetTitledName]。我对你邀请我参加在你的宫殿举行的开斋节庆宴表示感谢，但是我十分遗憾的通知你我不能参加。

你的仆人，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: So [From.GetSheHe] dares refuse!
translation: [From.GetSheHe]竟敢拒绝！

original: The great banquet you ordered held to celebrate Eid ul-Fitr and the end of Ramadan was a rousing success! The food was exceptional, the entertainment magnificent and a great time was had by all. Your guests seemed suitably impressed by your wealth and generosity.
translation: 你下令举办的庆转斋节和斋月结束的盛大宴会异常的成功！食物出色，娱乐精彩，每个人都玩的十分开心。你的客人们看起来对你的财富和慷慨留下了相当深刻的印象。

original: Eid Mubarak!
translation: 开斋节快乐！

original: The great banquet held by [From.GetTitledName] to celebrate Eid ul-Fitr and the end of Ramadan was a splendid occasion. The food was exceptional, the entertainment magnificent and a great time was had by all.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]举办的庆转斋节和斋月结束的盛大宴会十分成功。食物出色，娱乐精彩，每个人都玩得十分开心。

original: Eid Mubarak!
translation: 开斋节快乐！

original: To celebrate Eid ul-Fitr, perhaps you should present a gift to your beloved wife.
translation: 为了庆祝开斋节，或许你应该送给你亲爱的妻子一份礼物。

original: Of course! I will buy her a golden necklace.
translation: 当然了！我会给她买一个金项链。

original: No, my affection for her is gift enough.
translation: 不，我对她的爱就是最好的礼物。

original: To celebrate Eid ul-Fitr, perhaps you should present gifts to your beloved wives.
translation: 为了庆祝开斋节，或许你应该送给你亲爱的妻子一份礼物。

original: Yes, but only for [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], my dear first wife.
translation: 好的，但是只送给[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]，我亲爱的第一妻子。

original: Of course, they will all see my love!
translation: 当然了，她们每个人都会收到我的礼物！

original: My affection for them is gift enough.
translation: 我对于她们的爱就是最好的礼物。

original: The hunger pains you experience during the fast have become unbearable due to your gluttonous nature. With the sun still high in the sky, you break into the pantry and help yourself to the food inside while tears stream down your face...
translation: 由于你是一个贪吃鬼，斋戒期间饥饿带给你的痛苦使你无法承受。太阳仍然高高挂在天空，你闯进厨房自己动手大吃起来，眼泪从你的脸庞滑落……

original: Mmhf... c-can't.. help myself...
translation: 呜唔……我无法……控制自己的行为……

original: Overcome with lust and in broad daylight during the fast, you sinfully engage in the pleasures of the flesh with a serving girl.
translation: 封斋要求克制肉欲，但封斋期间光天化日之下，你罪孽深重地陷入和一名侍女的肉体欢愉之中。

original: I should not have done that...
translation: 我不应该这么做……

original: Though the fast requires you to abstain from food and drink during the daylight hours, you helped yourself to enough wine to fall into a drunken stupor.
translation: 虽然封斋要求你在白天的时候禁绝食物和饮料，你却自己喝得大醉不醒。

original: I-I'm schorry...
translation: 坠——坠不起……

original: Many in [Root.Location.GetName] have donated generously to provide for the poor during the holy month of Ramadan. The gold has been gathered in an urn but when you approach it to donate your own share, your greedy nature results in your coin purse gaining weight instead of losing it...
translation: 在神圣的斋月里，[Root.Location.GetName]的很多人已经慷慨地捐助来帮助穷人。金币被收集在一个坛子里，但是当你走近坛子准备捐献你的一份的时候，你贪婪的本性让你的钱包在捐献后变得更鼓而不是变得更扁……

original: No one will miss a few coins...
translation: 不会有人发现少了几枚硬币……

original: As a cynical unbeliever, you do your best to uphold the appearance of observing the fast, but behind closed doors you do not think twice about eating and drinking to your heart's content, be it day or night. One day you are caught in the act...
translation: 作为一名愤世嫉俗的不信者，你在表面上尽全力维持遵守封斋的形象，但是关起门来你就随心所欲的想吃就吃，想喝就喝，不管是在白天还是晚上。一天你被抓个正着……

original: I-It's not what it looks like!
translation: 事——事情不是你们看到的那样！

original: Observe Ramadan
translation: 遵守斋月戒律

original: As a Muslim you observe the fast of Ramadan every year, but you will be paying particular adherence to it this time. Upon its conclusion, a great banquet will be held to celebrate the Eid ul-Fitr holiday.
translation: 作为一名穆斯林你每年都要遵守一次斋月封斋，但是这次你会特别严格的遵守戒律。在结束的时候，会举行一场盛大的宴会来庆祝开斋节。

original: Let the fast commence!
translation: 让封斋开始吧！

original: Invitation rejected.
translation: 拒绝了邀请。

original: Eid ul-Fitr feast is attended.
translation: 参加了开斋节庆宴。

original: Eid ul-Fitr feast is held.
translation: 举行了开斋节庆宴。

original: Your fast and observance of the holy month of Ramadan has ended.
translation: 你的斋月封斋结束了。

original: Until next year.
translation: 下一次斋月在一年以后。

original: The fast ends.
translation: 斋戒结束了。

original: I wish to decorate the new mosque with abstract arabesque motifs such as quotes from the Qur'an and intricate calligraphy is something my liege's new Court Calligrapher should be more than able to do.
translation: 我希望用抽象的阿拉伯风格，例如引述古兰经来装饰新的清真寺，我的君主的新宫廷书法家可以用他精致的书法帮助我。

original: With the Court Calligrapher's help, the mosque should look wonderful!
translation: 在宫廷书法家的帮助下，这座清真寺将会具有十分惊艳的外观！

original: Court Calligrapher [This.GetTitledFirstName] is asked to create designs for the decoration of the new Mosque
translation: 宫廷书法家[This.GetTitledFirstName]被邀请设计新的清真寺的装饰

original: I should not disturb the Court Calligrapher with such a petty task
translation: 我不应该拿这种琐事来打扰宫廷书法家

original: A message from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived, with a most respectful tone to it and a humble request for calligraphy of Quranic verses for the decoration of a newly erected mosque.
translation: 一条来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]的消息，以最大的敬意邀请你为一座新建立的清真寺题写古兰经中的词句作为装饰。

original: I would be more than honored to create designs for the decoration
translation: 为这些装饰做设计是我莫大的荣耀

original: The calligraphy Quranic verses is much appreciated by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 古兰经词句书法得到了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的极大赞赏

original: Despite [Root.GetTitledFirstName] hard work with the calligraphy Quranic verses, the designs and effort is not appreciated by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 虽然[Root.GetTitledFirstName]在古兰经词句书法作品上付出了极大心血，但是他的设计和努力并没有得到[This.GetTitledFirstName]的欣赏

original: My work would only be spoiled in a mosque of such petty calibre
translation: 我的艺术会因为装饰清真寺这种事而被玷污。

original: The Court Calligrapher [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s refusal is most disappointing to [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 宫廷书法家[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的拒绝使[This.GetTitledFirstName]十分失望

original: I received samples of what the Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName] had envisioned for the decoration of the mosque, taken special care to the few Quranic verses I had felt most important to adorn the roof and walls of the mosque.
translation: 我收到了宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]为清真寺的装饰设计的样稿，里面特别列出了几句我认为古兰经中最重要的词句，来作为清真寺房顶和墙壁的装饰。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] has outdone [From.GetHerselfHimself]! Bravo, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]已经超越了[From.GetHerselfHimself]！干得好，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: The work of Court Calligrapher [This.GetTitledFirstName] is praised by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 宫廷书法家[This.GetTitledFirstName]得到了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的表扬

original: The excellence of the Court Calligrapher reaches [This.GetTitledFirstName] ears
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]得知了宫廷书法家的出色表现

original: The design looks as if a three-year-old has smeared ink over the pergament!
translation: 这设计就像三岁小孩在羊皮纸上乱抹的一样！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tells the Court Calligrapher [This.GetTitledFirstName] how terrible the designs are
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]告诉宫廷书法家[This.GetTitledFirstName]这个设计有多么糟糕

original: The pitiful designs has even reached the eyes of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 连[This.GetTitledFirstName]都看到了这个糟糕的设计

original: The designs are good, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] can do better
translation: 设计得不错，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]可以做得更好

original: The designs are awful, but I cannot tell [From.GetTitledFirstName] that!
translation: 设计太糟糕了，但是我不能这样直接告诉[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: I had thought it to be a great honor, designing the decorations of my mosque and I had even sent [From.GetTitledFirstName] some Quranic verses to give [From.GetHerHim] some ideas of what I wanted together with a most humble letter praising [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s calligraphic skill. The short answer was humiliating in its simplicity:
translation: 我本想着为我的清真寺的装饰做设计是一件莫大的荣耀，我甚至还送信给[From.GetTitledFirstName]，信中包括一些古兰经的词句以帮助[From.GetHerHim]了解我想要的是什么，信中还用最谦卑的语气赞扬了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的书法技艺。却只得到了简短的耻辱的回复：

original: 'No' was the answer I got!
translation: 「不」，这就是我得到的回答！

original: I sent [From.GetTitledFirstName] some short samples of my previous works and the design of the Quranic verses [From.GetSheHe] had specifically asked for. The messenger arrived with a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I tore it open to reveal what [From.GetTitledFirstName] had written in response to my designs...
translation: 我送给[From.GetTitledFirstName]一些样稿，包括我之前的作品以及[From.GetSheHe]特别要求的古兰经词句的设计。信使带来了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的一封信，我打开信看[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我的设计作何回应……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] loved it! Time to start working seriously on this!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]喜欢它！是时候开始认真工作了！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] thought the designs was terrible!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]认为这种设计很糟糕！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] chided me for not taking this seriously!
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]为我没有认真工作而斥责我！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] was happy with the designs
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]喜欢这些设计

original: I saw the design of the Quranic verses my Court Calligrapher [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] had created for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s new mosque and I couldn't believe anyone would be dissatisfied with it, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is a master with the qalam!
translation: 我看见了我的宫廷书法家[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]为[From.GetTitledFirstName]的新清真寺创作的古兰经词句设计，我认为没有人会对它感到不满意，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]是一位运用芦苇笔的大师！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was most pleased with the designs
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]非常满意这些设计

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not share my opinion...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不同意我的看法……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] pointed out several flaws in the design, deeming it unworthy
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]指出设计中的几处瑕疵，认为它不值得称赞

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed with me and praised [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意我的看法，并夸奖了[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The hilya I have worked on for so long is a piece of art, the description of the Prophet Mohammad's appearance and character written in gold with as much care taken to every line and curve as to every dot as I could possibly do. The brilliant colors and exquisite details is a joy to behold!
translation: 这幅希里亚是一件艺术作品，让我花费了很长时间创作。我用金色书写关于穆圣先知的容貌和特征的描述，每一行，每一条曲线，每一点都尽我最大的努力小心书写。灿烂的颜色和精致的细节带来观赏的快乐！

original: I should send the hilya to the [Root.Religion.GetName] Caliph!
translation: 我应当把这幅希里亚呈给[Root.Religion.GetName]的哈里发！

original: The Caliph [This.GetTitledFirstName] is most pleased with the hilya
translation: 哈里发[This.GetTitledFirstName]非常满意这幅希里亚

original: I should honor my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and send [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] the hilya
translation: 我应当把荣耀归于我的君主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]并把希里亚献给[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is most pleased
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的君主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]非常满意

original: I shall sell this hilya and make a new one with the money
translation: 我应该卖掉这幅希里亚并用这笔钱做一幅新的

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] sent me a hilya [From.GetSheHe] had made [From.GetHerselfHimself], a description of the Prophet Mohammad's appearance and character written in gold on pergament with hopes of it protecting me from trouble in this world and the next.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]送给我一幅[From.GetSheHe]做的希里亚，这是由[From.GetHerselfHimself]做的。用金色在羊皮纸上书写的关于穆圣先知的容貌和特征的描述的一种装饰物，希望它能够保护我不受今生和来生的纷扰。

original: Beautiful! Many thanks to you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 太漂亮了！十分感激你，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Accept this small token of my appreciation for the hilya
translation: 请收下这笔钱，这稍许象征着我对于这幅希里亚的欣赏

original: Did I ask for this? I have hilyas much more intricate and beautiful than this!
translation: 我向你索要过这件东西么？我拥有的希里亚比这幅要复杂和漂亮的多！

original: With the promise of creating a golden Qur'an, with ornaments of gold and cover of solid gold, something only the most skilled and experienced calligraphers would ever be able to create, I might be able to lure my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] for some money!
translation: 黄金古兰经用金线装饰，封面是一整块金子，只有最有技术最有经验的书法家才能制作这种书，我或许可以向我的君主[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]承诺制作这么一本，从而捞上一笔钱！

original: Ask [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to pay for the 'whole book'
translation: 请求[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]为这「整部书」付钱

original: The materials for the 'Golden Qur'an' might be paid for by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 制作「黄金古兰经」的材料费用可能由[This.GetTitledFirstName]来支付

original: Ask [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] to pay for part of it
translation: 请求[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]为它出一部分的钱

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ask [This.GetTitledFirstName] to help pay for the materials for the 'Golden Qur'an'
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]请求[This.GetTitledFirstName]帮助支付制作「黄金古兰经」的材料费用

original: My dream will remain a dream...
translation: 我的梦想仍然虚无缥缈……

original: The idea of a golden Qur'an might be absurd, the cost for the gold alone incredible but I listened patiently as the Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me about [From.GetHerHis] plans and ideas, the approximately cost of the materials needed including the gold and [From.GetHerHis] time estimate. It started to sound promising, then [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me...
translation: 制作黄金古兰经的主意太荒诞了，单是黄金的花费就是惊人的，但我仍然耐心的听宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]向我讲述[From.GetHerHis]计划和主意，以及大致需要的材料费用（包括黄金）和[From.GetHerHis]时间花费。这听上去开始有戏了，接着[From.GetTitledFirstName]请求我……

original: To pay for all the materials? Yes, of course!
translation: 支付所有的材料费用？是的，当然！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will help [This.GetTitledFirstName] by paying for materials for the Golden Qur'an
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]将帮助[This.GetTitledFirstName]支付制作黄金古兰经所需的材料费用

original: To help pay for some of the materials? As long as that is all you need...
translation: 帮助支付一部分的材料费用？只要这就是你要的全部……

original: No, I won't help you. 'Golden Qur'an', absurd!
translation: 不，我不会帮助你。「黄金古兰经」，荒谬！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] refusal to help pay for the Golden Qur'an disappoints [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝帮助支付黄金古兰经的花费使[This.GetTitledFirstName]感到失望

original: With a rough estimate of what the materials for the Golden Qur'an would cost and a time estimate of about six months I managed to make [From.GetTitledFirstName] more than interested in my 'dream' of making a Golden Qur'an...
translation: 我粗略估算了黄金古兰经需要的材料费用以及大概 6 个月的时间花费，成功让[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我制作黄金古兰经的「梦想」大感兴趣……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed to pay for whatever I might need!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同意支付我可能需要的所有费用！

original: My plan worked, [From.GetTitledFirstName] agreed to pay for some of the 'materials'!
translation: 我的计划成功了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]同意支付一部分的「材料」费用！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to pay for 'something so foolish!'
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝为「如此愚蠢的事情」付钱！

original: It has been six months since I agreed to help my Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName] with [From.GetHerHis] dream of creating a Golden Qur'an and I am starting to become suspicious. I have heard no word of progress, nor seen any sign of the Golden Qur'an or its design and I am starting to believe my Court Calligrapher might have deceived me for money!
translation: 自从我同意帮助我的宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]实现[From.GetHerHis]制作黄金古兰经的梦想之后已经过了六个月了，我开始变得有些怀疑。我没有听到任何进展的报告，或者见到任何黄金古兰经的迹象，我开始确信我的宫廷书法家可能骗走了我的金钱！

original: Imprison Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 囚禁宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Banish Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 驱逐宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Make Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName] pay
translation: 让宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]还钱

original: Forgive Court Calligrapher [From.GetTitledFirstName], it's only money!
translation: 原谅宫廷书法家[From.GetTitledFirstName]，那只是金钱罢了！

original: The Golden Qur'an I promised [From.GetTitledFirstName] I would create for the money [From.GetSheHe] gave me to pay for the materials is of course a figment of imagination, a scheme to lure my liege of some money. Somehow [From.GetTitledFirstName] have found out about my scheme and I am being punished by...
translation: 我向[From.GetTitledFirstName]承诺我会制作一本黄金古兰经，从[From.GetSheHe]那里捞到一笔钱说是要花在材料上。这一切当然都是虚构的谎言，只是为了从我的领主那里贪一笔钱罢了。然而不知为何[From.GetTitledFirstName]发现了我的计划，我会被狠狠惩罚……

original: ...being thrown into [From.GetHerHis] dungeons!
translation: ……被扔进[From.GetHerHis]地牢！

original: ...banished from [From.GetHerHis] court!
translation: ……被从[From.GetHerHis]宫廷驱逐！

original: ...my wealth is taken from me!
translation: ……我的财产被没收了！

original: The ghazal's poetic expression of both the pain of separation and the beauty of love in spite of that pain is the perfect poetic form for my next song!
translation: 加扎勒能够同时诗意地表达离别的痛苦和痛苦之下的爱情的美妙，这就是我下一首歌的最佳诗体！

original: I will dedicate this to [Root.Liege.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 我将把它献给[Root.Liege.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Court Musician [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s new song is dedicated to [Root.GetHerHis] liege's wife [Root.Liege.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 宫廷乐师[Root.GetTitledFirstName]把新歌献给了[Root.GetHerHis]君主的妻子[Root.Liege.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will be the first to hear it!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]将会是第一个听到它的人！

original: Court Musician [Root.GetTitledFirstName] sings [Root.GetHerHis] new song for [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 宫廷乐师[Root.GetTitledFirstName]为[This.GetTitledFirstName]演唱[Root.GetHerHis]新歌

original: I need more time before I can master this form
translation: 我需要更长时间来掌握这种诗体

original: My husband's Court Musician [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a wonderful voice and I could barely keep from blushing as I heard [From.GetHerHim] sing [From.GetHerHis] ghazal song about the pain of separation and the beauty of love in spite of that pain...
translation: 我丈夫的宫廷乐师[From.GetTitledFirstName]有一副动听的嗓子，当我听到[From.GetHerHim]唱起[From.GetHerHis]加扎勒的时候我就情不自禁的脸红，歌曲讲述的是离别虽然痛苦但爱情愈加美妙……

original: Wonderful! Our court would be less beautiful without your voice
translation: 精彩！我们的宫廷如果缺少了你的声音就会变得逊色许多

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s appreciation of [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s song gladdens [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对于[This.GetTitledFirstName]的歌曲的欣赏让[This.GetTitledFirstName]十分高兴

original: It is not proper for a [court_musician.GetManWoman] to court a married woman!
translation: [court_musician.GetManWoman]不应该对已婚女性品头论足！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s husband [This.GetTitledFirstName] hears about the Court Musician courting [Root.GetHerHis] wife
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]的丈夫[This.GetTitledFirstName]听说宫廷乐师在追求[Root.GetHerHis]妻子

original: The Court Musician's words and [court_musician.GetHerHis] singing brought justice to the poetic form ghazal, a poetic expression of both the pain of separation and the beauty of love in spite of that pain.
translation: 宫廷乐师的词句与[court_musician.GetHerHis]歌声完美演绎了一场凄美的爱情故事，诗意的歌声表达出离别的痛苦与痛苦之下爱情的美丽。

original: Here, a small token of mine and [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s appreciation...
translation: 这笔钱，聊表我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]对于你的欣赏……

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] both appreciated Court Musician [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s song
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]都很欣赏宫廷乐师[This.GetTitledFirstName]的歌曲

original: How dare you court my wife with this song!?
translation: 你怎么敢用这首歌追求我的妻子！？

original: Court Musician [This.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned for courting [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] with a song
translation: 宫廷乐师[This.GetTitledFirstName]因用一首歌追求[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]而遭到囚禁

original: Play it just one more time, please?
translation: 请再多演奏一次，好吗？

original: Court Musician [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s song is appreciated by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 宫廷乐师[This.GetTitledFirstName]的歌曲得到[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的欣赏

original: As I sang my song, I started to feel true pain of separation from my love and still see the beauty of love. The ghazal was my masterpiece and as I let the last few notes die away I felt tears streaming down my face...
translation: 一唱起我的歌曲，我就开始感到真的同吾爱分别的痛苦并且仍然可以看见爱情的美妙。加扎勒是我的杰作，当我弹出最后几个音符，我感觉到泪水从我的脸庞滑落……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was as touched by the song as I were
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]同我一样被这首歌打动

original: Both [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] appreciated my song
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]都对我的歌曲表示欣赏

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not appreciate me singing this song to his wife!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对我向他的妻子唱这首歌感到不满！

original: 'Through my veins both love and blood flows\nMy beloved fills me as love empties me of myself...'\nAs I struggle with my poem I searched through the garden for an inspiration of some sort...
translation: 「爱与血流过我的血脉\n恋人填满了被爱掏空的我……」\n当我苦思冥想我的诗句的时候，我在花园中找寻某种灵感……

original: I find inspiration in [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and read her the poem
translation: 我在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]身上找到了灵感，并向她念了我的诗句

original: Court Musician [Root.GetTitledFirstName] inspiration is awakened by [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]激发了宫廷乐师[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的灵感

original: The garden inspired me, present the poem to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 花园带给我灵感，把我的诗句呈给[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Court Musician [Root.GetTitledFirstName] inspiration is awakened by [Root.GetHerHis] liege [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s garden
translation: 宫廷乐师[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的灵感来自于[Root.GetHerHis]君主[This.GetTitledFirstName]的花园

original: No inspiration is to be had, the poem will remain unfinished...
translation: 找不到灵感，这首诗仍然不能写完……

original: My husband's garden is an easy place to find inspiration within, and I was slowly walking through it when the Court Poet [From.GetTitledFirstName] startled me. [From.GetSheHeCap] asked my forgiveness and recited a poem [From.GetTitledFirstName] claimed to have gotten inspiration to when [From.GetSheHe] saw me walking.
translation: 我丈夫的花园是一个容易找到灵感的地方，我正在那里慢慢散步的时候宫廷诗人[From.GetTitledFirstName]突然出现吓了我一跳。[From.GetSheHeCap]请求我原谅他的失礼，并向我背诵了一句诗，[From.GetTitledFirstName]声称这是[From.GetSheHe]看见我走路找到的灵感。

original: Not exactly appropriate, but very sweet
translation: 不是非常恰当，但是非常甜蜜

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has nothing but kind words for Court Poet [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s poetry
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对于宫廷诗人[This.GetTitledFirstName]的诗句满口称赞

original: Go away! What will my husband say?!
translation: 走开！如果被我丈夫听见了怎么办？！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is mortified and tells [Root.GetHerHis] husband [This.GetTitledFirstName] about the Court Poet's poetry
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]感觉受到了侮辱，并把宫廷诗人的诗句告诉了[Root.GetHerHis]丈夫[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
The poem did not rhyme, why did it not rhyme? Shouldn't every poem rhyme? I was assured by the Court Poet that not all poetry rhymed and I did like the two first sentences:

'Through my veins both love and blood flows
My beloved fills me as love empties me of myself...'
translation:
这首诗并不押韵，为什么不押韵？每首诗歌不是都应该押韵的么？宫廷诗人向我保证不是所有的诗句都要押韵，我确实喜欢头两句：

「爱与血流过我的血脉
恋人填满了被爱掏空的我……」

original: Good work my dear poet, good work!
translation: 干得好我亲爱的诗人，干得好！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] appreciated the poem, although it did not rhyme
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]对这首诗表示欣赏，虽然它并不押韵

original: Did you try to seduce my wife with this!? Imprison him!
translation: 你想用这首诗追求我的妻子么！？把他关进大牢里！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] imprisons Court Poet [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]囚禁宫廷诗人[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: This is the most beautiful poem I ever heard!
translation: 这是我听过的最美妙的诗句！

original: My new poem was clearly appreciated, people were asking me to make copies of it or just hear me recite it for them. I tried to do this as inconspicuously as possible, I did not want any jealous wife or husbands try to harm me just for a sweet poems sake...
translation: 我的新诗得到了广泛的赞誉，人们都想从我这里得到这首诗的抄本或者听我为他们背诵这首诗。我试图不声不响地做这件事情，我不想仅仅因为写了一首甜蜜的诗歌的缘故就被吃醋的妻子或者丈夫怀恨在心……

original: Seems as [From.GetTitledFirstName] liked it...
translation: 看起来[From.GetTitledFirstName]喜欢这首诗……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] even paid me for a copy!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]甚至想要花钱向我买一个抄本！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not appreciate me getting inspiration from [From.GetHerHis] wife...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不喜欢我从[From.GetHerHis]妻子那儿获得的灵感……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was moved to tears by my poem
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被我的诗篇感动得哭了出来

original: As the Cupbearer I shall serve drinks at the table, guard against poison in my [Root.Liege.GetTitle]'s cup and sometimes test the wine by tasting it to make sure no one has poisoned it. Too bad I do not like my liege and might accidentally serve bad wine...
translation: 作为斟酒人我的职责是为餐桌添酒，保护我的[Root.Liege.GetTitle]的酒杯不被下毒，有时还要品尝酒水来确保里面没有被下毒。糟糕的是我不喜欢我的领主，我可能假装不小心端给他坏掉的酒水……

original: Poison the wine [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will drink
translation: 在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]即将饮用的酒水里下毒

original: The poison was discovered before any damage was done
translation: 在造成伤害之前，毒药被发现了

original: I dare not risk my position at [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court
translation: 我不敢拿我在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]宫廷中的职位来冒险

original: My trustworthy Cupbearer [From.GetTitledFirstName] served the wine as always and even though it did taste a bit strange I did not reflect upon it until it was too late! The wine must have been poisoned, why else would I feel this way?
translation: 我值得信任的斟酒人[From.GetTitledFirstName]像通常一样端酒过来，虽然它尝起来有点奇怪，在我回过神的时候就已经晚了！酒一定有毒，不然的话为什么我会有这样的感觉呢？

original: Imprison that [From.GetManWoman]! Obey my voice!
translation: 把[From.GetManWoman]关起来！执行我的命令！

original: Cupbearer [This.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned by the lunatic [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 斟酒人[This.GetTitledFirstName]被发疯的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]关押起来

original: A night of stomach cramps convinced me of [From.GetTitledFirstName] guilt!
translation: 一整夜的胃部痉挛让我确认了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的罪行！

original: The poison caused nothing more than stomach cramps, Cupbearer [This.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned
translation: 毒药仅仅引起了胃部痉挛，斟酒人[This.GetTitledFirstName]被关押起来

original: I am merciful when I imprison you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]! You should be dead!
translation: 我已经十分仁慈了，因为我仅仅把你关了起来，[From.GetTitledFirstName]！你应该被处死！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s imprisons Cupbearer [This.GetTitledFirstName] but would rather see [This.GetHerHim] dead
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]囚禁了斟酒人[This.GetTitledFirstName]，但是更愿意看到[This.GetHerHim]被处死

original: For Cupbearer is death! I mean, kill [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 让斟酒人去死！我的意思是，杀了[From.GetHerHim]！

original: For your treason you will die!
translation: 你将因为背叛而被处死！

original: I would kill you myself if I had the strength!
translation: 如果我有力气的话我将亲自把你处死！

original: It seems my treason reached the wrong ears! The poison in the wine, why did I trust it to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I should have done it with my own two hands!
translation: 看起来我的背叛一无所获！在酒中下毒，我为什么要相信这种手段可以杀死[From.GetTitledFirstName]呢？我应该用我的双手杀死他！

original: At least the bastard is sick as a dog!
translation: 至少那个杂种病的像条死狗一样！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not even get sick!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]甚至没有感到不适！

original: The poison made [From.GetHerHim] insane at least...
translation: 毒药至少让[From.GetHerHim]精神错乱了……

original: I took a look at some of the architecture plans for the buildings being built in [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm and what I saw chilled my blood. There were so many things that could be improved, so many small faults that could be solved if only [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] would listen to me and provide the money necessary for these changes.
translation: 我看了一些[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的领地正在建设的一些建筑的规划，我看到的东西触目惊心。有太多东西可以得到改进，太多小错误可以解决，只要[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]听从我的意见并为我提供足够的资金。

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] must approve these changes!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]一定会赞成进行这些改进！

original: Chief Architect [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s suggests several changes in the building plans for [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 首席建筑师[Root.GetTitledFirstName]建议为[This.GetTitledFirstName]的建筑规划做一些改进

original: I need more time, there's probably more flaws I can find...
translation: 我需要更多的时间，我还可以找到更多的纰漏……

original: 'You see, this small change might mean five years more without repairs, and this is just absurd, what were they thinking? Let me have the money needed to do these changes and I promise you...'\nThe Chief Architect pointed out several flaws and faults with the building plans and asked for money to prevent them.
translation: 「你看，这处小的改动就可能意味着增加五年的免修期，这太荒谬了，他们在想什么？给我资金做出这些改进，我向你保证……」\n首席建筑师指出建筑规划中的几处纰漏和错误，并请求下拨资金进行改进。

original: Whatever you need, just make these buildings sturdy!
translation: 不管你需要什么，我只要你把这些建筑盖得牢固结实！

original: Chief Architect [This.GetTitledFirstName] is given the money needed to correct flaws in the buildings
translation: 首席建筑师[This.GetTitledFirstName]得到了改进建筑纰漏的资金

original: No, I don't want to waste money on this!
translation: 不，我不想在这上面浪费金钱！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has no desire to waste money on the buildings
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不愿意在这些建筑上浪费金钱

original: I saw before me how the buildings would stand tall and beautiful, without the flaws I had found in the building plans. Before me stood the [From.GetManWoman] who held this in [From.GetHerHis] hand and I waited for [From.GetTitledFirstName] decision, eager to get out there and make the buildings flawless.
translation: 我仿佛看见我在建造计划上找到的纰漏被修复之后，这些建筑在我面前会有多么高大壮丽。决定建造计划的[From.GetManWoman]正站在我面前，我热切地等待着[From.GetTitledFirstName]的决定，盼望着去把这些建筑盖得完美无缺。

original: 'No money for improvements', [From.GetTitledFirstName] said
translation: 「没钱去做改进」，[From.GetTitledFirstName]说道

original: I got the money but now I want to keep it!
translation: 我得到了资金但是现在我想把这笔钱据为己有！

original: I can do so much, save so many buildings from imperfections!
translation: 我可以做这么多的事情，可以把这么多的建筑盖得更加完美！

original: Another building collapsed today! I thought my Chief Architect [From.GetTitledFirstName] had found and corrected these flaws but it seems like [From.GetSheHe] squandered the money away. What should the punishment for this be?
translation: 今天又有一幢建筑倒塌！我本以为我的首席建筑师[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经发现并改进了这些纰漏，但是看起来[From.GetSheHe]把这些钱都浪费掉了。这种行为应该得到什么样的惩罚呢？

original: Imprison Chief Architect [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 囚禁首席建筑师[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Banish Chief Architect [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 驱逐首席建筑师[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Make Chief Architect [From.GetTitledFirstName] pay
translation: 让首席建筑师[From.GetTitledFirstName]赔偿

original: I'm sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] did [From.GetHerHis] best to stop it from happening
translation: 我确信[From.GetTitledFirstName]尽了[From.GetHerHis]最大努力来防止这种事情发生

original: I should have used the money for improvements! Another building collapsed today and [From.GetTitledFirstName] holds me responsible for it. I tremble at the mere thought of whatever punishment [From.GetTitledFirstName] see fit for my failure...
translation: 我本应该用那些钱做出改进的！今天又有一幢建筑倒塌，[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为我应对此负责。我战战兢兢，一心想着[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为什么样的惩罚对于我的失败才是合适的……

original: Imprisonment!
translation: 囚禁！

original: Banishment!
translation: 驱逐！

original: My wealth... forfeited!
translation: 我的财富……被罚没了！

original: Alcoholic beverages are considered haraam in the Islamic faith - forbidden. This, however, has not stopped you from consuming copious amounts of wine and getting plastered on a regular basis.
translation: 酒精饮料是不符合伊斯兰教规的食物，是被禁止的。然而这没有阻止你大量的饮酒，你仍然每天无醉不休。

original: *hic*
Your attraction to those of your same sex is frowned upon by the rest of society, but there are times when you simply grow tired of keeping up appearances. The people do not look kindly on this.
translation: 你对于同性的感情不为社会所容，但是有时你只是厌烦了在众人面前保持形象。人们以不善的眼光看待这种事情。

original: Let them say what they want!
translation: 让他们想说什么说去吧！

original: Some visiting imams walk in on you as your servants are busily smearing your body with honey, covering you from top to bottom. For some reason they react in horror at this sight.
translation: 几位到访的伊玛目走进房间的时候，正看见你的仆人们忙着把蜂蜜从头到脚的涂抹在你身上。出于某些原因他们看到此情此景的反应十分惊恐。

original: What? I left enough for tomorrow's breakfast.
translation: 什么？我为明天的早饭留下了足够的蜂蜜。

original: It is becoming increasingly difficult to conceal your secret vice - impaling your enemies on wooden stakes and listening to their cries of despair. Concerns have been raised about how appropriate this behavior is for someone of your station.
translation: 掩盖你的秘密恶癖变得越来越困难，你喜欢把你的敌人钉在木桩上听着他们绝望的哀号。对于你这样地位的人来说这种行为是否合适已经引起了关注。

original: You will not rob me of the one thing I enjoy in life!
translation: 你不能夺去我生命中唯一的乐趣！

original: Why should you settle for one woman, or two, or a dozen? The carnal pleasures of the flesh beckon, and let no man say you are undeserving!
translation: 你为什么要让你自己流连在一个或者两个或者一打女人身上呢？鲜嫩的肉体能够带来愉悦与诱惑，不要让人说你不配这么做！

original: Come here, my pretty...
translation: 过来，我的小宝贝儿……

original: Your enormous appetite cannot be sated. As the poor of your realm starve, your servants bring delicacies from the most distant lands to your table. A 'light lunch' for you would be enough to feed a peasant family for a week or two.
translation: 你巨大的食欲难以满足。在你领地中的穷人饿死的时候，你的仆人却在忙于把产自遥远大陆上的佳肴送上你的餐桌。你的一顿「简餐」就足够让一个农民家庭吃一到两个星期。

original: Let me just remove my belt...
translation: 让我解掉我的腰带……

original: You have been doing your best to suck the people of [Root.Location.GetName] dry of what few possessions they have. No matter how much of their wealth is channeled your way, you always want more. The lifestyle you have grown accustomed to is an expensive one indeed.
translation: 你一直以来竭尽所能地剥削[Root.Location.GetName]的人民，完全不顾他们的财富已经所剩无几。不管他们的财富有多少都被装进了你的口袋，你总是想要更多的财富。你逐渐习惯上的这种生活方式实在是太花钱了。

original: It is my right.
translation: 这是我的权利。

original: The truly enlightened ruler must conserve all energy for the act of ruling itself. It is for this reason that you have expanded your staff of servants tenfold. Tedious activities such as walking, bringing food to your mouth or the wiping of your regal behind are a thing of the past for you.
translation: 真正聪明的统治者必须把所有的能量保存起来用在统治本身这件事情上。基于此原因你把你的仆人的规模扩大了十倍。例如走路，把饭放进嘴里，或者清理你的小风琴的背面这种无聊的事情从此再也与你无缘了。

original: Ah, yes...
translation: 啊，对了……

original: More and more of your waking hours are being spent comparing your worldly possessions with those of other rulers. For someone of your same station to have a more lavish palace or prettier garments is simply unacceptable.
translation: 每天你花费在比较你和其他统治者的世俗财富上的时间越来越多。你无法忍受一个与你同等地位的人拥有比你更豪华的宫殿或者更美丽的服饰。

original: I deserve only the very best.
translation: 只有最好的东西才配的上我。

original: Your foul temper is frequently discussed in hushed voices among your palace staff. Furniture, silverware, mirrors - everything is fair game when your mood turns bad and you feel the need to break or throw something. If your palace was ever looted, would anyone be able to tell the difference?
translation: 为你的宫殿服务的人经常悄悄讨论你的坏脾气。家具，银器，镜子——在你发怒的时候什么东西都是一样的，你感觉必须打破或者扔掉什么东西才行。你的宫殿就像遭到洗劫了一样。

original: It can all be replaced.
translation: 这些都可以换掉。

original: You order the construction of a massive bronze statue over the main entrance of [Root.Location.GetName] depicting yourself holding a raised sword, challenging the very heavens to strike you down if they dare. This generous gift to the people will help them remember your splendor and brilliance.
translation: 你命令在[Root.Location.GetName]的主入口处建造一座巨型的铜像，描绘的是你的手中高举着剑向天挑战。这件大方的礼物能够帮助人们记住你光辉壮丽的形象。

original: They should be thankful I am their ruler.
translation: 他们应该感谢我是他们的统治者。

original: Your deceitfulness and guile sometimes serve you well, but it has also earned you a reputation among your subjects as someone who is not to be trusted. They simply do not see you as a man of honor.
translation: 你的欺诈和诡计有时让你受益，但是这也让你在你的臣民中有了不可信的名声。他们不把你看作是一个有荣誉感的人。

original: Honour is a weakness I cannot afford.
translation: 荣誉感是一个人性的弱点，我不能承受它。

original: While there are some rulers who take an active role in military affairs, the safety of the palace life is far more appealing to you. Why, if you ventured beyond the palace gates, something could hurt you!
translation: 虽然有的统治者积极的参与军事事务，但是宫殿生活带给你的安全感更加吸引你。因为如果你冒险走出宫殿的大门就会有可能受到伤害！

original: Guards, I don't like the way that child looked at me...
translation: 卫兵，我不喜欢那个小孩儿看我的方式……

original: While there are always those who moan and mutter about the need to continually better oneself and strive for improvement, you are quite content with the way things are now. The land is yours to rule, you have a beautiful palace and the sun still shines warmly.
translation: 虽然总有人对你说一个人需要不断对自身进行改进，但是你对现在的各项事务非常满意。这片陆地在你的统治之下，你拥有一座美丽的宫殿，阳光也还是那么的温暖。

original: There is not a single thing I would change.
translation: 我不会对任何一件事情做出改变。

original: Justice and the rule of law do not interest you, unless they happen to coincide with your own sense of how things should be. Many of your subjects are grumbling about how you seem to hold yourself above the laws they have to observe.
translation: 你对公正和法律规则并不感兴趣，除非它们与你自己的感觉吻合。你的很多臣民抱怨说你把自己的位置摆在法律之上让他们无所适从。

original: I AM the law.
translation: 我就是法律。

original: Your cynical view of all religious matters has resulted in you only observing those elements of the Muslim faith you find convenient and ignoring the rest. Some of your subjects are muttering about this lack of piousness on your part.
translation: 你对于所有宗教事务的玩世不恭的态度使得你只关心穆斯林信仰中那些你认为方便的元素而无视其他。你的一些臣民悄悄议论说由这点可以看出你缺乏虔诚心。

original: Oh, let them mutter.
translation: 哦，让他们说去吧。
