original: You suspect everyone around you of treachery, to the point where your servants and staff are terrified of even breathing in your presence. The size and influence of your palace guard has increased tenfold as everything, good or bad, has to pass through them before reaching you.
translation: 你怀疑身边的每一个人的忠诚，使得你的仆人和官员甚至都不敢当着你的面大声呼吸。你的宫殿卫兵的人数已经翻了十倍，每一件事情，不论是好是坏，都要在呈给你之前经过他们的检验。

original: They will not catch me unawares.
translation: 他们不会让我在无意识之中被人暗害。

original: You take great pleasure in inflicting cruel punishments on your servants and subjects. If there is no reason to punish them, you find it easy enough to invent one.
translation: 你以对你的仆人和臣民施以残酷的刑罚来取乐。如果没有惩罚他们的罪名，你只需要发明一个新的即可。

original: I will teach you not to blink so much in my presence...
translation: 我会让你记住不要在我面前眨那么多次眼……

original: You always seem to be thinking several steps ahead of the people near you. There are few people alive who can match your mental prowess, and when your intellect is focused on a single problem, people know a solution will be found.
translation: 你似乎总是比你身边的人考虑的更为长远。世上没有几个人能够与你的智力相媲美，当你的聪明才智集中在一个问题上的时候，人们就知道它将会得到解决。

original: Allah (glorified and exalted be He) does not play dice.
translation: 安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）早已决定一切。

original: Your decision to put aside your carnal desires and lead a life of celibacy is applauded by the people, either because they admire your sacrifice or because they are relieved you are less likely to procreate.
translation: 你决定把你的肉体欲望放在一边并开始过禁欲生活，这得到了你的人民的欢迎，也许是因为他们仰慕你做出的如此巨大的牺牲，也许是因为他们对于你今后会少生孩子而感到如释重负。

original: I did it for you!
translation: 我做这些都是为了你们！

original: As a dedicated scholar, you have gained many valuable insights from all the tomes you have studied. From the Quran to ancient treatises on farming techniques and history, there is great wisdom to be found in all.
translation: 作为一名专业的学者，你从你读过的所有巨著中吸收了很多重要的知识。从古兰经到古代关于农业技巧和历史的著作，里面都有伟大的智慧待人发掘。

original: There is so much to learn.
translation: 有太多东西要学习了。

original: Your chaste and virtuous lifestyle is held as an example even far beyond the borders of those lands belonging to you. If only all men lived thus.
translation: 你高雅正直的生活方式为人称赞，就连离你的国境很远的国家都把你奉为典范。要是所有的人都像你这样生活就好了。

original: The world would be a better place.
translation: 世界会变得更加美好。

original: Where other rulers often abuse their positions and give in to excess, you have always valued moderation in all things. This quality is admired by the people you rule.
translation: 虽然其他的统治者经常无节制地滥用他们的地位带来的权力，你总是把每一件事情都处理的不过不失。这种品质被你统治下的人民所敬仰。

original: Indulgence leads to weakness.
translation: 放纵是人性的弱点。

original: You are always ready to give to those less fortunate than yourself, and when a rockslide destroyed the homes of several poor families in [Root.Location.GetName], you offered them temporary lodgings in your palace.
translation: 你总是乐于帮助那些比你贫穷的人，当一场塌方摧毁了[Root.Location.GetName]的几户贫困家庭的房屋的时候，你让他们临时地住在你的宫殿里。

original: Every day the sun rises, charity is due on every joint of a person.
translation: 太阳每天都升起，施济对于每个人来说都是应做的。

original: Your tireless and diligent work as their ruler has not gone unnoticed by your people. Some have dubbed you 'He Who Appears Everywhere' and claim you possess supernatural powers to exist in more than one place at once.
translation: 你治下的民众并没有忽视你作为他们的统治者不知疲倦的辛勤工作。有人给你起了「分身万千」的绰号，并说你有超自然的力量能够在不同的地点同时现身。

original: I have never been afraid of a little hard work.
translation: 我从来不会被小小的困难吓倒。

original: You have become renowned for your kind rule, and your people love you for it. There are those who would call you soft, but even they are impressed by the devotion your subjects show you.
translation: 由于你的良好治理，你的名声大振，你的人民热爱你的统治。虽然也有人称这是「软弱」，但是甚至连他们都被你的臣民表现出的忠心所打动。

original: The carrot, not the stick.
translation: 胡萝卜比大棒好用。

original: Your ability to plan for the long-term and see the big picture has served you well as a ruler. Future generations will thank you for the work you do today!
translation: 你的长远规划能力对你的统治辅助良多。下一代人会感激你现在做的工作！

original: Great things come to those who wait.
translation: 只有有耐心的人才能成就大事。

original: You always strive to be humble, never forgetting the roots of yourself and your ancestors. There are many lessons from the past that must still be heeded today.
translation: 你总是努力保持谦卑，不忘记你和你的祖先和的根基所在。许多过去的教训在今天仍然需要注意。

original: I will not forget.
translation: 我不会忘记。

original: Your honest nature and tendency to speak what is on your mind has ruffled a few feathers in the past, but it has also earned you great respect. People know that your words ring true.
translation: 你坦诚的天性和想什么就说什么的习惯曾经让你数次激怒过别人，但是这也给你带来极大的尊重。人们知道你的话的都是出自真心。

original: The truth is the truth.
translation: 事实就是事实。

original: Your enemies would accuse you of many things, but not even they would label you a coward. It is well known that you are fearless and always willing to share the dangers faced by your men.
translation: 你的敌人可以指控你许多罪行，但是连他们也不会给你贴上懦夫的标签。众所周知你无所畏惧，总是希望同你的部下一起分担危险。

original: Never give in to fear.
translation: 永不向畏惧投降。

original: You are an ambitious man, always striving to improve and do better. The people know this, and though some of your decisions may be unpopular, they are usually at least seen as progressive.
translation: 你是一个有雄心的男人，总是想要努力做得更好。你的人民知道这点，虽然你的一些决定不太受欢迎，他们通常至少把这看作是积极进取的。

original: Why settle for mediocrity?
translation: 为什么甘愿平庸呢？

original: Just and fair in all things, your people rest easy in the knowledge that no matter what, you can always be depended on to observe the rule of law.
translation: 你在所有事情上面做到公平公正，由于你的人民知道不管是什么事情你都可以依照法律秉公处理，所以他们都可以安心。

original: Law should govern.
translation: 法律应该支配一切。

original: No one can question your devotion to Allah and the teachings of his Prophet (peace be upon him). You can always be counted on to put your faith ahead of yourself.
translation: 没有人可以质疑你对于安拉和他的先知（愿主福安之）的教诲的献身。你总是可以被期望把信仰放在你自身前面。

original: Laa ilaha ilallah!
translation: 万物非主，唯有安拉！

original: You have proven your devotion to Allah (may He be glorified and exalted) by making war against the enemies of Islam. As one of the mujahideen, you are acknowledged to have fought in a Jihad.
translation: 你已经通过向伊斯兰的敌人开战证明了你对安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）的献身。作为骑士团的一员，你得到了参与过吉哈德的认可。

original: The best jihad is the one in which your horse is slain and your blood is spilled.
translation: 只有在战争中跑死你的战马，泼洒你的鲜血才是最好的吉哈德。

original: You have completely memorized the Quran, an accomplishment that not only shows your devotion to Allah (glorified and exalted be He), but which has also won you great respect as a ruler.
translation: 你已经完整背记下了古兰经，这一成果不仅显示了你对于安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）的献身，而且为你的统治赢得了极大的尊重。

original: It was not easy.
translation: 这并不简单。

original: It is a well known fact that you have completed the Hajj and thus shown your submission and devotion to Allah (may He be glorified and exalted). Whatever else they may say about you, no one can take this away.
translation: 众所周知你已经去过麦加朝圣，这显示了你对于安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）的屈服和献身。不管其他人说你什么，都不能抹去这一点。

original: It was my duty.
translation: 这是我的责任。

original: Being the Food Taster for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] can be a dangerous job. I am supposed to taste the food and drink to be served to [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to make sure it is safe to eat, not poisonous or tastes strange. Lately, I have been secretly trying to become immune to different poisons for I am under the grip of the fear of death.
translation: 为[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的食物试毒是一项危险的工作。我必须预先品尝呈给[Root.Liege.GetHerHim]的饮食，以此来确保它是安全的，而不是有毒或者尝起来奇怪的。最近我开始秘密的尝试让我自己对各种毒药带有抗药性，因为我陷入了对于死亡的恐惧中。

original: If [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] would die because I am immune, even better!
translation: 如果[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]会因为我的抗毒而死掉，那就更好了！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] finds out about
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]发现了这件事情

original: It is my job to keep my liege safe, I shouldn't try to become immune to poisons!
translation: 保护我的君主的安全是我的工作，我不应该尝试对于毒药有抗药性！

original: The food tasted a bit strange, something was hidden beneath the seasoning but I trusted Food Taster [From.GetTitledFirstName] would never serve me anything that might be poisoned. Oh, how I regretted that trust later that evening, when the stomach pains erupted...
translation: 这食物尝起来有点奇怪，调味品掩盖了什么东西，但是我相信为我试毒的[From.GetTitledFirstName]不会呈给我任何可能带毒的东西。哦，当天晚上我就突然开始胃痛，我对这种信任后悔无比……

original: For Foodtaster is death! I mean, kill [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 让试毒者去死！我是说，杀了[From.GetHerHim]！

original: Food Taster [This.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned by the lunatic [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 试毒者[This.GetTitledFirstName]被发疯的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]关了起来

original: The poison caused nothing more than stomach cramps, Food Taster [This.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned
translation: 毒药仅仅引起胃部痉挛，试毒者[This.GetTitledFirstName]被关押起来

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s imprisons Food Taster [This.GetTitledFirstName] but would rather see [This.GetHerHim] dead
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]把试毒者[This.GetTitledFirstName]关了起来，但是更希望看到[This.GetHerHim]的死亡

original: My plan to become immune to poisons did not turn out so good, I missed the poisoned food intended for [From.GetTitledFirstName] and that is how I ended up in [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s dungeon...
translation: 我让自己变得抗毒的计划实现的并不理想，我漏过了针对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的带毒的食物，我也因此被关在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的地牢里……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] became gravely ill by the poisoned food
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]因为带毒的食物重病不起

original: The poison did not even make [From.GetTitledFirstName] sick!
translation: 这毒药甚至没有让[From.GetTitledFirstName]感到丝毫不适！

original: I fear the poison made [From.GetTitledFirstName] mad
translation: 我害怕毒药把[From.GetTitledFirstName]弄疯了

original: A man named Al-Ghazali has returned to [Root.GetName] after seven years of studying fiqh, the expansion of the code of conduct called sharia. His scholarly interest in sufism, kalam, philosophy, logic and Islamic jurisprudence has led him to start writing a book he calls 'The Incoherence of the Philosophers' which will surely be a masterpiece when it is finished.
translation: 在学习教法七年之后安萨里返回了[Root.GetName]。他在苏菲、卡拉姆、哲学、逻辑学和伊斯兰法学的兴趣促使他开始写书，他将他写作的书籍称为《哲学家的矛盾》，待书籍完本后必将是一部杰作。

original: I must introduce this man to my liege!
translation: 我得向领主引荐此人！

original: Al-Ghazali meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 安萨里参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Al-Ghazali, the scholar from [From.GetName], was well-spoken and respectful, with an incredible knowledge of sufism, kalam, philosophy, logic and fiqh. I invited him to stay at my court, to study and share his knowledge with my court.
translation: 安萨里，出身于[From.GetName]的学者，他拥有良好的表述能力和广受尊重的声誉，在苏菲，卡拉姆，哲学，逻辑学和教律学的成就达到了一个令人难以置信的境界。我邀请他留在我的宫廷内研究，并和我的宫廷分享他的知识。

original: Stay as long as you like
translation: 你想在这里呆多久就呆多久

original: A famous traveller, Muhammad al-Idrisi - a geographer, cartographer and Egyptologist - has arrived to [Root.GetName], a man who can trace his descent through long line of Princes, Caliphs and Sufi leaders, to the Prophet Muhammad. Muhammad al-Idrisi wishes to meet [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 一位著名的旅行家，地理学家，制图家和埃及古物学家穆罕默德·伊德里西来到了[Root.GetName]，他的血统可以穿越诸多王公、哈里发和苏菲派领袖，上诉到穆圣先知本人。穆罕默德·伊德里西希望参见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I will introduce you to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim] immediately!
translation: 我马上把你引见给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]！

original: Muhammad al-Idrisi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 穆罕默德·伊德里西参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: A most fascinating man, that traveller Muhammad al-Idrisi! He is a geographer, cartographer and Egyptologist and his famous map Tabula Rogeriana has I myself many times consulted. Muhammad al-Idrisi asks for permission to stay at my court and work on his book 'Kitab nuzhat al-mushtaq' or 'A Diversion for the Man Longing to Travel to Far-Off Places'...
translation: 那个旅行者穆罕默德·伊德里西很有意思！他是一个制图家，地理学家和埃及古物学家，我曾经参考过无数次他制作的著名的若格瑞纳地图。穆罕默德·伊德里西向我请求许可他呆在我的宫廷中，以创作他的《云游者的娱乐》一书……

original: Certainly! You are welcome to stay here as long as you'd like
translation: 当然可以！欢迎你在这里，想呆多久就呆多久

original: A prominent scholar in [Root.GetName] - Ibn Khaldun - who is currently working on the first book of seven of 'Kitabu l-'ibar wa Diwanu l-Mubtada' wa l-Habar fi tarikhi l-'arab wa l-Barbar wa man 'Asarahum min Ðawi Ash-Sha'n l-Akbar' or 'Book of lessons, Record of Beginnings and Events in the history of the Arabs and Berbers and their Powerful Contemporaries' is looking for a patron and is humbly asking me to present him to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [Root.GetName]的一个杰出的学者——伊本·赫勒敦——着手于自己的七部著作中的第一本《阿拉伯人、波斯人、柏柏尔人古今历史大纲》，正在寻求赞助并且谦卑地恳求我将他引荐给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: I would be honored to!
translation: 我会怀以敬意引荐你！

original: Ibn Khaldun meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·赫勒敦参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Ibn Khaldun from [From.GetName] honored me when he allowed me to thumb through the first few pages of 'Book of lessons, Record of Beginnings and Events in the history of the Arabs and Berbers and their Powerful Contemporaries', a book that would grow into seven books over several years.
translation: 出身于[From.GetName]的伊本·赫勒敦很尊敬我，容许我翻阅他的《阿拉伯人、波斯人、柏柏尔人古今历史大纲》，这本书未来几年将会扩充到七本之多。

original: I would be honored to have you as my guest while you work on your book
translation: 你在我这里作客写作是我的荣耀

original: Zakariya al-Qazwini from [Root.GetName], who has written a cosmography titled 'Athar al-bilad wa-akhbar al-‘ibad' or 'Marvels of Creatures and Strange Things Existing', is currently working on a geographical dictionary and is keen on talking to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] to ask for [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis] patronage.
translation: 来自[Root.GetName]的扎卡利亚·伊本·穆罕默德·卡兹维尼，《创造的奥妙和现存事物的神奇一面》的作者，正在为他的地理学词典与[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]热烈攀谈，寻求[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis]赞助。

original: I will take you to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]
translation: 我会带你去见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]

original: Zakariya al-Qazwini meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 扎卡里亚·卡兹维尼参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I am more than familiar with Zakariya al-Qazwini from [Root.GetName], his cosmography titled 'Athar al-bilad wa-akhbar al-‘ibad' or 'Marvels of Creatures and Strange Things Existing' has long delighted me and taught me more about the strange animals and creatures in our world. Now he is working on yet another book, this time a geographical dictionary and he has asked me for my patronage.
translation: 我非常熟悉[Root.GetName]的扎卡利亚·伊本·穆罕默德·卡兹维尼，他的宇宙志著作《创造的奥妙和现存事物的神奇一面》，告诉了我们世界上的珍奇动物与奇异物种。现在扎卡利亚·伊本·穆罕默德·卡兹维尼正在写关于地理学词典的著作，并向我寻求赞助。

original: I cannot wait to read your next book!
translation: 我迫不及待地想读你的下一本书！

original: A young scholar and teacher named Al-Juwayni in [Root.GetName], originally from Nishapur, has requested an audience with [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] to ask for permission to teach the Ashari theological perspective to all who wishes to learn more.
translation: 一名生于内沙布尔，来自[Root.GetName]的年轻学者和教师朱韦尼，请求觐见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]，来要求许可给所有希望了解更多的人教授艾什尔里神学观点。

original: Let me see what I can do...
translation: 让我看看有什么是我可以做的……

original: Al-Juwayni meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 朱韦尼参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I have been fascinated with the Ashari theological perspective, especially the notion that complete comprehension of the Unique Nature and Attributes of Allah is beyond the capacity of human reasoning and sense experience. The young scholar Al-Juwayni, a teacher of the Ashari theological perspective has asked my permission to start teaching all who wishes in [From.GetName].
translation: 我一直着迷艾什尔里的神学观点，尤其是安拉的独一性和本原超出了人类理性和感官的理解范围。年轻的学者、艾什尔里教师朱韦尼向我请求允许，希望开始向[From.GetName]的求学者授课。

original: Excellent! You have my permission
translation: 很棒！我允许你

original: In [Root.GetName], a prominent scholar named Kamal al-Din al-Farisi has just published his first book titled 'Asas al-qawa'id fi usul al-fawa'id' or 'The base of the rules in the principles of uses' and he is eager to show it to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 在[Root.GetName]，一个著名学者卡玛尔丁·法尔斯刚出版了他的第一本著作《实用原理的规则基础》，他渴望把这本书展示给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] is as eager to meet you as you are to meet [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]!
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]如同你想见到[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]一般想见到你！

original: Kamal al-Din al-Farisi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 卡玛尔丁·法尔斯会见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Five chapters of arithmetic, notarial and sales rules, the areas of surfaces and solids, with the last two essays are on algebra, the book 'Asas al-qawa'id fi usul al-fawa'id' or 'The base of the rules in the principles of uses' written by Kamal al-Din al-Farisi is fascinating if you enjoy arithmetic. The man himself has asked for my patronage.
translation: 卡马尔丁·法尔斯的《实用原理的规则基础》有五章内容，分别讨论了算数、公证和销售规则、表面积和体积，以及最后两章关于代数的内容，如果你喜欢算数，你一定会为之着迷。现在他正向我寻求赞助。

original: A renowned scholar like you is always welcomed at my court
translation: 我的宫廷总是欢迎您这样的知名学者

original: A physician in [Root.GetName], Rashid-al-Din Hamadani, is writing a book he will call 'Jami' al-tawarikh' or 'Compendium of Chronicles', a book that will encompass all the history of the world as it has been when it is finished. The cost of producing this book is too great for a mere physician and so he has come to ask [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] if [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetSheHe] would be willing to help produce the book.
translation: 一名[Root.GetName]的医生，拉施德丁·哈马丹尼，正在编写一本叫《史集》的书，一本囊括从爱尔兰到契丹的世界历史书。编纂这本书的工作量对一名医生来说实在是过于庞大，所以他来询问[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]是否[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetSheHe]愿意帮助他的编纂工作。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] will see if this is agreeable
translation: 如果要求合理我会转告[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的

original: Rashid al-Din Hamadani meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 拉施德丁·哈马丹尼会见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: A book on world history and you want me to help produce it? Rashid al-Din Hamadani, though your idea sound reasonable enough, why would you consider me to help you produce 'Jami' al-tawarikh' or 'Compendium of Chronicles'? I am interested though...
translation: 你想让我帮忙编著一部世界历史的书？拉施德丁·哈马丹尼，你说得很有道理，可你为什么要找我来帮你编著这本《史集》呢？虽然我确实很感兴趣……

original: Let us see what we can do together...
translation: 看看我们能做些什么……

original: Ibn al-Nafis studied medicine, jurisprudence, literature and theology at Bimaristan Al-Noori in [Root.GetName]. His book 'Kitab al-Mukhtar fi al-Aghdhiya' on the effects of diet on health has been praised as one of the most important work on medicine in several years. The man is now looking for work, maybe as a physician at [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court.
translation: 伊本·纳菲斯在[Root.GetName]研究医学、法学、文学、神学。他的作品《饮食选择》说明了饮食对健康的影响 ，被誉为近几年在医学上的重要著作。他正在找工作，也许我们该给他[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷医师之职。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would be pleased to have you as [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis] physician
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]很高兴你能当[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis]医师

original: Ibn al-Nafis meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·纳菲斯会见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I have never doubted that what you eat affects your health, but Ibn al-Nafis book 'Kitab al-Mukhtar fi al-Aghdhiya' made me realize how your health could deteriorate if you weren't too careful with what you ate or drank. I was therefore both grateful and honored when the physician Ibn al-Nafis asked me for a place in my court.
translation: 我从来没有想过，吃东西会影响健康，但是 伊本·纳菲斯所著的《饮食选择》使我认识到如果不担心饮食，健康可能恶化。因此，伟大的医生伊本·纳菲斯能在我的宫廷中任职，我感到既感激又荣幸。

original: I would never refuse such a great physician anything!
translation: 我永远不会拒绝这样一个伟大医生的要求！

original: The book 'Kitab al-Mu'tabar' or 'The Book of What Has Been Established by Personal Reflection' by Abu'l-Barakat al-Baghdadi has recently been produced in [Root.GetName] and [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] is most curious of the man to write such an anti-Aristotelian philosophical work.
translation: 艾布柏巴拉卡特· 巴格达迪最近在[Root.GetName]将他的《个人沉思录》一书撰写完成，[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]对写出了这样一部反亚里士多德主义的哲学著作的人非常好奇。

original: My liege wishes to talk to you, Abu'l-Barakat al-Baghdadi
translation: 我的领主想请你谈谈，艾布柏巴拉卡特·巴格达迪先生

original: Abu'l-Barakat al-Baghdadi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 艾布柏巴拉卡特·巴格达迪参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: An extraordinary anti-Aristotelian philosophical work 'Kitab al-Mu'tabar' or 'The Book of What Has Been Established by Personal Reflection', but who is the man behind the book, this Abu'l-Barakat al-Baghdadi? After hours of discussing philosophy with Abu'l-Barakat al-Baghdadi I offered him a place at my court, to make sure he could continue writing his books.
translation: 《个人沉思录》是一部反亚里士多德主义的非凡哲学著作，但写这本书的人是谁呢？是这个叫艾布柏巴拉卡特· 巴格达迪的男人吗？在与艾布柏巴拉卡特· 巴格达迪讨论了几个小时的哲学后，我在我的宫廷里给他留下了一席之地，以确保他能继续他的创作。

original: Welcome!
translation: 欢迎！

original: Avempace or Abu-Bakr Muhammad ibn Yahya ibn al-Sayigh, an astronomer, logician, musician, philosopher, physician, physicist, psychologist, botanist, poet and scientist in [Root.GetName] has caught [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] attention with his book 'Kitab al-Nabat' or 'The Book of Plants' and his other works.
translation: 阿芬帕斯，本名阿布·贝克尔·穆罕默德·伊本·叶海亚·伊本·萨伊格·图吉比·伊本·巴哲·图吉比，一位出身于[Root.GetName]的天文学家，逻辑学家，音乐家，哲学家，医学家，心理学家，植物学家，诗人和科学家，由于他的著作《植物之书》和其他作品，引起了[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的注意。

original: Avempace, [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would like to meet you
translation: 阿芬帕斯，[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]愿意会见你

original: Avempace meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 阿芬帕斯参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: 'Knowledge cannot be acquired by senses alone but by Active Intelligence, which is the governing intelligence of nature'\nA great quote from a great man, Avempace has been brought to my attention by his book 'Kitab al-Nabat' or 'The Book of Plants' and the essay 'Recognition of the Active Intelligence'. The man gladly accepted a place at my court.
translation: 「知识不能仅仅靠感官获得，还要靠自然的统治智慧——能动性的智慧」\n写出这伟大论述的伟人，阿芬帕斯，已经用他的著作《植物之书》和随笔《认识能动的智慧》引起了我的注意。他欣然答应了前来我的宫廷效力。

original: Welcome, and don't hesitate to ask if you need anything at all
translation: 欢迎，如果你需要什么东西请不要客气

original: Suggest Fatwa Against [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 建议发布针对的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]教令

original: [Root.GetTitledName] is known for the decadent ways of [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty. Convince your [From.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to issue a fatwa against [Root.GetHerHim]. This would make it easier to revoke titles and grant them to someone more deserving...
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]以在[Root.GetHerHis]家族中堕落而人尽皆知。说服你的[From.GetMyLordSpiritualName]发出针对[Root.GetHerHim]的教令。这将让你更轻易地剥夺他的头衔，并将它给予更加合适的人……

original: You suggest someone deserving of a fatwa to your [From.GetMyLordSpiritualName].
translation: 你向[From.GetMyLordSpiritualName]提议发布针对某人的伊斯兰教令。

original: The poet Nizami Ganjavi from [Root.GetName] has completed his epic 'Khosrow and Shirin', a tragic love story. Even [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] has heard of the epic and has sent for Nizami Ganjavi...
translation: 来自[Root.GetName]的诗人尼扎米·甘伽维完成了他的长篇爱情悲剧《霍斯鲁和西琳》。甚至连[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]都听说了这首诗并且派人去请尼扎米·甘伽维……

original: I'll take him to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我会把他带去参见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Nizami Ganjavi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 尼扎米·甘伽维参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I offered my condolences to Nizami Ganjavi, whose wife died not long after he completed his epic 'Khosrow and Shirin', a tragic love story. The more I talked to the poet from [From.GetName], the more I wanted Nizami Ganjavi to stay at my court and entertain me with his poetry.
translation: 我对于尼扎米的妻子在他完成《霍斯鲁和西琳》后不久死去的消息表达了哀悼，这本书是一本长篇叙事诗，讲述了一个爱情悲剧。我同这位来自[From.GetName]的诗人谈论地越多，我就越想让尼扎米·甘伽维留在我的宫廷让我得以欣赏他的诗歌。

original: 'Stay awhile and listen...'
translation: 「留步且听我一言……」

original: 'Nafa'is al-funun fi ‘ara'is al-‘uyun', a Persian encyclopedia on the classification of knowledge by Muhammad ibn Mahmud al-Amuli is widely-read in [Root.GetName]. The man wishes to speak with [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] and present to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim] a copy of his book as a gift...
translation: 《知识之美》，穆罕默德·伊本·马哈茂德·阿姆里编撰的波斯知识分类百科全书在[Root.GetName]广为传阅。这个人希望与[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]交谈，并将自己书的副本作为礼物送给了[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]……

original: I don't think [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would oppose such a gift
translation: 我不认为[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]反对这样的礼物

original: Muhammad ibn Mahmud al-Amuli meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 穆罕默德·本·马哈茂德·阿姆里会见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I have heard of the scholar from [From.GetName] and his Persian encyclopedia on the classification of knowledge titled 'Nafa'is al-funun fi ‘ara'is al-‘uyun', the man named Muhammad ibn Mahmud al-Amuli, and I had been wanting to read his book since I first heard of it. Muhammad ibn Mahmud al-Amuli came to my court to give me a copy of his book.
translation: 我已经听说过[From.GetName]学者穆罕默德·本·马哈茂德·阿姆里的言论和他的波斯知识分类百科全书《知识之美》，我从第一次听说就一直想读他的书。穆罕默德·本·马哈茂德·阿姆里来到我的宫廷给了我副本。

original: Thank you, that was most gracious of you!
translation: 谢谢你，伟大而高贵的你！

original: A man with many passions, Jalal ad-Din Muhammad Balkhi or Rumi believes passionately in the use of music, poetry and dance as a path for reaching Allah and the people of [Root.GetName] says of him: 'He is not a prophet — but surely, he has brought a scripture'.
translation: 贾拉尔丁·穆罕默德·巴尔希，又名鲁米，是一个充满激情的男人，他热情地相信音乐、诗歌和舞蹈可以把人领上通向安拉的道路，[Root.GetName]的百姓这么说：「他不是先知——但毫无疑问，他带来了一部经籍。」

original: This is a man [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] should meet!
translation: 应当让[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]会见这个人！

original: Rumi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 鲁米参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The book 'Matnawiye Ma'nawi' or 'Spiritual Couplets' is by some Sufis regarded as a Persian Qur'an and the author Jalal ad-Din Muhammad Balkhi or Rumi believes passionately in the use of music, poetry and dance as a path for reaching Allah. His words and teachings are intriguing and I wish to know more about Rumi and his philosophy.
translation: 《玛斯纳维耶·玛纳维》（灵性的对句诗）被一些苏菲派喻为波斯语的《古兰经》，它的作者是贾拉尔丁·穆罕默德·巴尔希，又名鲁米，他热情地相信音乐、诗歌和舞蹈可以把人领上通向安拉的道路。他的诗句和教诲引人入胜，我想对鲁米和他的哲学了解地更多。

original: Tell me more, teach me how to reach Allah through the divine arts!
translation: 告诉我更多，教导我怎样通过神圣的艺术通向安拉！

original: Baha-ud-Din Naqshband Bukhari from [Root.GetName], the founder and spiritual master of Naqshbandi, is requesting an audience with [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 巴哈丁·纳格什班德·布哈里来自[Root.GetName]，是纳格什班迪教团的创始人和精神导师，他要求觐见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: It must be important if he is requesting an audience with the [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]!
translation: 如果他要求觐见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]，那么一定是有重要的事情！

original: Baha-ud-Din Naqshband meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 巴哈丁·纳格什班德·布哈里参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The Sufi order Naqshbandi is well-known in [From.GetName] and its founder and spiritual Master Baha-ud-Din Naqshband Bukhari has come to discuss some important matters with me, possibly involving their eleven principal teachings, such as for example Remembrance, Restraint or Recollection.
translation: 苏菲派纳格什班迪教团在[From.GetName]众所周知，它的创始人和精神导师巴哈丁·纳格什班德·布哈里想跟我讨论一些重要的事情，可能涉及十一个主要教义，如纪念、自制、回忆等。

original: And a most giving meeting it was
translation: 马上安排会面

original: The Persian philosopher Shahab al-Din Suhrawardi is the founder of Oriental Theosophy in [Root.GetName], whose Islamic Mysticism school draws upon Zoroastrian and Platonic ideas. [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] is more than interested to meet Shahab al-Din Suhrawardi and discuss his latest book 'Partaw Nama' or 'Treatise on Illumination'.
translation: 波斯哲学家谢哈布丁·苏哈拉瓦迪在[Root.GetName]创立了光照学派，他的伊斯兰神秘主义学派受到柏拉图学派和祆教的思想影响。[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]对于与谢哈布丁·苏哈拉瓦迪会见十分感兴趣并讨论了他最近的著作《光照论》。

original: Very well, then
translation: 很好，那么接下来

original: Shahab al-Din Suhrawardi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 谢哈布丁·苏哈拉瓦迪参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The Islamic Mysticism school Oriental Theosophy founded by Shahab al-Din Suhrawardi, an Persian philosopher, draws upon Zoroastrian and Platonic ideas. Lately I have been struggling with some philosophical problems myself, but after talking to Shahab al-Din Suhrawardi and reading his 'Partaw Nama' or 'Treatise on Illumination' I feel as if my questions has been answered.
translation: 伊斯兰神秘主义学派光照学派由波斯哲学家谢哈布丁·苏哈拉瓦迪创立，受柏拉图学派和祆教的思想影响。最近我自己正在困扰于一些哲学问题，但是在同谢哈布丁·苏哈拉瓦迪谈话并阅读了他的《光照论》一书之后，我认为我的问题得到了解答。

original: Stay and tell me more about the Oriental Theosophy
translation: 留下来然后告诉我更多关于光照学派的事情

original: Athir al-Din al-Abhari from [Root.GetName] has written many books about astronomy, mathematics and philosophy, among them are 'Kitab al-Hidayah' or 'Guide on Philosophy' and 'Risala fi al-hay'a' or 'Treatise on astronomy'.
translation: 阿希尔丁·阿布哈里来自[Root.GetName]，他一生写了许多有关天文学，数学和哲学的著作，其中有《哲学指南》和《天文学论述》

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] has expressed an wish to meet him
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]希望能接见他

original: Athir al-Din al-Abhari meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 阿希尔丁·阿布哈里参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I have invited Athir al-Din al-Abhari from [Root.GetName], the author of 'Kitab al-Hidayah' or 'Guide on Philosophy' and 'Risala fi al-hay'a' or 'Treatise on astronomy', to come to my court so that I may have someone to discuss philosophy with.
translation: 我已经邀请[Root.GetName]的阿希尔丁·阿布哈里，《哲学指南》、《天文学论述》的作者来我的宫廷，这样就可以一起讨论哲学。

original: He graciously accepted my invite
translation: 他欣然接受了我的邀请

original: Nasir al-Din al-Tusi from [Root.GetName], famous for his book 'Al-Tadhkirah fi'ilm al-hay'ah' or 'A memoir on the science of astronomy', wants to convince [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] to construct an observatory for establishing accurate astronomical tables for better astrological predictions.
translation: [Root.GetName]的纳西尔丁·图西——因其著作《天文学回忆录》而著名——希望能说服[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]建造一座天文台，以便编制更准确的星表，做出更好的天文学预测。

original: Go ahead, I believe you are able to convince [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]
translation: 去吧，我相信你能够说服[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHim]

original: Nasir al-Din al-Tusi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 纳西尔丁·图西参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: 'An observatory? What for? 'Establishing accurate astronomical tables for better astrological predictions', what does that even mean? I will have to think about it.'\nNasir al-Din al-Tusi from [From.GetName] famous for his book 'Al-Tadhkirah fi'ilm al-hay'ah' or 'A memoir on the science of astronomy' wants permission from me to build an observatory.
translation: 「天文台？为什么？『为了更好地观测星象，以便绘制精确的天文表』，这是什么意思？我要好好想想。」\n来自[From.GetName]的纳西尔丁·图西《天文学回忆录》的作者希望我许可建造一座天文台。

original: I will give you my permission, nothing more!
translation: 我会给你我的许可，仅此而已！

original: Abu Merwan ’Abdal-Malik ibn Zuhr from [Root.GetName] has improved surgical and medical knowledge by keying out several diseases and their treatments. He has completed a book, 'Al-Taisir Fil-Mudawat Wal-Tadbeer' or 'Book of Simplification Concerning Therapeutics and Diet' which he wishes to present to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 艾布·玛望·阿布杜·玛利克·伊本·祖赫尔来自[Root.GetName]，他确定了几种疾病及其治疗方法，改善了外科和医学知识。他编撰了《论简化治疗和饮食的方法》 ，希望呈给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] will welcome Ibn Zuhr warmly to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis] court
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]将热烈欢迎伊本·祖赫尔来到[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis]宫廷

original: Ibn Zuhr meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·祖赫尔参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: 'Al-Taisir Fil-Mudawat Wal-Tadbeer' or 'Book of Simplification Concerning Therapeutics and Diet' was given to me by its author Abu Merwan ’Abdal-Malik ibn Zuhr with hopes of gaining my favor. The man is a renowned physician who improved surgical and medical knowledge by keying out several diseases and their treatments.
translation: 艾布·玛望·阿布杜·玛利克·伊本·祖赫尔把他的著作《论简化治疗和饮食的方法》呈给我，希望获得我的好感。该名男子是一位著名的医生，他确定了几种疾病及其治疗方法，改善了外科和医学知识。

original: My house is your house
translation: 我的家就是你的家！

original: Mir Sayyid Ali Hamadani has returned to [Root.GetName] after travelling far and wide. He is preaching Islam to the unbelievers and his book 'Dah Qa’idah' which gives ten rules of contemplative life is one of the most widely known and read books at this time.
translation: 米尔·赛义德·阿里·哈马丹尼返回到[Root.GetName]开始传教。他说：「应当竭力追求『苏菲派的贫穷』，其含义不是缺乏物质财富，而在于缺乏所有感，在于使『灵魂』脱离财富。」他著有《论贫困》，论述苏菲的苦修禁欲及两世观；还著有《论国家》，讨论政治和宗教伦理学关系问题。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] will greet Mir Sayyid Ali Hamadani warmly
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]热烈欢迎米尔·赛义德·阿里·哈马丹尼

original: Mir Sayyid Ali Hamadani meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 米尔·赛义德·阿里·哈马丹尼会见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: He has travelled for many years, undertaken Hajj thrice and written many treatises and tracts regarding religion, including the 'Dah Qa’idah' which gives ten rules of contemplative life. Mir Sayyid Ali Hamadani is most welcome at my court.
translation: 他曾游历多年，三次进行朝圣，并写了许多关于宗教的论述著作，包括《论贫困》，论述苏菲的苦修禁欲及两世观；还有《论国家》，讨论政治和宗教伦理学关系问题.我的宫廷非常欢迎米尔·赛义德·阿里·哈马丹尼的到来

original: Rest, my friend, and tell me of your travels
translation: 好好休息，我的朋友，请告诉我您在旅行中的所见所闻

original: Qutb al-Din al-Shirazi from [Root.GetName], a master chess player, player of the musical instrument Rabab and contributor to astronomy, mathematics, medicine, physics, music theory, philosophy and Sufism has an insatiable desire for learning and wishes to stay at [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] to be able to concentrate on some of his research.
translation: 库特布丁·设拉子来自[Root.GetName]，是一位象棋大师、拉巴卜演奏家，对天文学、数学、医学、物理学、音乐、棋艺、哲学和苏菲主义都有涉猎，他对学习保持着永不满足的欲望，希望留在[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]以便能够专注于他的一些研究。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would surely not deny this man a place at court!
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]绝不会否认这个人在宫廷的地位！

original: Qutb al-Din al-Shirazi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 库特布丁·设拉子参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I have a fondness for the musical instrument Rabab and have been looking for someone to teach me how to play chess. I praised Allah when Qutb al-Din al-Shirazi, a master chess player, player of the Rabab and contributor to astronomy, mathematics, medicine, physics, music theory, philosophy and Sufism wishes to stay at my court to be able to concentrate on some of his research.
translation: 我喜爱弓弦乐器，尤其是拉巴卜，我也喜欢和人下棋。我要感谢伟大的安拉，使我能够遇到库特布丁·设拉子，这位精通天文学、数学、医学、物理学、音乐、哲学和苏菲派教义的智者。最重要的是，他愿意留在我的宫廷继续他的研究！

original: You may stay, if you teach me how to play chess
translation: 你可以留下，如果你教我如何下棋

original: Al-Dakhwar started his work as an oculist at the Nuri Hospital of [Root.GetName] and then continued studying medicine with Ibn al-Matran. His book 'al-Janinah' or 'The Embryo' and the poetry book 'Kitab ul-Aghani', a summarized version of 'The Book of Songs' by al-Isfahani, has made him famous beyond [Root.GetName].
translation: 达赫瓦尔作为努里医院眼科医生在[Root.GetName]工作，后来与伊本·马达兰学习医药。他的书《萌芽》和整理总结了艾布·法拉吉·伊斯法哈尼的《诗歌集成》，使他成功闻名[Root.GetName]。

original: The [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle] couldn't wish for a better physician
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]非常欢迎这样优秀的医生

original: Al-Dakhwar meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 达赫瓦尔参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I offered Al-Dakhwar, the author of 'al-Janinah' or 'The Embryo', a former oculist at the Nuri Hospital of [From.GetName] and student of Ibn al-Matran, 30 dinars a month as my chief of medicine but he refused! He said: 'I know my ability in this field and I will not take less than 100 dinars a month!'
translation: 我给了达赫瓦尔——《萌芽》的作者，曾经[From.GetName]的努里医院的眼科医生，伊本·马达兰的学生——每月 30 第纳尔的医疗主管工作，但是他拒绝了！他说 ：「我知道我在这个领域的能力，我应该每月不少于 100 第纳尔！」

original: 100 dinars a month, then!
translation: 一个月 100 第纳尔，成交！

original: No, you will be satisfied with 30 dinars or nothing!
translation: 不，要么拿30第纳尔，要么什么都得不到！

original: An older man, Zayn al-Din, who was a pupil of Ibn Abi Sadiq and Ahmad ibn Farrokh, has arrived to [Root.GetName] and is asking for a place at [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court as court physician while working on his medical encyclopedia 'Thesaurus of the Shah of Khwarazm'. So far only five of ten volumes has been finished, on anatomy, physiology, hygiene, diagnosis and prognosis.
translation: 一个老人扎因丁，是伊本·阿比·萨迪克和艾哈迈德·伊本·法罗克的学生，已经到了[Root.GetName]并要求在[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷任职宫廷医师，同时编写他的医学百科全书《花剌子模沙阿词典》。到目前为止，十卷中只有五卷完成，分别是解剖、生理、卫生、诊断和预防。

original: I doubt the [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle] would want an old man as [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis] court physician
translation: 我怀疑[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]是否愿意由一个老家伙担任[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis]宫廷医师

original: Zayn al-Din Gorgani meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 扎因丁参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: It was an impressive work, the incomplete medical encyclopedia 'Thesaurus of the Shah of Khwarazm', that Zayn al-Din presented to me. At first I was hesitant but the pupil of Ibn Abi Sadiq and Ahmad ibn Farrokh persisted, Zayn al-Din managed to convince me and I accepted him as my court physician.
translation: 扎因丁所呈现的未完成的医学百科全书《花剌子模沙阿词典》，是一部令人印象深刻的著作。起初我有些犹豫，但毕竟是伊本·阿比·萨迪克和艾哈迈德·伊本·法罗克的学生，扎因丁还是说服了我同意让他担任我的宫廷御医。

original: Could you take a look at my tooth? It aches!
translation: 你可以先看看我的牙齿吗？它很痛！

original: A compilation of the beautiful sketches of flowers, plants and trees in different stages of their growth made by a professional painter employed by Rashidun al-Suri, a physician and botanist in [Root.GetName], is very popular at the moment.
translation: 拉希顿·苏里，来自[Root.GetName]，是一位医生和植物学家。他所整理的植物图鉴作画专业而精美，记录了花草树木在不同生长阶段的形象，一时广受好评。

original: This book and the man should be brought to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s attention
translation: 应当把这本书和他的作者介绍给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Rashidun al-Suri meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 拉希顿·苏里参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The physician and botanist Rashidun al-Suri seemed embarrassed by all the compliments and praise his work had gotten, Rashidun al-Suri told us he just wanted sketches of flowers, plants and trees in different stages of their growth to be able to study them more thoroughly but the painter he had employed had compiled a collection of the sketches and started to sell them in [From.GetName].
translation: 这位医学和植物学家拉希顿·苏里看起来对自己作品受到的赞誉感到尴尬，拉希顿·苏里告诉我们，他只是想画出花草树木的不同生长阶段，以便能够更彻底研究它们，但他雇佣的画家已经对草图进行了整理，并开始在[From.GetName]出售它们。

original: Stay at my court as my physician, I wish to learn more about you and botany
translation: 留在我的宫廷当我的医生，我想更多的了解你和植物。

original: After many years of travelling, his visits included Bugia, Constantinople, Tunis and Barqa, Ibn al-Baitar has returned to [Root.GetName] with a large collection of plants. He has during his travels recorded the discoveries made by other physicians and added 300 to 400 new types of medicine to the one thousand previously known.
translation: 伊本·拜塔尔旅行多年，访问过著名的贝贾亚、君士坦丁堡、突尼斯和拜尔盖，如今已经带着他采集的植物回到了[Root.GetName]。他在旅途中记录与描述的植物达 1400 多种，其中首次介绍了 300 至 400 种新的植物。

original: I am sure [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would like to see your collection of plants
translation: 我深信[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]想看到你的收集

original: Ibn al-Baitar meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·拜塔尔参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Ibn al-Baitar has returned to [From.GetName] from his travels around the known world, visits to Bugia, Constantinople, Tunis and Barqa included, with a large collection of plants. His pharmacopoeia lists 1,400 plants, foods, and drugs. I may never find a more competent physician.
translation: 伊本·拜塔尔访问过著名的贝贾亚、君士坦丁堡、突尼斯和拜尔盖，如今已经回到了[From.GetName]。他的药典列举了 1400 多种植物、食物与药材。我可能永远也找不到一个比他更能干的医生。

original: I wish for you to stay at my court as court physician and chief herbalist
translation: 我希望你留在我的宫廷作为宫廷医师和首席草药师

original: The epic poem 'Zafar-Nameh', 'The Book of Victory', by historian, poet and geographer Hamdallah Mustawfi tells the tale of Iranian history from the Arab conquest to the Mongols. It is finished but has yet to be published as Hamdallah Mustawfi lacks the funds necessary.
translation: 历史学家，地理学和诗人哈马达拉·穆斯陶菲所著的史诗《胜利》，讲述了波斯从阿拉伯征服到蒙古入侵的历史。虽然已经完成，但是哈马达拉·穆斯陶菲缺乏出版资金。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] might be interested in your poem...
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]可能对你的作品感兴趣……

original: Hamdallah Mustawfi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 哈马达拉·穆斯陶菲参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: History can be fascinating, but also incredible boring. The epic poem 'Zafar-Nameh', 'The Book of Victory', by Hamdallah Mustawfi telling the tale of Iranian history from the Arab conquest to the Mongols is never boring and I agreed to help Hamdallah Mustawfi publish it.
translation: 历史令人着迷，但也可以令人厌倦无聊。哈马达拉·穆斯陶菲写就的史诗《胜利》，讲述了波斯从阿拉伯征服到蒙古入侵的历史，绝不会让人厌倦。我愿意帮助哈马达拉·穆斯陶菲出版这部伟大的作品！

original: Stay at my court for as long as you wish
translation: 留在我的宫廷，想待多久就待多久

original: The Sage of [Root.GetName], Khwaja Abdullah Ansari, has with his oratory and poetic talents in Arabic and Persian caught [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s attention. The man is a known traditionalist, polemicist, spiritual master and author of several books about mysticism and philosophy.
translation: [Root.GetName]的圣人，霍贾·阿卜杜拉·安萨里，他用阿拉伯语与波斯语进行诗歌与演讲的才能受到[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的关注。他是一位传统主义者、辩论家、精神导师，有许多神秘学和哲学著作。

original: Bring him to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 带他去见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Khwaja Abdullah Ansari meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 霍贾·阿卜杜拉·安萨里参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Khwaja Abdullah Ansari is called the Sage of [From.GetName], and I do not doubt that a man with his oratory and poetic talents in Arabic and Persian would have no trouble living up to that reputation. His books about mysticism and philosophy shows his background as a traditionalist, polemicist and spiritual master.
translation: 霍贾·阿卜杜拉·安萨里被称为[From.GetName]的圣人，我相信令他用阿拉伯语与波斯语进行诗歌与演讲的才能绝非浪得虚名。他是一位传统主义者、辩论家、精神导师，有许多神秘学和哲学著作。

original: A most curious and intriguing man
translation: 非常奇妙又有趣的人！

original: Jamshid al-Kashi, an astronomer and mathematician from Kashan in [Root.GetName] wants an opportunity to contribute with his vast amounts of knowledge to [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis] subjects.
translation: 贾姆希德·卡西是来自[Root.GetName]卡尚的天文学家和数学家。他希望能有机会把自己大量的知识奉献给[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]和[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetHerHis]臣民

original: Serfs do not need knowledge, but the [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle] do
translation: 农奴不需要知识，但[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]需要

original: Jamshid al-Kashi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 贾姆希德·卡西参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Jamshid al-Kashi brought with him the book 'Treatise on Astronomical Observational Instruments', describing different instruments, such as triquetrum and armillary sphere and the sine and versine instrument of Urdi. He only asked for an opportunity to teach me and the people, to contribute with his vast amounts of knowledge.
translation: 贾姆希德·卡西带来的书《论天文观测》，描述了许多天文观测仪器，例如三角仪、环形球仪和乌尔迪正弦/正矢仪。他只有一个要求，那就是奉献出他大量的知识，教会我和我的人民。

original: Sounds good. Now, how do you use a triquetrum and armillary sphere?
translation: 听起来不错。快说说，怎么使用三角仪和环形球仪？

original: The Sufi order Kubraviya in [Root.GetName] focuses on explaining the visionary experience and seeking the meaning of visions through ritual performances and meditation. The Kubraviya's founder Najmuddin Kubra discuss the analysis of dreams and visions in his works, something [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] finds interesting.
translation: [Root.GetName]的苏菲派库布拉维教团侧重于解释幻觉经历，通过举行仪式与冥想获得幻觉并探寻其意义。其创始人纳杰姆丁·库布拉在他的著作中讨论了梦境和幻觉的分析，而这正是[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]感兴趣的东西。

original: Najmuddin Kubra is invited to meet [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 纳杰姆丁·库巴拉被邀请会见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Najmuddin Kubra meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 纳杰姆丁·库巴拉会见 [This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The Prophet, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, developed the Islamic faith based on dreams and visions so the Sufi order Kubraviya's focus on seeking the meaning of visions through ritual performances and meditation is most important. I invited the order's founder Najmuddin Kubra to learn more.
translation: 先知（愿主福安之）在梦境与幻觉中发展了伊斯兰信仰，于是苏菲派库巴拉维教团通过举行仪式与冥想获得幻觉并探寻其意义，而冥想更是尤为重要。我邀请教团创始人纳杰姆丁·库巴拉以便了解更多。

original: How may prayer and fasting help me connect to the divine in a spiritual way?
translation: 如何通过祈祷和禁食帮我实现与安拉合一？

original: 'Treatise on Demonstration of Problems of Algebra' by Omar Khayyám from [Root.GetName] lays down the principles of algebra and derives general methods for solving cubic equations and even some higher orders. A great mathematician like Omar Khayyám is something [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s court is missing.
translation: 来自[Root.GetName]的奥玛尔·海亚姆写下了《代数问题的论证》，阐释了代数学的定理，推导出许多三次方程乃至更高次方程的解法。[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷正缺少像奥玛尔·海亚姆一样伟大的数学家。

original: Introduce Omar Khayyám to the [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]
translation: 向引见[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]奥玛尔·海亚姆

original: Omar Khayyám meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 奥玛尔·海亚姆参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [From.GetName] has produced a great mathematician, Omar Khayyám, whose work 'Treatise on Demonstration of Problems of Algebra' lays down the principles of algebra and derives general methods for solving cubic equations.
translation: [From.GetName]诞生了一位伟大的数学家奥玛尔·海亚姆，他的著作《代数问题的论证》阐释了代数学的定理，推导出许多三次方程乃至更高次方程的解法。

original: Invite Omar Khayyám to court
translation: 邀请奥玛尔·海亚姆来宫廷

original: The restless traveller Ibn Battuta from [Root.GetName] has returned home after another of his travels around the world, this time he visited Medina, then followed the river Tigris to Basra, Shiraz, Tabriz, Mosul, Cizre and Mardin. A traveller like him should have many tales to entertain [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] with.
translation: 在又一次周游世界之后，永不止步的旅行家伊本·白图泰回到了他的家乡[Root.GetName]，这一回他访问了麦地那，然后沿着底格里斯河而上，遍历巴士拉、设拉子、大不里士、摩苏尔、吉兹雷和马尔丁等地。一位像他这样的旅行者应该拥有足够多的传说故事来取悦[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: Ask Ibn Battuta to tell his travel stories to the [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]
translation: 询问 伊本·白图泰的旅行故事并讲述于[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]

original: Ibn Battuta meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·白图泰会见 [This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Ibn Battuta is a renowned traveller, so when he returned home to [From.GetName] I invited him to tell me tales of his travels and I was not disappointed. Ambushes, bandits, famous mosques, beautiful cities and all sorts of adventures had Ibn Battuta seen and experienced.
translation: 伊本·白图泰是著名的旅行家，所以当他回到家乡[From.GetName]后，我邀请他告诉我他的旅行故事，对方也并未让我失望。伏击，土匪，著名的清真寺，美丽的城市和各种冒险，伊本·白图泰看到和经历的太多了。

original: Where will your next journey take you?
translation: 你的下一个旅程会去哪里？

original: Fakhr al-Din al-Razi's belief that proofs based on hadith 'could never lead to certainty but only to presumption, a key distinction in Islamic thought.' has divided the philosophers of [Root.GetName], some agrees with the theologian and others argues against his presumption.
translation: 法赫尔丁·拉齐认为基于圣训集的证据「只能认为是假定而非确定，这是诸多伊斯兰思想的关键区别」，这一观点在[Root.GetName]的哲学家中引起了分裂，许多人同意这位神学家，其他则反对他的推定。

original: The conflict has awoken [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]'s interest
translation: 这些冲突引起了[Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]的兴趣

original: Fakhr al-Din al-Razi meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 法赫尔丁·拉齐参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Furious philosophers and theologians in [From.GetName] are arguing against and for Fakhr al-Din al-Razi's belief that proofs based on hadith 'could never lead to certainty but only to presumption, a key distinction in Islamic thought.'. Fakhr al-Din al-Razi was called to account for his opinion and argued so well I found no flaws.
translation: 法赫尔丁·拉齐认为基于圣训集的证据「只能认为是假定而非确定，这是诸多伊斯兰思想的关键区别」，在[From.GetName]愤怒的哲学家和神学家为此争执不休，我召见法赫尔丁·拉齐解释自己的观点，他论述缜密，我没有发现破绽。

original: Tell me, would you like a place at court, as court philosopher?
translation: 告诉我，你愿意担任宫廷哲学家吗？

original: The poetry of Ibn al-Khatib has been put to music as Muwashshah but the man is more than a poet, he is also a writer, historian, philosopher and physician.
translation: 伊本·哈提卜将音乐融进诗歌，发展出「穆瓦莎赫」的诗歌体裁，但他不只是诗人，同时也是作家、历史学家、哲学家和医生。

original: The [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle] loves music
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitle]热爱音乐

original: Ibn al-Khatib meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·哈提卜参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I first read, then heard Ibn al-Khatib's poetry as it had been put to music as Muwashshah. A most prominent man from [From.GetName], besides writing poetry he is also a writer, historian, philosopher and physician.
translation: 我一开始读伊本·哈提卜的诗歌，后来就变成了听，因为他将音乐融进诗歌，发展出「穆瓦莎赫」的诗歌体裁。他是来自[From.GetName]的才子，除了写诗，他也是一名作家，历史学家，哲学家和医生。

original: Stay at my court and write more poetry!
translation: 留在我的宫廷，写下更多诗篇！

original: Ibn Rushd from [Root.GetName] is a versatile man, a master of philosophy, theology, logic, the science medicine, astronomy and many other subjects. Among his works we find his medical encyclopedia called 'Kulliyat' or 'Generalities' and 'Fasl al-Maqal', which argues for the legality of philosophical investigation under Islamic law.
translation: 伊本·鲁世德来自[Root.GetName]，是哲学、神学、逻辑学、医学、天文学和许多领域的大师。《医学通则》是他的医学理论百科全书，《哲学和宗教联系的论断》是对伊斯兰教法下哲学研究合法性的辩护。

original: A fascinating man
translation: 一个迷人的人

original: Ibn Rushd meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·鲁世德参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Every Qadi should read Ibn Rushd's 'Fasl al-Maqal' which argues for the legality of philosophical investigation under Islamic law. The man from [From.GetName] is a master of philosophy, theology, logic, the science medicine, astronomy and many other subjects, any court would pride itself in having Ibn Rushd as court philosopher.
translation: 每个教法官都应该读伊本·鲁世德的《哲学和宗教联系的论断》，这本书为伊斯兰法律下研究哲学的合法性做了辩护。这个男人来自[From.GetName]，是哲学、神学、逻辑学、医学、天文学和许多其他领域的大师。由伊本·鲁世德担任宫廷哲学家的任何宫廷都会感到无比自豪。

original: Ask him to stay at my court as court philosopher
translation: 让他留在宫廷担任宫廷哲学家

original: Every university has Ibn Sina's 'The Canon of Medicine' as a standard medical text. Ibn Sina is from [Root.GetName] and his works includes writing on every possible subject, from philosophy to alchemy to geology to poetry and so on.
translation: 所有大学都把伊本·西那的《医典》当做医学标准教科书。伊本·西那来自[Root.GetName]，他的作品包括一切可能的领域，涉及到哲学、地质学、文学等方面。

original: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] would be pleased to meet you
translation: [Root.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]将很高兴认识您

original: Ibn Sina meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 伊本·西那参见[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I read Ibn Sina's 'The Canon of Medicine' as part of my education and found it fascinating. I tried to invite Ibn Sina to my court several times, but he had little time to waste. Then I offered him a job as court physician and now I can discuss philosophy, alchemy, geology, poetry or any other subject we both find fascinating.
translation: 我将伊本·西那的《医典》作为教育的一部分，它实在太迷人了。我试图邀请伊本·西纳我宫廷几次，但他很少有时间浪费。最后我邀请他担任宫廷医师随意进行研究，现在我们可以尽情讨论哲学、炼金、地质、诗歌或其他我们共同感兴趣的话题。

original: Tell me your opinion on Aristotle's philosophy...
translation: 告诉我你关于亚里士多德哲学的见解……

original: Al-Jaldaki from [Root.GetName] is a brilliant alchemist whose 'al-Misbah fi Ilm al-Miftah' or 'Key of the Sciences of Lights' and 'The Proof Regarding Secrets of the Science of the Balance' or 'Kitab al-Burhan fi asrar 'ilm al-mizan' are widely acclaimed by other alchemists.
translation: 贾勒达基来自[Root.GetName]，是位才华横溢的炼金术士，著有《各种光线科学的关键》、《关于平衡科学之秘的证据》，受到众多炼金术士交口称赞。

original: Why haven't we heard of him before?
translation: 为什么我之前没有听说过他？

original: Al-Jaldaki meets [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 贾勒达基会见 [This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I had the fortune to meet the alchemist Al-Jaldaki from [From.GetName] and invited him to my court. His works 'al-Misbah fi Ilm al-Miftah' or 'Key of the Sciences of Lights' and 'The Proof Regarding Secrets of the Science of the Balance' or 'Kitab al-Burhan fi asrar 'ilm al-mizan' are brilliant.
translation: 我有幸见到来自[From.GetName]的伟大炼金家贾勒达基并邀请他来到我的宫廷。他的作品《各种光线科学的关键》、《关于平衡科学之秘的证据》真是太杰出了！

original: I am lucky to have him here
translation: 他来到这里我很幸运……

original: Has Fatwa Issued
translation: 发布教令

original: Has Fatwa Issued
translation: 发布教令

original: Issued Fatwa
translation: 发布教令

original: Your master, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], has come forward in private with a suggestion that you, as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName], issue a fatwa against [From.GetTitledName]. No doubt the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] has [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] own motives for this, but it cannot be denied that [From.GetFirstName] leads a decadent lifestyle with little room for piety.
translation: 你的主人[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]，秘密前来建议你，作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis][Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName]，发布一份针对[From.GetTitledName]的伊斯兰教令。毫无疑问[Root.Liege.GetTitle]做这件事情有[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]理由，但是无可否认[From.GetFirstName]过着腐化的生活，虔诚基本与他无关。

original: Very well, the fatwa shall be issued.
translation: 很好，这份伊斯兰教令会被签署。

original: No, their squabbling does not concern me.
translation: 不，他们的争吵与我无关。

original:
Esteemed [Root.GetTitle], I have taken your suggestion into consideration, and after much thought I have arrived at the same conclusion as you. A fatwa will be issued.

Your faithful servant,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetTitle]，我已经考虑了你的建议，在深思熟虑之后我得到了与你相同的结论。应当签署一份伊斯兰教令。

你忠诚的仆人，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Excellent!
translation: 很好！

original: Your decadent ways and lack of devotion to Allah (glorified and exalted be He) can no longer be tolerated. After consulting with my master, [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], I have reached the conclusion that a fatwa must be issued against you. May you return to the path of righteousness before it is too late.\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 你腐化的生活方式以及缺乏对安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）的信仰让人忍无可忍。在咨询我的主人[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]之后，我已经决定签署一份反对你的伊斯兰教令。愿你在事态无可挽回之前回到正义的轨道上来。\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: This is an outrage!
translation: 这太过分了！

original: My [Root.GetTitle], I must object to this shameful attempt on your part to invoke the will of Allah (glorified and exalted be He) in your petty feud. There will be no fatwa that you can take advantage of to further your own ambitions.\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 我的[Root.GetTitle]，我必须反对你的这个可耻的企图，你居然想为你渺小的纠纷祈求安拉（愿主荣耀尊贵）的意志。不会有可供你利用来推动你自己野心的伊斯兰教令。\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: You will come to regret this.
translation: 你会对此感到后悔的。

original: You put forward the name of [From.GetTitledName] to your [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], with the not so subtle suggestion that [From.GetSheHe] may be deserving of a fatwa.
translation: 你把[From.GetTitledName]的名字呈给[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]，建议[From.GetSheHe]应该收到一份伊斯兰教令。

original: For the sake of our children, if nothing else.
translation: 至少为了我们的孩子的缘故。

original: Informed about fatwa.
translation: 得知伊斯兰教令的消息。

original: Informed fatwa will not be issued.
translation: 得知伊斯兰教令不会被签署。

original: Plain
translation: 无花纹

original: Though you are the first wife of [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], his current announced heir is not a child of yours. Perhaps you could talk to your husband and persuade him to grant your son more land, thus increasing his power and influence...
translation: 虽然你是[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]的第一位妻子，但他目前宣布的继承人不是你的孩子。也许你可以和你的丈夫谈谈，并说服他赐予你的儿子更多土地，由此提升他的权力和影响力……

original: Yes, my son deserves more!
translation: 是的，我的儿子应该获得更多！

original: No, my husband knows best...
translation: 不，我的丈夫知道怎样做最好……

original: You tell your boy about your plans.
translation: 你告诉你的孩子你的计划。

original: Your dear mother, [Root.Mother.GetTitledFirstName], is very upset that despite her position as your father's first wife, his announced heir is not a child of hers. Today she has announced her intentions to plead with your father to grant you more land, thus increasing the influence of her favored little boy... you.
translation: 你亲爱的母亲[Root.Mother.GetTitledFirstName]感到十分失望，因为尽管她是你的父亲的第一位妻子，他宣称的继承人却不是她的孩子。今天她宣称她要去向你的父亲请求赐予你更多的土地，以此来增加你的影响力，你是她最爱的孩子。

original: Mother, you're embarrassing me!
translation: 母亲，你让我蒙羞！

original: Your mother corners your father.
translation: 你的母亲步步紧逼你的父亲。

original: Your dear first wife, [From.Mother.GetFirstName], has once again cornered you and is expressing her shame and embarrassment over the fact that your current heir is not a child of hers. She is pleading with you to grant more land to her precious boy [From.GetFirstName], increasing his influence.
translation: 你亲爱的第一妻子，[From.Mother.GetFirstName]，又一次把你逼入角落，向你表达她对于你现在的继承人不是她的儿子感到丢脸和尴尬。她向你恳求赐予她的宝贵儿子[From.GetFirstName]更多土地，增加他的影响力。

original: Fine, fine. If it will get you off my back...
translation: 好的，好的。如果这样能让你不再跟着我……

original: No, I do not care who his mother is. He has not earned it.
translation: 不，我并不关心他的母亲是谁。他没有自己赢得这些。

original: Despite your mother's arguments, your father has refused to grant you more land for now. In fact, he seems a bit disappointed that you would let your mother fight your battles for you...
translation: 不管你的母亲说些什么，你的父亲拒绝在眼下赐予你更多的土地。事实上，他看起来对于你让你的母亲在继承人争夺中帮忙有些失望……

original: But... but... I didn't tell her to...!
translation: 但是……但是……我没有让她去做这件事……！

original: You have toiled long and hard for your husband, [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName], and even gifted him with a son. But the heir is not a child of yours, and as soon as [Root.Spouse.Heir.GetFirstName] assumes the throne, your son may be killed as a pretender. Perhaps it would be best to strike first...
translation: 你已经为你的丈夫[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]辛劳了很长时间，并且给他生了一个儿子。但是他的继承人却不是你的儿子，一旦[Root.Spouse.Heir.GetFirstName]得到了王位，你的儿子就会因觊觎王位而被杀。也许抢先动手是最好的办法……

original: I do this for my son!
translation: 我这是为了我的儿子！

original: No, I cannot do this...
translation: 不，我不能这么做……

original: Dying from poison....
translation: 死于毒药……

original: Auntie [From.GetFirstName], one of your father's wives, gives you a cup of tea and insists you drink it. The tea smells funny, though, and you refuse to taste it. When [From.GetFirstName] tries to force you to drink, the tea spills on the floor and is lapped up by one of your pet cats... who promptly dies.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]阿姨，你父亲的一位妻子，递给你一杯茶并坚持让你喝下。不过，这杯茶闻起来有些古怪，你拒绝品尝它。当[From.GetFirstName]想要强迫你喝下去的时候，茶洒在地板上，溅在你的一只宠物猫身上……它很快就死掉了。

original: P-poison?
translation: 毒，毒药？

original: One of your wives, [From.GetFirstName], has been caught trying to serve a cup of poisoned tea to [Root.Heir.GetFirstName], your [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter] and heir. Only your [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]'s keen senses revealed the beverage for the vile poison it was before [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] drank from the cup. It seems her goal was to make her own son your heir...
translation: 你的一个妻子，[From.GetFirstName]，在尝试给[Root.Heir.GetFirstName]，你的[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]和继承人一杯有毒的茶时被捉住了。幸好在[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]喝下去之前，你[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]以敏锐的感官发现饮料被下了毒。似乎她下毒的目的是为了让她的儿子成为继承人。

original: You would kill my own son? This will cost you dearly.
translation: 你想杀死我的儿子？你要为此付出代价。

original: Throw her into the dungeons!
translation: 把她扔到地牢里！

original: Oh well. Just don't do it again.
translation: 好吧。下不为例。

original: Exposing murder attempt....
translation: 公开谋杀企图……

original: Auntie [From.GetFirstName], one of your father's wives, gives you a cup of tea and insists you drink it. The tea tastes funny, though, and when you have emptied the cup, the world fades away...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]阿姨，你父亲的一位妻子，递给你一杯茶并坚持让你喝下。不过，这杯茶尝起来有些古怪，当你喝完的时候，你感到世界失去了颜色……

original: I don't feel so good....
translation: 我感觉很难受……

original: Your [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter] and heir, [Root.Heir.GetFirstName], has mysteriously perished after becoming suddenly ill. Though you and your advisors suspect foul play, you have no idea where to place the blame...
translation: 你的[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]和继承人[Root.Heir.GetFirstName]突然暴病而亡。虽然你和你的顾问认为这是场谋杀，但你不知道凶手是谁……

original: My [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]...
translation: 我的[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]……

original: Your [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter] and heir, [Root.Heir.GetFirstName], has perished after being served a cup of poisoned tea by [From.GetFirstName], your treacherous wife! It seems she murdered [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] in an effort to see her own son declared as heir.
translation: 你的[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]和继承人[Root.Heir.GetFirstName]喝下你奸诈的妻子[From.GetFirstName]端上来的毒茶后突然死亡！似乎是她为了让她的儿子成为继承人而谋杀了[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]。

original: My [Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]... you will suffer a thousand deaths for this, woman.
translation: 我的[Root.Heir.GetSonDaughter]……你会死无葬身之地，女人。

original: Throw the wench into the dungeons!
translation: 把这个贱人扔进地牢！

original: Oh well. What is done is done.
translation: 好吧。木已成舟。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has decided to hold a great Furusiyya martial competition, and has sent invitations out to warriors across the land. As [From.GetSheHe] is of the same house as you, this initiative has reduced the decadence of your entire dynasty in the eyes of the people.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]决定举行一场盛大的马术大会，并已向这片土地上的勇士们发出了邀请。由于[From.GetSheHe]与你属于同一家族，这项倡议减少了在人民的眼中你整个家族的腐化度。

original: A splendid decision!
translation: 很棒的决定！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has been declared as the winner of a great Furusiyya martial competition! This triumph reflects well on how decadent the people see your entire dynasty, as you are of the same house.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已被宣布为这场盛大的马术大会的冠军！由于你们属于同一家族，这项突破减少了在人民的眼中你的整个家族的腐化度。

original: Congratulations!
translation: 恭喜！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has been declared the second champion of a great Furusiyya martial competition! This accomplishment has reduced the decadence of your entire dynasty in the eyes of the people, as you and [From.GetFirstName] are of the same house.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已被宣布为这场盛大的马术大会的亚军！由于你和[From.GetFirstName]属于同一家族，这项成就减少了在人民的眼中你的整个家族的腐化度。

original: Well deserved!
translation: 值得赞扬！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has won third place in a great Furusiyya martial competition! People now view your whole dynasty as slightly less decadence, as you and [From.GetFirstName] are of the same house.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]获得了这场盛大的马术大会的季军！由于你和 [From.GetFirstName]属于同一家族，人们现在认为你的整个家族的腐化度有轻微的减少。

original: Well done!
translation: 干得好！

original: There is no [Root.job_spiritual.GetManWoman] better at increasing the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church's opinion of me or teach me to become a more pious Muslim than my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 没有[Root.job_spiritual.GetManWoman]能比我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]更善于提升[Root.Religion.GetName]教会对我的好感以及教导我去成为一名更虔诚的穆斯林！
